story:
goodXgames Inc. was formed as a result of working in Haiti since 2010, learning about the problems that exist, and creating a solution that incorporates gaming, technology, solar energy solutions, and an awareness of a larger community.  

As a result of our experiences we are making social impact games for a community of gamers and non-gamers so that they enjoy the experience and make a real world impact by simply having fun.

This campaign is focused on two fun games and one impact program initially benefiting Haiti.

                                    

There are 1.3 Billion people without access to electricity and we feel that the largest growing industry on earth, video gaming, could help provide a sustainable means to support rural electrification.  Our only caveats are making sure that our games are fun and our impact network is successful.

The Solar Games will contribute 50% of profits to a low interest credit fund for communities without electricity access.  This fund will provide a variety of positive impacts such as creating jobs, technical training for Haitian installers, providing durable solar products, and helping provide a mechanism for gamers and the entertainment industry to create real world change through video games.

As a social enterprise we feel its important to move from traditional donor based models for development and create sustainable revenue structures that allow us to grow as a company and improve peoples' lives at the same time.

The first round of funding pays for $9,250 in software licensing and will allow us to work on our free time to release Solar Games: Battle by April 2014.  If we hit $18,000 we can pay to have a smaller core team release Battle by February 2014.  Stepping up to $32,000 allows us to retain our core staff and release The Solar Games: Battle by December 2013.  Stretch amounts beyond that will add additional features to The Solar Games: Battle and will progressively scale up to the release of The Solar Games: Racing for Haiti by March 2014.  Following The Solar Games: Racing, our next stretch goal will allow us to develop the ground accountability and technical support network with our impact partners in Haiti (Please see our Impact Program section for more details). Further funding allows us to create racing and battle locations from China, Africa, India and the peoples' choice.

Please refer to our Stretch Goals section for more details on what pledges create.  

Indiegogo is the best platform for creative and cause related campaigns.  We feel at home with the Indiegogo community and the flexibility that Indiegogo provides.  We have supporters from China to Haiti so we need an easy platform that can accommodate our international backers.

The year is 2033. Global climate change efforts over the past 20 years have failed. The environmental apocalypse has arrived and it is causing strange mutations across planet Earth. The global community has one last hope to save the world. We have created...The Solar Games.

The Solar Games is a series of mobile games that empowers players to create change in the world through simply playing a game. 50% of game profits will be contributed to a low interest microfinance fund that will help rural developing communities get access to solar electricity. Our partners in Haiti will geotag the solar installations to show players where their gameplay has impacted real lives.

The Solar Games: Battle is the initial release of The Solar Games, which is a Mad Max style solar kart battle game.  Our larger goal is create The Solar Games: Racing, which is a solar kart racing game based on real locations, intially focusing around Haiti.  Through gameplay a player's success will be tracked by competitive leader boards and the real-world impact they create through gameplay and in-game purchases.   

To view videos and more information about each individual game, scroll a quarter mile down the page. 

The Solar Games will release on Android, iOS, PC, Mac, and Linux all of which will be DRM-free.  Additional stretch goals will include console releases for Xbox Live Arcade and Playstation Network, pending licensing approval.

Below is a quick snapshot of our Stretch Goals for the campaign.  About a half mile down the page is a detailed description of the first 9 Stretch Goals.  Stretch # 9 begins the Stretch Game, Solar Games: Racing.

The majority of our perks are cumulative so you get every perk that comes before your designated funding level.  See our perk descriptions to the right and images at the bottom of our campaign page for more information.

We have a variety of digital perks as well as some that are handmade by our Haitian artists for The Solar Games.  Supporting our project at these perk levels will directly support the arts in our favorite city: Jacmel, Haiti.  

The $30 Microwatt Perk includes a bracelet made by Sadras Jean Baptiste from Jacmel, Haiti who is making very well-made bracelets from colorful phone wires, durable strings, and recycled plastics.  This perk is not cumulative.

The $750 Gigawatt Perk includes a Haitian Flag painting on canvas with a screen print of The Solar Games logo.  The main painting is done by the artists from FOSAJ, one of the largest art collectives and schools in Haiti with over 1,200 artists.  Also included at this level is a portable 2-watt solar charger for any USB chargeable device.

The $2,500 Zettawatt Perk includes a papier-mâché mask made by Vady Confidant, an acclaimed papier-mâché artist and painter from Jacmel, Haiti and a member of FOSAJ. This perk also includes an invite to our launch party in Orlando, FL (travel expenses not included).

IMPACT VIDEO COMING SOON! Featuring multiple perspectives on electrification and interviews with some of the pioneers of rural electrification.

Our Impact Program is a coordinated network among the microfinance, solar, and educational organizations primarily in Haiti and America.  The program is meant to address the United Nations' Sustainable Energy for All Initiative which is focused on bringing energy access to the 1.3 billion people without access to electricity.  Not having electricity leads most families to burn fossil fuels for energy and indoor lighting.  This is not only expensive but it has a large negative health impacts for families.  Over 2 million people die every year from respiratory diseases caused by indoor smoke inhalation. 

How Does it Work?

Microfinance Fund: The program works by using game profits as low interest funds for community lenders that work to qualify micro-loans for schools, small businesses, medical clinics, households, and communities without access to electricity.  

Accountability:  A monitoring & verification program operated by our partners ensure that the money is being offered at low interest rates for quality equipment as well as a feedback system for solar installers on the ground.  

Gameplay Feedback:  The feedback program connects with The Solar Games through geotagged system installations.  The geotagged systems will show players the real impact of their gameplay.  Friends will also see their group impact from gameplay as well.

Education & Economic Development:  Further technical capacity and sales training sessions will be regularly hosted to ensure our solar installer partners are meeting international electrical codes for safe installations.   

Experience:  Aside from our involvement with the United Nations Foundation's Energy Access Practitioners Network, we have worked and consulted with the leaders in the global solar movement and have based our program on the best practices for rural electrification and local economic development.  

Pilot Programs

Our two pilot locations will include Cameron and Lle a Vache, Haiti.  Both of these communities have no electricity access for a combined population of 25,000 households.  We are working with our Haitian installation partner, Haiti Energie, to integrate The Solar Games Impact Program as a potential financial solution for these communities.

We have built a very strong relationship with Haiti and feel that this program will not only provide jobs for Haitians but it will also provide tech jobs for our team as well as our American solar product manufacturers and partners.

For more info about our Impact Program, follow the link to our Impact Page.    

Long Term Goals

As we provide more renewable energy solutions a variety of health, poverty, and climate issues will be addressed.  Further, increased energy access leads to telecom access, connectivity, and allows for rural developing communities to access social networks, new technologies, and education and income opportunities.

Once we fine tune our Haiti operation, we plan to replicate our Impact Program in rural China, India, Africa, and other global locations in need of electricity.

             

Please consider contributing to our campaign and share our project with your friends and networks.  We are so close to making this dream come true. Your contribution will not only help to great jobs for our team and partners but it will also create a new opportunity and a better life for our global community.

If you cannot contribute financially but want to support our campaign please share our campaign with the available Indiegogo share tools or personally tell someone about the campaign. 

                                       

                                      

A solar kart battle game incorporating surreal locales, solar physics, a comedic attitude, and a positive social impact through gameplay.

The first in the series, The Solar Games: Battle is akin to Mario Kart meets Fallout. The game is set after the environmental apocalypse where a global battle series has been established. The heart and soul of the game is to be the last survivor in an epic solar battle royale.  Gameplay is fast and intense but with a dose of humor. Players will be able to battle their friends in multiplayer mode by collecting carbon based power-ups and attacking other players.  Players will also be able to choose comedic backseat driver commentary and select exclusive music tracks to play during the battles.  The initial landscape is based on elements from Haiti, China and other locations planned for the future.

Initially The Solar Games: Battle will have four surreal arenas and a complete solar buggy tier that evolves from a Steam Punk/Mad Max design to a Cyber Punk/Tron solar buggy. 

Vehicle Upgrades, Carbon Points, and Solar Cash.

Through the course of battle victories players will earn Carbon Points. Carbon Points are an in-game currency that players can use to purchase upgrades to new vehicle tiers as well as purchasing powerups before battling.  Players can also purchase or occasionally earn Solar Cash, the second in-game currency. Solar Cash can be spent on the same kart upgrades to receive them faster, pre-purchaseing powerups, and other exclusive in-game content. The purchase of Solar Cash will not create a pay-to-win atmosphere.

Each player will have an in-game garage that will hold all of their karts that are not being used. The garage can be upgraded to store more vehicles.

Player freedom is essential throughout The Solar Games.  In addition to fully customizable karts, players can also customize their audio experience. In-game music will integrate culturally relevant and collaborative music efforts from local artists for each locale.  Players will have the option of streaming music or listening to curated playlists by celebrity artists. Players will have the option to submit music on a monthly basis and have the community vote on their favorite submissions. The community chosen works will then be available in The Solar Games marketplace.

Comedic commentary tracks are a backseat driver experience where players choose from a variety of comedic characters. Guest comedians and commentators will be available in The Solar Games marketplace. Players will have the option to submit comedic commentaries on a monthly basis and have the community vote on their favorite submissions. The community chosen works will then be available in The Solar Games marketplace.

Commentary Introductions




Each player can interact with other players through the World Hub. The world hub will bring players together through Alliances of racers that work together to show off achievements and impact while providing a centralized place to socialize with people from all over the world  This visual network and menu hub will be the main starting point for The Solar Games: Battle and future releases like The Solar Games: Racing.

Below are the Battle Stretch Goals.  If we reach some of our goals we'll continue to show more stretch goals.

                                              

                                                   Battle Stretch Goals

$18,000: Release The Solar Games: Battle by February 2014: If we hit this goal we will be able to release Battle earlier than expected.

$32,000: Early Battle Mode release: This funding level will allow us to be able to obtain our human resource needs and all of the software necessary to release The Solar Games: Battle in December 2013.

$37,000: 12 Additional Powerups + Helmet Content Pack: This funding level will allow for an additional 12 powerups and a 5 helmet content pack.

$39,000: 2 Additional Track Content Pack: This funding level will allow for 2 additional tracks in The Solar Games: Battle.

$49,500: Haiti Recording Session:  This funding level will allow us to take a production crew and one lucky winner to Haiti.  This session will allow us to produce our collaborative music session for the soundtrack to The Solar Games.

$59,500: New Vehicle Tier: This funding level will allow a second set of vehicles to be created for The Solar Games: Battle. This vehicle class may be a bike, trike, truck, or 2-wheeled futuristic big wheel thingy.

$69,500: Pink Slip Mode: This funding level will allow Pink Slip mode to be created. Pink slip mode allows for players to wager Carbon Points. The winner takes all and the loser has to earn back what they lost through gameplay.

$79,500: Stunt Mode: This funding level will allow players to have a stunt mode within battles. Players will be able to earn more Carbon Points or Solar Cash through performing various stunts while in battle.

$94,500: 5 Surreal Events: This funding level will allow us to add 5 surreal events to the game such as: tornados, hurricanes, dinosaurs, goats, acid rain and a variety of other options.

We have more stretch goals planned to create The Solar Games: Racing and we will reveal them as our funding level draws near.

                                            


The Solar Games: Racing is akin to Mario Kart meets Fallout. The game is set after an environmental apocalypse where the global landscape has become a surreal wasteland. Gameplay is fast and intense but with a dose of humor. Players will be able to race in multiple modes, including single player and multiplayer, across realistic tracks based on real world locations. The initial landscape is based on Haiti with more planned for the future.

The game will feature five classes of karts that players can race with and against: buggy, truck, trike, bike and a 2-wheeled futuristic big wheel thingy.

Real World Locations

The Solar Games: Racing is initially based on Jacmel, Haiti and surrounding areas. We have traveled to Haiti to film and document the look and feel of the landscape and culture. We are now turning this into gameplay experiences for a realistic and unique feel for the player. In the future, we hope to feature more locales such as China, Africa, and India.

Kart Customization and In-Game Currencies

Through the course of the game, players will earn Carbon Points that can be spent to upgrade all of the different parts of their kart: solar panels, motors, tires, frames, shells and batteries. Players can also purchase or occasionally earn Solar Cash which can be spent on the same kart upgrades to receive them faster, to purchase cosmetic upgrades to the kart and other exclusive in-game content. The purchase of Solar Cash will not create a pay-to-win atmosphere.

Each player will have an in-game garage that will hold all of their karts and parts that are not being used. The garage can be upgraded to store more karts and parts. Players will also be able to show off their garage to their in-game friends.

RACING MODES

The Solar Games: Racing will feature several different race modes. Players can race in traditional race modes such as circuit and time trial races. There will also be a unique Pink Slip mode, where players can put their karts or Carbon Points on the line and race in a single, very intense, winner takes all match. League and Alliance play will allow players to be put on to a global ladder and see where they stack up against the best in the world. There are also several other modes planned for the future such as Last Man Standing mode, Stunt mode, and Kitty Cat mode.

The majority of our perks are cumulative so you get every perk that comes before your designated funding level.  We strived to create the most value for your Perk, some directly support artists in Haiti as they're making our cool artisan rewards.  So go find one you like!  See our perk descriptions to the right and images at the bottom of our campaign page for more information.


“It’s On” is a documentary web series that makes you part of the creation of The Solar Games. It is filmed and hosted by Cesar Munhoz and stars the entire Solar Games team. The short webisodes will premiere on our YouTube channel and website each Monday. Check out the Indiegogo teaser videos at 


Core Team

Bradley Bulifant: Executive Producer
Steve Brown: Producer
Jacob Morris: Technical Producer
Phillip Mullennax: Marketing 
Wossenu Areda Weldekiros: International Development Director
Jessie Chin: Artist & Chinese Community Manager
Tyler Edlen: 3D & Environmental Artist
Chris Rodriquez: Graphic Designer
Cesar Munhoz: Videographer & Creator of “It’s On” YouTube Series

Additional Team Members

Arielle Goldfarb: Concept Artist
Brian Russ: 3D Artist
Chris Halterman: Sound Assets
Christine Lancaster: Sound Assets
Dana Carlstrom: Artist & Repertoire
Demetrios Panayi: Music Licensing
Jonathan Giffin: Sound Assets
Jon Rivera: Animator
Keith Caro: SEO & Music Marketing
Kyle Romanak: Film Production                                                                             Fernanda Salviano: Editor
Luis Miranda: User Experience Tester
Mark Baculanta: 3D Vehicle Artist
Nikko Laudicina: Sound Assets & Mastering
Oscar Araque: 3D Artist
Pete Bingham: Special Effects
Ryan Ryan Getsie: Music Marketing & Journalism
Zach Ahearn: 3D Artist
story_txt:
goodXgames Inc. was formed
as a result of working in Haiti since 2010, learning about the problems that exist, and creating a solution that incorporates gaming, technology, solar
energy solutions, and an awareness of a larger community.  


As a result of our experiences we are
making social impact games for a community of gamers and non-gamers so that they enjoy
the experience and make a real world impact by simply having fun.
This campaign is focused on two fun games and one impact program initially benefiting Haiti.

                                    



There are 1.3 Billion people without access to electricity and we feel that the largest growing industry on earth, video gaming, could help provide a sustainable means to support rural electrification.  Our only caveats are making sure that our games are fun and our impact network is successful.
The Solar Games will contribute 50% of profits to a low interest credit fund for communities without electricity access.  This fund will provide a variety of positive impacts such as creating jobs, technical training for Haitian installers, providing durable solar products, and helping provide a mechanism for gamers and the entertainment industry to create real world change through video games.
As a social enterprise we feel its important to move from traditional donor based models for development and create sustainable revenue structures that allow us to grow as a company and improve peoples' lives at the same time.





The first round of funding pays for $9,250 in software licensing and will allow us to work on our free time to release Solar Games: Battle by April 2014.  If we hit $18,000 we can pay to have a smaller core team release Battle by February 2014.  Stepping up to $32,000 allows us to retain our core staff and release The Solar Games: Battle by December 2013.  Stretch amounts beyond that will add additional features to The Solar Games: Battle and will progressively scale up to the release of The Solar Games: Racing for Haiti by March 2014.  Following The Solar Games: Racing, our next stretch goal will allow us to develop the ground accountability and technical support network with our impact partners in Haiti (Please see our Impact Program section for more details). Further funding allows us to create racing and battle locations from China, Africa, India and the peoples' choice.
Please refer to our Stretch Goals section for more details on what pledges create.  



Indiegogo is the best platform for creative and cause related campaigns.  We feel at home with the Indiegogo community and the flexibility that Indiegogo provides.  We have supporters from China to Haiti so we need an easy platform that can accommodate our international backers.










The year is 2033. Global climate change efforts over the past 20 years have failed. The environmental apocalypse has arrived and it is causing strange mutations across planet Earth. The global community has one last hope to save the world. We have created...The Solar Games.



The Solar Games is
a series of mobile games that empowers players to create change in the
world through simply playing a game. 50% of game profits will be contributed to a low
interest microfinance fund that will help rural developing communities get
access to solar electricity. Our partners in Haiti will geotag the solar installations to show players where their gameplay has impacted real lives.
The Solar Games: Battle is the initial release of The Solar Games, which is a Mad Max style solar kart battle game.  Our larger goal is create The Solar Games: Racing, which is a solar kart racing game based on real locations, intially focusing around Haiti.  Through gameplay a player's success will be tracked by competitive leader boards and the real-world impact they create through gameplay and in-game purchases.   
To view videos and more information about each individual game, scroll a quarter mile down the page. 
The Solar Games will release on Android, iOS, PC, Mac, and Linux all of which will be DRM-free.  Additional stretch goals will include console releases for Xbox Live Arcade and Playstation Network, pending licensing approval.



Below is a quick snapshot of our Stretch Goals for the campaign.  About a half mile down the page is a detailed description of the first 9 Stretch Goals.  Stretch # 9 begins the Stretch Game, Solar Games: Racing.






The majority of our perks are cumulative so you get every perk that comes before your designated funding level.  See our perk descriptions to the right and images at the bottom of our campaign page for more information.
We have a variety of digital perks as well as some that are handmade by our Haitian artists for The Solar Games.  Supporting our project at these perk levels will directly support the arts in our favorite city: Jacmel, Haiti.  
The $30 Microwatt Perk includes a bracelet made by Sadras Jean Baptiste from Jacmel, Haiti who is making very well-made bracelets from colorful phone wires, durable strings, and recycled plastics.  This perk is not cumulative.
The $750 Gigawatt Perk includes a Haitian Flag painting on canvas with a screen print of The Solar Games logo.  The main painting is done by the artists from FOSAJ, one of the largest art collectives and schools in Haiti with over 1,200 artists.  Also included at this level is a portable 2-watt solar charger for any USB chargeable device.
The $2,500 Zettawatt Perk includes a papier-mâché mask made by Vady Confidant, an acclaimed papier-mâché artist and painter from Jacmel, Haiti and a member of FOSAJ. This perk also includes an invite to our launch party in Orlando, FL (travel expenses not included).





IMPACT VIDEO COMING SOON! Featuring multiple perspectives on electrification and interviews with some of the pioneers of rural electrification.
Our Impact Program is a coordinated network among the microfinance, solar, and educational organizations primarily in Haiti and America.  The program is meant to address the United Nations' Sustainable Energy for All Initiative which is focused on bringing energy access to the 1.3 billion people without access to electricity.  Not having electricity leads most families to burn fossil fuels for energy and indoor lighting.  This is not only expensive but it has a large negative health impacts for families.  Over 2 million people die every year from respiratory diseases caused by indoor smoke inhalation. 
How Does it Work?
Microfinance Fund: The program works by using game profits as low interest funds for community lenders that work to qualify micro-loans for schools, small businesses, medical clinics, households, and communities without access to electricity.  
Accountability:  A monitoring & verification program operated by our partners ensure that the money is being offered at low interest rates for quality equipment as well as a feedback system for solar installers on the ground.  
Gameplay Feedback:  The feedback program connects with The Solar Games through geotagged system installations.  The geotagged systems will show players the real impact of their gameplay.  Friends will also see their group impact from gameplay as well.
Education & Economic Development:  Further technical capacity and sales training sessions will be regularly hosted to ensure our solar installer partners are meeting international electrical codes for safe installations.   
Experience:  Aside from our involvement with the United Nations Foundation's Energy Access Practitioners Network, we have worked and consulted with the leaders in the global solar movement and have based our program on the best practices for rural electrification and local economic development.  
Pilot Programs
Our two pilot locations will include Cameron and Lle a Vache, Haiti.  Both of these communities have no electricity access for a combined population of 25,000 households.  We are working with our Haitian installation partner, Haiti Energie, to integrate The Solar Games Impact Program as a potential financial solution for these communities.
We have built a very strong relationship with Haiti and feel that this program will not only provide jobs for Haitians but it will also provide tech jobs for our team as well as our American solar product manufacturers and partners.
For more info about our Impact Program, follow the link to our Impact Page.    
Long Term Goals
As we provide more renewable energy solutions a variety of health, poverty, and climate issues will be addressed.  Further, increased energy access leads to telecom access, connectivity, and allows for rural developing communities to access social networks, new technologies, and education and income opportunities.
Once we fine tune our Haiti operation, we plan to replicate our Impact Program in rural China, India, Africa, and other global locations in need of electricity.



             









Please consider contributing to our campaign and share our project with your friends and networks.  We are so close to making this dream come true. Your contribution will not only help to great jobs for our team and partners but it will also create a new opportunity and a better life for our global community.
If you cannot contribute financially but want to support our campaign please share our campaign with the available Indiegogo share tools or personally tell someone about the campaign.                                        

                                      
A solar kart battle game incorporating surreal locales, solar physics, a comedic attitude, and a positive social impact through gameplay.
The first in the series, The Solar Games: Battle is akin to Mario Kart meets Fallout. The game is set after the environmental apocalypse where a global battle series has been established. The heart and soul of the game is to be the last survivor in an epic solar battle royale.  Gameplay is fast and intense but with a dose of humor. Players will be able to battle their friends in multiplayer mode by collecting carbon based power-ups and attacking other players.  Players will also be able to choose comedic backseat driver commentary and select exclusive music tracks to play during the battles.  The initial landscape is based on elements from Haiti, China and other locations planned for the future.
Initially The Solar Games: Battle will have four surreal arenas and a complete solar buggy tier that evolves from a Steam Punk/Mad Max design to a Cyber Punk/Tron solar buggy. 
Vehicle Upgrades, Carbon Points, and Solar Cash.
Through the course of battle victories players will earn Carbon Points. Carbon Points are an in-game currency that players can use to purchase upgrades to new vehicle tiers as well as purchasing powerups before battling.  Players can also purchase or occasionally earn Solar Cash, the second in-game currency. Solar Cash can be spent on the same kart upgrades to receive them faster, pre-purchaseing powerups, and other exclusive in-game content. The purchase of Solar Cash will not create a pay-to-win atmosphere.
Each player will have an in-game garage that will hold all of their karts that are not being used. The garage can be upgraded to store more vehicles.




















Player freedom is essential throughout The Solar Games.  In addition to fully customizable karts, players can also customize their audio experience. In-game music will integrate culturally relevant and collaborative music efforts from local artists for each locale.  Players will have the option of streaming music or listening to curated playlists by celebrity artists. Players will have the option to submit music on a monthly basis and have the community vote on their favorite submissions. The community chosen works will then be available in The Solar Games marketplace.
Comedic commentary tracks are a backseat driver experience where players choose from a variety of comedic characters. Guest comedians and commentators will be available in The Solar Games marketplace. Players will have the option to submit comedic commentaries on a monthly basis and have the community vote on their favorite submissions. The community chosen works will then be available in The Solar Games marketplace.
Commentary Introductions








Each player can interact with other players through the World Hub. The world hub will bring players together through Alliances of racers that work together to show off achievements and impact while providing a centralized place to socialize with people from all over the world  This visual network and menu hub will be the main starting point for The Solar Games: Battle and future releases like The Solar Games: Racing.


Below are the Battle Stretch Goals.  If we reach some of our goals we'll continue to show more stretch goals.



                                              
                                                   Battle Stretch Goals
$18,000: Release The Solar Games: Battle by February 2014: If we hit this goal we will be able to release Battle earlier than expected.
$32,000: Early Battle Mode release: This funding level will allow us to be able to obtain our human resource needs and all of the software necessary to release The Solar Games: Battle in December 2013.
$37,000: 12 Additional Powerups + Helmet Content Pack: This funding level will allow for an additional 12 powerups and a 5 helmet content pack.
$39,000: 2 Additional Track Content Pack: This funding level will allow for 2 additional tracks in The Solar Games: Battle.
$49,500: Haiti Recording Session:  This funding level will allow us to take a production crew and one lucky winner to Haiti.  This session will allow us to produce our collaborative music session for the soundtrack to The Solar Games.
$59,500: New Vehicle Tier: This funding level will allow a second set of vehicles to be created for The Solar Games: Battle. This vehicle class may be a bike, trike, truck, or 2-wheeled futuristic big wheel thingy.
$69,500: Pink Slip Mode: This funding level will allow Pink Slip mode to be created. Pink slip mode allows for players to wager Carbon Points. The winner takes all and the loser has to earn back what they lost through gameplay.
$79,500: Stunt Mode: This funding level will allow players to have a stunt mode within battles. Players will be able to earn more Carbon Points or Solar Cash through performing various stunts while in battle.
$94,500: 5 Surreal Events: This funding level will allow us to add 5 surreal events to the game such as: tornados, hurricanes, dinosaurs, goats, acid rain and a variety of other options.
We have more stretch goals planned to create The Solar Games: Racing and we will reveal them as our funding level draws near.
                                            


The Solar Games: Racing is akin to Mario Kart meets Fallout. The game is set after an environmental apocalypse where the global landscape has become a surreal wasteland. Gameplay is fast and intense but with a dose of humor. Players will be able to race in multiple modes, including single player and multiplayer, across realistic tracks based on real world locations. The initial landscape is based on Haiti with more planned for the future.
The game will feature five classes of karts that players can race with and against: buggy, truck, trike, bike and a 2-wheeled futuristic big wheel thingy.

Real World Locations
The Solar Games: Racing is initially based on Jacmel, Haiti and surrounding areas. We have traveled to Haiti to film and document the look and feel of the landscape and culture. We are now turning this into gameplay experiences for a realistic and unique feel for the player. In the future, we hope to feature more locales such as China, Africa, and India.

Kart Customization and In-Game Currencies
Through the course of the game, players will earn Carbon Points that can be spent to upgrade all of the different parts of their kart: solar panels, motors, tires, frames, shells and batteries. Players can also purchase or occasionally earn Solar Cash which can be spent on the same kart upgrades to receive them faster, to purchase cosmetic upgrades to the kart and other exclusive in-game content. The purchase of Solar Cash will not create a pay-to-win atmosphere.
Each player will have an in-game garage that will hold all of their karts and parts that are not being used. The garage can be upgraded to store more karts and parts. Players will also be able to show off their garage to their in-game friends.

RACING MODES
The Solar Games: Racing will feature several different race modes. Players can race in traditional race modes such as circuit and time trial races. There will also be a unique Pink Slip mode, where players can put their karts or Carbon Points on the line and race in a single, very intense, winner takes all match. League and Alliance play will allow players to be put on to a global ladder and see where they stack up against the best in the world. There are also several other modes planned for the future such as Last Man Standing mode, Stunt mode, and Kitty Cat mode.




The majority of our perks are cumulative so you get every perk that comes before your designated funding level.  We strived to create the most value for your Perk, some directly support artists in Haiti as they're making our cool artisan rewards.  So go find one you like!  See our perk descriptions to the right and images at the bottom of our campaign page for more information.





































“It’s On” is a documentary web series that makes you part of the creation of The Solar Games. It is filmed and hosted by Cesar Munhoz and stars the entire Solar Games team. The short webisodes will premiere on our YouTube channel and website each Monday. Check out the Indiegogo teaser videos at 





Core Team
Bradley Bulifant: Executive ProducerSteve Brown: ProducerJacob Morris: Technical ProducerPhillip Mullennax: Marketing Wossenu Areda Weldekiros: International Development DirectorJessie Chin: Artist & Chinese Community ManagerTyler Edlen: 3D & Environmental ArtistChris Rodriquez: Graphic DesignerCesar Munhoz: Videographer & Creator of “It’s On” YouTube Series
Additional Team Members
Arielle Goldfarb: Concept ArtistBrian Russ: 3D ArtistChris Halterman: Sound AssetsChristine Lancaster: Sound AssetsDana Carlstrom: Artist & RepertoireDemetrios Panayi: Music LicensingJonathan Giffin: Sound AssetsJon Rivera: AnimatorKeith Caro: SEO & Music MarketingKyle Romanak: Film Production                                                                             Fernanda Salviano: EditorLuis Miranda: User Experience TesterMark Baculanta: 3D Vehicle ArtistNikko Laudicina: Sound Assets & MasteringOscar Araque: 3D ArtistPete Bingham: Special EffectsRyan Ryan Getsie: Music Marketing & JournalismZach Ahearn: 3D Artist

story:
The Circassian mobile game Clash of Sosruko is being made by a group of people from Nalchik and İstanbul. We have been trying to finance the game with our limited budget; we have already surpassed it and are still working on completing the game in two months. This game will be the first Circassian mobile game ever created. We will be very grateful if you assist us in our campaign and participate in our excitement.

 

Who We are ?

We are Circassian people from Nalchik and İstanbul. Some of us are Kabardey and some of us are in Besleney tribes. Our team consists of five people who are between the ages of 29 to 45 years old. We also receive support from freelancers all over the world for the animations and some character drawings.

This campaign budget will give us the chance to hire office personnel, open the company, and complete the missing parts of the game. We can also even more great animations if we reach our target budget.

This game will be a milestone for the Circassian people. It will be the start of the new age the Circassian culture must face to retain our Xabze and Bze. You, our supporters, will play a role in this mission.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $25,000 USD to complete some missing parts for the beginning of the game and to open the company. If we can pass this target, our dream is to open our company in the U.S. and go global.

We want to develop this game with more Nart characters and other elements of Circassian culture and market it worldwide. You can support us in two ways:

A) BUY a PACKAGE

Our game is FREE to .

We worked diligently to customize our game for Circassians. We will give you the opportunity to play the game with your family name and coat of arms, and you will be able to rename your village and select the main Circassian music to be used. 

1) Silver Package: We will search for your family coat of arms in our Circassian books and adapt it with the flag to in the game for $2.99 USD.

2) Gold Package: This includes the Silver Package along with your family name on the flag for $4.99 USD.

3) Platinum Package: This includes the Gold and Silver with the ability to rename your village in the main screen for $9.99 USD.

4) VIP Package: This includes all the above packages with the ability to select the main Circassian music for $19.99 USD.

B) BECOME A SPONSOR

If you want to support us even more and become known to the Circassian society, this is your place. We will declare our sponsors with a thankful message.

1) Silver Package: We will declare your name and put it on the sponsors list for one month for $99 USD.

2) Gold Package: We will declare your name and put it on the sponsors list for three months for $199 USD.

3) Platinum Package: This includes the Gold Package, and we will also announce your name with a special thanks in a pop-up screen to all players for one month for $499 USD.

4) VIP Package: This includes the Platinum Package, and we will also announce your name with a special thanks in a pop-up screen to all players for three months for $999 USD

Other Ways You Can Help

We would greatly appreciate your support through social media on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. You can also help us further develop the game if you have knowledge and experience working on mobile games.

https://www.instagram.com/clashofsosruko

https://twitter.com/clashofsosruko

https://www.facebook.com/Clashofsosruko

www.clashofsosruko.com

Herkese Merhaba . Üzerinde çalıştığımız Clash Of Sosruko oyunu  Çerkeslerin halk destanı Nart destanlarını esas alıp,  ana kahraman Sosruko'nun diğer toplumlarla savaşını ve Nart ülkesini koruma çabasını anlatan , hem apple hem diğer android tabanlı telefonlarda oynamanız için geliştirilmiş bir oyun projesidir. Bu oyun şimdiye kadar oluşturulan ilk Çerkes mobil oyunu olacaktır.  Oyuna destek olmanız ve desteğin bir parçası olmanız  için bu kampanyayı açtık. Kampanyamızda bize yardımcı olursanız ve heyecanımıza katılırsanız çok minnettar olacağız.


Biz Kimiz ?


Biz Nalçik ve İstanbullu Çerkesleriz. Bazılarımız Kabardey, bazılarımız Besleney olup ekibimiz, yaşları 29 ila 45 arasında değişen beş kişiden oluşmaktadır. Ayrıca tüm dünyadaki oyun dünyasından serbest çalışanlardan animasyonlar ve bazı karakter çizimlerini de para karşlığı satın alarak ta destek alıyoruz.

Bu kampanya bütçesi bize ,global anlamda pazarlama ve  oyunun Çerkes kültürüne uygun karakter ve animasyonları daha da iyi yapmamıza imkan tanıyacaktır.

Bu oyun Çerkes halkının teknoloji ile buluşarak kültürümüzü ve tarihimizi ileri nesillere anlatmak için mihenk taşı olacaktır. Çerkes kültürünün Xabze ve Bze'yi korumak için yüzleşmesi gereken yeni teknolojik dünya için , bir başlangıç olacaktır. Sizler, destekçilerimiz bu görevde rol oynayacaksınız.

Bu oyunu daha fazla Nart karakterleri ve Çerkes kültürünün diğer unsurlarıyla geliştirmek ve dünya çapında pazarlamak istiyoruz.

Bizi iki şekilde destekleyebilirsiniz:

A) PAKET ALIN


Oyunumuz ÜCRETSİZ olarak yayına alınacaktır.

Çerkeslere yönelik oyunumuzu kişiselleştirmek için özenle çalıştık. Size Sülale damganızla ve sülale adınızla  oyunu oynama şansını vereceğiz ; hatta köyünüzü yeniden adlandıracak ve oyun giriş ana ekranındaki  kullanılacak ana Çerkes müziğini dahi seçebileceksiniz.

1) Gümüş Paket: Oyunun ana ekraında ve savaş ekranlarında Çerkes aile damganız ile oynama hakkına sahip olacaksınız 2,99 ABD Doları karşılığında. (Eğer aile damganızı bilmiyorsanız ekibimiz elimizde olan Kitaplardan aile damganızı bulmakta yardımcı olacaktır.)

2) Altın Paket: Oyunun giriş ,Ana köy ekranındaki bayrakta ve tüm savaş ekranlarında , aile damgasının yanında ,sülale adınız da bayrakta yer  alacak yukarıdaki Gümüş pakete ek olarak 4,99 ABD Doları karşılığında.

3) Platin Paket: Oyunun giriş ,Ana köy ekranındaki köyün ismini seçme  hakkınız olacak yukarıdaki Altın pakete ek olarak 9,99 ABD Doları karşılığında.
4) VIP Paket: Oyunun giriş ,Ana köy ekranındaki Çerkes müziğini de seçme hakkınız olacak yukarıdaki Platin pakete ek olarak 19,99 ABD Doları karşılığında.

B) SPONSOR OLUN


Bizi daha da fazla desteklemek ve Çerkes toplumu tarafından tanınmak istiyorsanız, burası sizin yeriniz. Sponsorlarımızı müteşekkir bir mesajla ilan edeceğiz.

1) Gümüş Paket: Adınızı ilan edip sponsorlar listesine, bir aylığına 99 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz..

2) Altın Paket: Adınızı ilan edip sponsorlar listesine ,üç aylığına 199 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz..

3) Platin Paket: Bu Altın Paket'i de içerir ve adınıza oyun içi açılan bir pencerede özel bir teşekkürle açılır bir ekranda tüm oyunculara bir ay boyunca 499 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz.

4) VIP Paketi: Buna Platinum Paketi de dahildir ve adınıza oyun içi açılan bir  pencerede özel bir teşekkürü  tüm oyunculara üç ay boyunca 999 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz.

Yardım edebileceğiniz diğer yollar


Instagram, Facebook ve Twitter'daki sosyal hesaplarımızı takip edebilir, hesaplarınızda paylaşımlarımıza yer vererek tanıtım anlamında destek olabilirsiniz. Ayrıca, mobil oyunlarda çalışma bilginiz ve deneyiminiz varsa, oyunu daha da geliştirmemize yardımcı olabilirsiniz.

https://www.instagram.com/clashofsosruko

https://twitter.com/clashofsosruko

https://www.facebook.com/Clashofsosruko

www.clashofsosruko.com

Черкесская мобильная игра Clash of Sosruko создается группой молодых специалистов из Нальчика и Стамбула. Мы пытались
финансировать игру самостоятельно с нашим ограниченным бюджетом, и уже превысили его. Но мы все еще работаем над завершением
игры. Игра будет готова через два месяца. Эта игра станет первой мобильной игрой о черкесах, когда-либо созданной. Мы будем очень
благодарны, если вы поможете нам в нашей кампании и примете участие в реализации нашего проекта.


Кто мы ?


Мы черкесы из Нальчика и Стамбула. Кто-то из нас кабардинец, а кто-то из бесленейских племен. Наша команда состоит из пяти человек
в возрасте от 29 до 45 лет. Мы также получаем поддержку от фрилансеров по всему миру по части анимации и символов.
Этот бюджет кампании даст нам возможность нанять офисный персонал, открыть компанию и завершить недостающие части игры. Мы
также можем создать еще более замечательную графику и локации, и значительно улучшить анимацию, если мы достигнем нашего
целевого бюджета.
Эта игра станет вехой для черкесского народа. Это будет началом новой эпохи, с которой Черкесская культура должна столкнуться,
чтобы сохранить нашу культуру и язык. Вы, наши сторонники, сыграете свою роль в этой миссии.


Что нам нужно и что получите вы


Нам нужно $ 25,000 USD, чтобы завершить некоторые недостающие части для запуска игры и открыть компанию. Если мы сможем
добиться этой цели, мы реализуем свою мечту и откроем компанию в США, что поможет выйти на глобальный, мировой уровень.
В будущем мы хотим расширить вселенную игры, с добавлением большого количества персонажей нартского эпоса и других
элементов черкесской культуры и начать продажи игры по всему миру. Вы можете поддержать нас двумя способами:


А) Купить пакет


Нашу игру можно скачать бесплатно.
Мы усердно работали, чтобы настроить нашу игру именно для черкесов. Мы дадим вам возможность играть в игру с вашей фамилией и
тамгой, и вы сможете переименовать свою деревню и выбрать основную черкесскую музыкальную тему, которая будет звучать все время.


1) Серебряный пакет: Мы найдем ваш семейный герб в наших черкесских книгах архивах, и добавим его изображение на флаг в игре за
$2.99 USD.
2) Золотой пакет: включает в себя серебряный пакет вместе с вашей фамилией на флаге за $4.99 USD.
3) платиновый пакет: включает в себя золотые и серебряные пакеты с возможностью переименования вашей деревни на главном экране
за $9.99 USD.
4) VIP пакет: включает в себя все вышеперечисленные пакеты с возможностью выбора основной Черкесской музыки за $19.99 USD.


Б) СТАТЬ СПОНСОРОМ


Если вы хотите поддержать нас еще больше и стать известным Черкесскому обществу, это то, что вам нужно. Мы объявим наших
спонсоров с благодарственном обращении после запуска игры.
1) серебряный пакет: мы объявим ваше имя и внесем его в список спонсоров на один месяц за $99 USD.
2) золотой пакет: мы объявим ваше имя и внесем его в список спонсоров на 3 месяца за $199 USD.
3) платиновый пакет: включает в себя золотой пакет, и мы также объявим ваше имя с особой благодарностью во всплывающем окне для
всех игроков в течение одного месяца за $499 USD.
4) VIP пакет: включает в себя платиновый пакет, и мы также объявим ваше имя с особой благодарностью во всплывающем окне для всех
игроков в течение трех месяцев за $ 999 USD


Также вы можете помочь нам репостами и лайками. Мы в соцсетях: Instagram, Facebook и Twitter
Вы также можете помочь нам в дальнейшем развитии игры, если у вас есть знания и опыт работы над мобильными играми.

 

Адыгэ мобильнэ игра Clash of Sosruko зыщ1хэр адыгэ щ1алэ гуп Нальшыкрэ, Стамбулрэщыщу. Зэрытхузэф1эк1ымк1э ди сом, ди ахъшэ хэтлхъурэ  играр тщ1ащ, ауэ иджы а ахъшэхэтлъхьами дырикъукъым, ик1эм нэдгъэсын щхьэк1э. Дызыхуе ахъшэр зэхуэтхьэсмэмазитк1э дыухынущ играр. Мыпхуэдэ игра, адыгэ фольклорым теухуауэ иджыри къэс зымиищ1акъым. Ди  гуапэ1е хъунут фыкъытдэ1эпыкъуамэ. 

 

Дэ дыхэт?:

 

Дыадыгэщ, хэт Нальшык щыщ, хэт Стамбул щыщщ. Къэбэрдеи къытхэтщ, бесланеиикъытхэтщ. Дэ ц1ыхуитху дохъу. Абы нэмыщ1к1э флирансэр жыхуа1эхэр къыддо1эпыкъу, анимациям теухуауэ. 

 

Ахъшэр зэхуэтхьэсмэ фирма къытхуэзэ1ухынущ, лэжьак1уэ къытхуэщтэнущ, дызэрыхуемхуэду играр ик1эм тхунэгъэсынущ.  Нэхъ дахуу, нэхъ лъэщуи  тхуэщ1ыфынущ , ауэ ахъшэтхуримыкъур зэхуэтхьэсын хуещ.

 

Мы играм сэбэп 1эджэ и1энущ, ди хабзэр,  ди бзэр сабийхэми,  бзэр тэмэму зымыщ1эми, нэхъ къащ1эфынущ.

Дэ дызыхуемрэ, фэ фэттыфынумрэ:

 

Дэ 25,000 USD дыхуещ ди 1уэхур ик1эм нэсын щхьэк1э.  Ар зэхуэтхьэсыфмэ дэ дызэхъуапсэр тхуэзэф1эк1ынущ, Америкэм къызэ1утхыну компания. Абы къыщызэ1утхмэ, дуней псом ди играр къац1ыхунущ.

 

Ди 1уэхур ежьа нэужьк1э, дигугъэщ  играр нэхъ ин тщ1ыну, щып1э нэхъыбэ, Сосрыкъуэмнэмыщ1, адрей нартхэри къыхэдгъэхьэну ди мурадщ. Фэ фыкъызэрытд1эпыкъуфынур:

 

А) Играм и пакет функций къэфщэхуфыну

 

Дэ ди играр сом зыри евмыту тревгъэтхэфынущ

 

Хуабжьу делэжьащ играм адыгэхэм ф1эк1а нэгъуэщ1 зыри мыджэгуфын щхьа. Ди играм фыщыджэгук1э фи лъэпкъым и дамыгъэр фхухэгъэхъэнущ. Абы нэмыщ1к1э къуажэрифхузэхъуэк1ынущ,  уэрэд къеуэхэри игъусэу.  

 

1) Дыжьын пакет: Фи лъэпкъым и дамыгъэр къэдгъуэту тету фхуэтщ1ыфынущ. Ар  $2.99 USD иуасэнущ.

 

2) Дыщэ пакет: абы дыжьын пакетри хохьэр лъэпкъ дамыгъэр игъусэу. Ар  $4.99 USD иуасэщ.

 

3) Платинэ пакет: абы дыжьын пакетри, дыщэ пакетри хохьэр, ауэ иджыри къуажьэм и ц1эр фхузэтхъуэк1ыфынущ. Ар  $9.99 USD иуасэщ.

 

4) VIP пакет: абы мыдре пакетищри хохьэр, абы нэмыщ1к1э адыгэ уэрэд фызыхуер къеууфхуэтщ1ыфынущ. Ар  $19.99 USD иуасэщ.

Б) Спонсор фыхъуну

 

Ди спонсор фыхъуну фыхуемэ, адыгъэ лъэпъкым фыкъац1ыхуну фыхуемэ, дэ фи ц1эхэр играм къигъэлъагъуу тщ1ыфынущ.

 

1) Дыжьын пакет: мазэк1э фызэрыспонсорыр, фыкъызэрытдэ1эпыкъуар играмдекъигъэлъагъуу тщ1ыфынущ. Ар  $99 USD иуасэнущ.

2) золотой пакет: мы объявим ваше имя и внесем  его в список спонсоров на 3 месяца за$199 USD.

 

3) Дыщэ пакет: мазэк1э фызэрыспонсорыр, фыкъызэрытдэ1эпыкъуар  всплывающее окно жыхуа1амде   къигъэлъагъуу тщ1ыфынущ. Ар $499 USD иуасэнущ.

 

4) VIP пакет: мыбы дыщэ пакетыр хохьэр, абы нэмыщ1к1э мазищк1э фызэрыспонсорыр, фыкъызэрытдэ1эпыкъуар играмде къигъэлъагъуу тщ1ыфынущ. Ар  $ 999 USD иуасэнущ.

 

Абы нэмыщ1к1э  1еуэ ди гуапэ хъунут репост, лайк тхуэвгъуватэмэ Instagram, Facebook иTwitter соцсетьтхэм. Ари сэбэп тхуэхъунут. Ц1ыху нэхъыбэм къащ1эхук1э нэхъыф1щ.  Абы нэмыщ1к1э ди играр нэхъыф1 зэрытщ1ынумк1э фыкъытдэ1эпыкъуфынут , апхуэдэ1эщ1агъэ фи1эмэ.
story_txt:
The Circassian mobile game Clash of Sosruko is being made by a group of people from Nalchik and İstanbul. We have been trying to finance the game with our limited budget; we have already surpassed it and are still working on completing the game in two months. This game will be the first Circassian mobile game ever created. We will be very grateful if you assist us in our campaign and participate in our excitement.
 
Who We are ?
We are Circassian people from Nalchik and İstanbul. Some of us are Kabardey and some of us are in Besleney tribes. Our team consists of five people who are between the ages of 29 to 45 years old. We also receive support from freelancers all over the world for the animations and some character drawings.
This campaign budget will give us the chance to hire office personnel, open the company, and complete the missing parts of the game. We can also even more great animations if we reach our target budget.
This game will be a milestone for the Circassian people. It will be the start of the new age the Circassian culture must face to retain our Xabze and Bze. You, our supporters, will play a role in this mission.

What We Need & What You Get
We need $25,000 USD to complete some missing parts for the beginning of the game and to open the company. If we can pass this target, our dream is to open our company in the U.S. and go global.
We want to develop this game with more Nart characters and other elements of Circassian culture and market it worldwide. You can support us in two ways:

A) BUY a PACKAGE
Our game is FREE to .
We worked diligently to customize our game for Circassians. We will give you the opportunity to play the game with your family name and coat of arms, and you will be able to rename your village and select the main Circassian music to be used. 
1) Silver Package: We will search for your family coat of arms in our Circassian books and adapt it with the flag to in the game for $2.99 USD.
2) Gold Package: This includes the Silver Package along with your family name on the flag for $4.99 USD.
3) Platinum Package: This includes the Gold and Silver with the ability to rename your village in the main screen for $9.99 USD.
4) VIP Package: This includes all the above packages with the ability to select the main Circassian music for $19.99 USD.

B) BECOME A SPONSOR
If you want to support us even more and become known to the Circassian society, this is your place. We will declare our sponsors with a thankful message.
1) Silver Package: We will declare your name and put it on the sponsors list for one month for $99 USD.
2) Gold Package: We will declare your name and put it on the sponsors list for three months for $199 USD.
3) Platinum Package: This includes the Gold Package, and we will also announce your name with a special thanks in a pop-up screen to all players for one month for $499 USD.
4) VIP Package: This includes the Platinum Package, and we will also announce your name with a special thanks in a pop-up screen to all players for three months for $999 USD

Other Ways You Can Help
We would greatly appreciate your support through social media on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. You can also help us further develop the game if you have knowledge and experience working on mobile games.
https://www.instagram.com/clashofsosruko
https://twitter.com/clashofsosruko
https://www.facebook.com/Clashofsosruko
www.clashofsosruko.com
Herkese Merhaba . Üzerinde çalıştığımız Clash Of Sosruko oyunu  Çerkeslerin halk destanı Nart destanlarını esas alıp,  ana kahraman Sosruko'nun diğer toplumlarla savaşını ve Nart ülkesini koruma çabasını anlatan , hem apple hem diğer android tabanlı telefonlarda oynamanız için geliştirilmiş bir oyun projesidir. Bu oyun şimdiye kadar oluşturulan ilk Çerkes mobil oyunu olacaktır.  Oyuna destek olmanız ve desteğin bir parçası olmanız  için bu kampanyayı açtık. Kampanyamızda bize yardımcı olursanız ve heyecanımıza katılırsanız çok minnettar olacağız.

Biz Kimiz ?
Biz Nalçik ve İstanbullu Çerkesleriz. Bazılarımız Kabardey, bazılarımız Besleney olup ekibimiz, yaşları 29 ila 45 arasında değişen beş kişiden oluşmaktadır. Ayrıca tüm dünyadaki oyun dünyasından serbest çalışanlardan animasyonlar ve bazı karakter çizimlerini de para karşlığı satın alarak ta destek alıyoruz.
Bu kampanya bütçesi bize ,global anlamda pazarlama ve  oyunun Çerkes kültürüne uygun karakter ve animasyonları daha da iyi yapmamıza imkan tanıyacaktır.
Bu oyun Çerkes halkının teknoloji ile buluşarak kültürümüzü ve tarihimizi ileri nesillere anlatmak için mihenk taşı olacaktır. Çerkes kültürünün Xabze ve Bze'yi korumak için yüzleşmesi gereken yeni teknolojik dünya için , bir başlangıç olacaktır. Sizler, destekçilerimiz bu görevde rol oynayacaksınız.
Bu oyunu daha fazla Nart karakterleri ve Çerkes kültürünün diğer unsurlarıyla geliştirmek ve dünya çapında pazarlamak istiyoruz.
Bizi iki şekilde destekleyebilirsiniz:

A) PAKET ALIN
Oyunumuz ÜCRETSİZ olarak yayına alınacaktır.
Çerkeslere yönelik oyunumuzu kişiselleştirmek için özenle çalıştık. Size Sülale damganızla ve sülale adınızla  oyunu oynama şansını vereceğiz ; hatta köyünüzü yeniden adlandıracak ve oyun giriş ana ekranındaki  kullanılacak ana Çerkes müziğini dahi seçebileceksiniz.
1) Gümüş Paket: Oyunun ana ekraında ve savaş ekranlarında Çerkes aile damganız ile oynama hakkına sahip olacaksınız 2,99 ABD Doları karşılığında. (Eğer aile damganızı bilmiyorsanız ekibimiz elimizde olan Kitaplardan aile damganızı bulmakta yardımcı olacaktır.)
2) Altın Paket: Oyunun giriş ,Ana köy ekranındaki bayrakta ve tüm savaş ekranlarında , aile damgasının yanında ,sülale adınız da bayrakta yer  alacak yukarıdaki Gümüş pakete ek olarak 4,99 ABD Doları karşılığında.
3) Platin Paket: Oyunun giriş ,Ana köy ekranındaki köyün ismini seçme  hakkınız olacak yukarıdaki Altın pakete ek olarak 9,99 ABD Doları karşılığında.4) VIP Paket: Oyunun giriş ,Ana köy ekranındaki Çerkes müziğini de seçme hakkınız olacak yukarıdaki Platin pakete ek olarak 19,99 ABD Doları karşılığında.

B) SPONSOR OLUN
Bizi daha da fazla desteklemek ve Çerkes toplumu tarafından tanınmak istiyorsanız, burası sizin yeriniz. Sponsorlarımızı müteşekkir bir mesajla ilan edeceğiz.
1) Gümüş Paket: Adınızı ilan edip sponsorlar listesine, bir aylığına 99 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz..
2) Altın Paket: Adınızı ilan edip sponsorlar listesine ,üç aylığına 199 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz..
3) Platin Paket: Bu Altın Paket'i de içerir ve adınıza oyun içi açılan bir pencerede özel bir teşekkürle açılır bir ekranda tüm oyunculara bir ay boyunca 499 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz.
4) VIP Paketi: Buna Platinum Paketi de dahildir ve adınıza oyun içi açılan bir  pencerede özel bir teşekkürü  tüm oyunculara üç ay boyunca 999 ABD Doları karşılığında göstereceğiz.
Yardım edebileceğiniz diğer yollar
Instagram, Facebook ve Twitter'daki sosyal hesaplarımızı takip edebilir, hesaplarınızda paylaşımlarımıza yer vererek tanıtım anlamında destek olabilirsiniz. Ayrıca, mobil oyunlarda çalışma bilginiz ve deneyiminiz varsa, oyunu daha da geliştirmemize yardımcı olabilirsiniz.
https://www.instagram.com/clashofsosruko
https://twitter.com/clashofsosruko
https://www.facebook.com/Clashofsosruko
www.clashofsosruko.com
Черкесская мобильная игра Clash of Sosruko создается группой молодых специалистов из Нальчика и Стамбула. Мы пыталисьфинансировать игру самостоятельно с нашим ограниченным бюджетом, и уже превысили его. Но мы все еще работаем над завершениемигры. Игра будет готова через два месяца. Эта игра станет первой мобильной игрой о черкесах, когда-либо созданной. Мы будем оченьблагодарны, если вы поможете нам в нашей кампании и примете участие в реализации нашего проекта.

Кто мы ?
Мы черкесы из Нальчика и Стамбула. Кто-то из нас кабардинец, а кто-то из бесленейских племен. Наша команда состоит из пяти человекв возрасте от 29 до 45 лет. Мы также получаем поддержку от фрилансеров по всему миру по части анимации и символов.Этот бюджет кампании даст нам возможность нанять офисный персонал, открыть компанию и завершить недостающие части игры. Мытакже можем создать еще более замечательную графику и локации, и значительно улучшить анимацию, если мы достигнем нашегоцелевого бюджета.Эта игра станет вехой для черкесского народа. Это будет началом новой эпохи, с которой Черкесская культура должна столкнуться,чтобы сохранить нашу культуру и язык. Вы, наши сторонники, сыграете свою роль в этой миссии.

Что нам нужно и что получите вы
Нам нужно $ 25,000 USD, чтобы завершить некоторые недостающие части для запуска игры и открыть компанию. Если мы сможемдобиться этой цели, мы реализуем свою мечту и откроем компанию в США, что поможет выйти на глобальный, мировой уровень.В будущем мы хотим расширить вселенную игры, с добавлением большого количества персонажей нартского эпоса и другихэлементов черкесской культуры и начать продажи игры по всему миру. Вы можете поддержать нас двумя способами:

А) Купить пакет
Нашу игру можно скачать бесплатно.Мы усердно работали, чтобы настроить нашу игру именно для черкесов. Мы дадим вам возможность играть в игру с вашей фамилией итамгой, и вы сможете переименовать свою деревню и выбрать основную черкесскую музыкальную тему, которая будет звучать все время.
1) Серебряный пакет: Мы найдем ваш семейный герб в наших черкесских книгах архивах, и добавим его изображение на флаг в игре за$2.99 USD.2) Золотой пакет: включает в себя серебряный пакет вместе с вашей фамилией на флаге за $4.99 USD.3) платиновый пакет: включает в себя золотые и серебряные пакеты с возможностью переименования вашей деревни на главном экранеза $9.99 USD.4) VIP пакет: включает в себя все вышеперечисленные пакеты с возможностью выбора основной Черкесской музыки за $19.99 USD.

Б) СТАТЬ СПОНСОРОМ
Если вы хотите поддержать нас еще больше и стать известным Черкесскому обществу, это то, что вам нужно. Мы объявим нашихспонсоров с благодарственном обращении после запуска игры.1) серебряный пакет: мы объявим ваше имя и внесем его в список спонсоров на один месяц за $99 USD.2) золотой пакет: мы объявим ваше имя и внесем его в список спонсоров на 3 месяца за $199 USD.3) платиновый пакет: включает в себя золотой пакет, и мы также объявим ваше имя с особой благодарностью во всплывающем окне длявсех игроков в течение одного месяца за $499 USD.4) VIP пакет: включает в себя платиновый пакет, и мы также объявим ваше имя с особой благодарностью во всплывающем окне для всехигроков в течение трех месяцев за $ 999 USD
Также вы можете помочь нам репостами и лайками. Мы в соцсетях: Instagram, Facebook и TwitterВы также можете помочь нам в дальнейшем развитии игры, если у вас есть знания и опыт работы над мобильными играми.

Мы играм сэбэп 1эджэ и1энущ, ди хабзэр,  ди бзэр сабийхэми,  бзэр тэмэму зымыщ1эми, нэхъ къащ1эфынущ.

Дэ дызыхуемрэ, фэ фэттыфынумрэ:

Ди спонсор фыхъуну фыхуемэ, адыгъэ лъэпъкым фыкъац1ыхуну фыхуемэ, дэ фи ц1эхэр играм къигъэлъагъуу тщ1ыфынущ.

Абы нэмыщ1к1э  1еуэ ди гуапэ хъунут репост, лайк тхуэвгъуватэмэ Instagram, Facebook иTwitter соцсетьтхэм. Ари сэбэп тхуэхъунут. Ц1ыху нэхъыбэм къащ1эхук1э нэхъыф1щ.  Абы нэмыщ1к1э ди играр нэхъыф1 зэрытщ1ынумк1э фыкъытдэ1эпыкъуфынут , апхуэдэ1эщ1агъэ фи1эмэ.

story:
CAUTION: THIS IS A VERY-VERY-EARLY PREVIEW OF A GAME REMAINING AT LEAST ONE YEAR AWAY FROM EARLY ACCESS - IT'S ROUGH, IT CONTAINS SOME PLACEHOLDER ART, MOST PLACEHOLDER SOUNDS AND SOME UNFINISHED CODE!

 

Eyvalon is a 2.5D RPG-Fantasy Adventure with action-adventure style gameplay in a big world. You can fight, plant, craft, build, dungeons, make quests and exploring the big world in this game.  Language: English and German, later more are planned.

Eyvalon comes first to Windows. Ubuntu + Mac is in planning. Mobile: if the demand exists and I can convert it. Consoles: PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and Xbox One will follow when more than double the goal is reached. Even if the double goal is not reached, you can wait for this platforms with your support if you want!

Story

Eyvalon is a planet similar to the Earth in a far, far away galaxy. Science, technology, nature and magic are in harmony on the planet. The planet is much older than Earth and there is also a connection to Earth. It's the story of a Visitor from the Earth on Eyvalon who must help the planet and the people. Eyvalon was infest by a dark force. And in ancient scriptures it's written that only a person who does not come from Eyvalon can save the Planet and the Galaxy.

And here begins the story! A long story full of danger adventures, action and exploration in a strange galaxy! Play one of the existing characters or create your personal char. improve and equip your game character to fight against evil.

About the Game

What is different about Eyvalon, compared to similar games?

Well...
In Eyvalon you can find game elements
that you find individually in similar form in other games.

But here they are together in one game!

  • It's not only a Fantasy, MediEvil or a sci-fi game but everything.
  • You can fight with swords as well as shoot weapons, lasers or magic.
  • You are on planets as well as in spaceships or space stations.
  • There are also daily changing quests and events in the game.
  • Ingame and Steam achievements.
  • You can play existing characters or create your own in the character creation.
  • You can do Campaigns, Quests, Fight, Using Magic Spells, Improving and Equipping Character, Build, Plant, Trade, Farm, Harvest, Cleaning Dungeons, Legendary Items Rewards, Craft, Cook, Alchemy, Research, Explore, Own Houses in different Areas and equip them, Use Portals and much more ...

And if it's of interest, then comes later AddOns and/or sequels.

Why Indiegogo?

I had The story of Eyvalon already longer in the head. First I wanted to write a book about Eyvalon. But I have decided to make a game of it. Since I like "oldschool" games especially, the game is in retro-look (Zelda-like).

Unfortunately, it's not easy to find support for a single person that make a retro-game and I don't want to have compromise with a publisher. The great thing about Indiegogo is that I have direct contact with people, who like retro-games as much as me and who want to support me and my project. BTW. Eyvalon is not only a game. Eyvalon is also the name of my ONE-PERSON Indie-Game Studio which I would like to start after indiegogo.

Risks & Challenges

This is my first homemade game and also my first Indiegogo project. My highest goal is to publish a finished and hopefully bugs-free version of the game. Whether there is a delayed start date or a major change in the game, I will always inform and be transparent about what's next. But I will do my best so it doesn't get to that point to begin with! Eyvalon was 100% me until then, Now I bring you Early Backers in the development of the game and with you i will create something very special. As backer you can expect Weekly updates and exclusive information until the start.

story:
Hi, my name is Erin and I'm the Creative Director for the game Nevermind.  Nevermind is a PC biofeedback-enhanced exploration horror game in which you venture into the minds of trauma patients to discover the truth behind their horrific experiences.  It is also my Interactive Media Graduate Thesis project at the University of Southern California and a labor of love for a passionate team of engineers, programmers, actors, writers, filmmakers, composers, and designers.


About the Game

In Nevermind, you play as an employee of the Neurostalgia Institute who is tasked with uncovering the mysteries of trauma patients' memories that even their own minds have repressed.  The game places you in unsettling and, frankly, downright disturbing situations - like any good horror experience. The catch, however, is that you play it while wearing a GARMIN heart-rate sensor. The more scared you get, the harder the game becomes - and, conversely, as you calm down, the game will return to its easier default state. 

So, ultimately, you will have to learn how to recognize and manage your stress levels by playing Nevermind. That is....if you want to see what's behind that next door...

As a game designer and artist who has always had a flair for the macabre, Nevermind is - in many ways - a dream project for me. Not only does it give the team and I an opportunity to play with biofeedback, which is gearing up to be the next frontier in gaming, it also allows us to craft an experience that is both fun and personally rewarding.  By creating a narrative compelling enough that players would want to force themselves into dark and stressful scenarios to see "what's next," and requiring them to temper their subconscious anxiety response in order to do so successfully, Nevermind, in many ways, encourages "true bravery."


We think that's pretty neat!


Read more about the game at nevermindgame.com

Our Team

The Nevermind team is headed up by myself, Jesse Busch, and Konstantin Brazhnik, who are both producers on the project.  For the past several years, I have worked in the industry as an Artist and Game Designer. I recently had the privilege of being flown to the White House -- where the game our team produced, "Trainer," won two awards in a nation-wide competition initiated by First Lady Michelle Obama and sponsored by institutions such as the USDA, General Electric, and the IGDA.  Currently, I am finishing my MFA at the University of Southern California in the Interactive Media Division of the School of Cinematic Arts, set to graduate in May.

The rest of our team is an eclectic, talented mix of artists, engineers, a PhD electrical engineering candidate, a documentary filmmaker, a satellite engineer, actors, a film writer, and several film composers. The wide variety of expertise on our team enriches Nevermind's unique perspective and fosters a fresh and innovative take on the horror genre.

Read more about the team at nevermindgame.com/team

What We Need & What You Get

We want to bring you a game experience that is not only fun and engaging in its own right - but something that will help you (and many others) better manage stress on a moment-to-moment basis in every day life.  We want to release one full level of the game (about an hour's worth of gameplay) in Summer 2012. 

Your contribution will help us reach that goal by enabling us to add final art, music, sensor research/behavior, gameplay testing and refinement to the level.  $2000 will help us achieve the bare minimum of these goals.

If we raise $5000, we will be able to build a fully dynamic music system that adapts to your stress-level in real time.  Nothing like this has ever been done before, so we're really excited about it.  Derek Baird and Jeff Tinsley, the lead Nevermind Composers, are especially excited about designing a sound track that is entirely non-linear and unique for each player, but that plays seamlessly like a film score.
In return for your support, we are offering a slew of incentives ranging from pre-orders of downloadable versions of the game to personalized Creepy Letter drawings, in the style of my Creepy Numbers series, that I will make for every donor of $100, $250, or $500.  Check out a black and white one I did for our producer Konstantin on the left.  For a $250 or $500 donation, I'll watercolor it and even frame it before sending it to you.

Thank you all so much for the support!  We look forward to bringing this unique gaming experience to you this summer!

Erin and the Nevermind Team


NEVERMIND in the Press

  • LA Times
  • Independent Games Channel

Erin Reynolds in the Press
  • TRAINER on Apps for Healthy Kids
  • Brink.com

Erin and the Nevermind Team

story:
Risks & Challenges

We are hard at work making our Somnium Space VR world better every day! Updates are coming on a weekly basis and we listen to our community. Nevertheless as during any software development we might see slight delays in projected timeline. We try to mitigate risk by:

  • Growing our team very fast
  • Implementing key game mechanics first, in order to have baseline fundamental functionalities such as land ownership and builder tool ready first.
  • Making sure that our world is built optimized for all experiences from the very beginning such as Mobile VR, PC VR, Android apps etc to make sure smooth implementation later down the line.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use Indiegogo share tools!
