story:
Video und Inhalt dieses Artikels gibt es auch in deutscher Sprache auf www.starshipcorporation.com

Starship Corporation is a Realtime Strategy Game that contains 4 Elements:

  • Ship Design

  • Crew and AI Tactics

  • Ship Building

  • and Trade

The player is able to create the layout for Spaceships and Planetary Installations with multiple decks within the boundaries of existing fuselages. He can choose between (currently) 50 Room types in 6 categories . A completed Design can then be challenged by playing a series of missions to test the crews reaction to emergencies and the ships combat capabilities. The success of these missions determines the ships rating, important for a good price on the market or the ships performance in your own fleet.


 

Design Your Own Spaceship

Control every aspect of your ships layout on up to 5 decks and over 50 different Rooms in 6 Categories:


  • Bridge
  • Emergency Bridge
  • Engine Room
  • Computer Core
  • Power Relay
  • Armor

  • Generator Rooms
  • Airtank
  • Fueltank
  • Watertank
  • Shield Generator

  • Hangar Bay
  • Cargo Unit
  • Emergency Escape Vehicle

  • Corridor Segments 1-5
  • L-Section
  • T-Section
  • S-Sections
  • Cross-Sections
  • Lift
  • Stairway

  • Hypersleep Capsules and Living Quarters
    in 3 sizes for Pilots, Technicians, Medics
    and Marines

  • Life Support
  • Sickbay
  • Sickbay Extension
  • Galley

  • Armory
  • Cannon
  • Missile Bay
  • Missile Control

 

 

 

Hire the best pilots, technicians, soldiers and medics to run your ships, train them and the ships Artificial Intelligence for maximum performance during standard operation, emergencies or hostile encounters – Here are a few example missions:

  • Technical malfunctions:
    Fire, pressure drop, power or engine failure
  • Medical emergencies:
    Radiation or Alien infestation
  • Emergency Response and Damage Control:
    Collision with Asteroids or Magnetic Fields
  • Defense against Pirate Boarding Parties
  • Ship to Ship Combat
  • Boarding of enemy transport or battleships and many more…

The better your Ship Design and its AI perform during the training missions, the better their rating will get. A good rating sells at a good price, but also defines the outcome of emergencies encounters of ships in your own fleet, when travelling trough deep space.

 

Build your designs for your own fleet or for a number of clients with different requirents: Shuttles or small Cargo Ships, huge interstellar Transports and Tankers, Battleships of all Sizes, Cruise Ships, Mining Vessels, Mining Colonies, Terraformers, etc. Be the best producer at the lowest price and you will take over the market!

 
 

Buy or sell used (or captured) ships, set up trade routes or supply war parties. (preferably on both sides).

Become a powerful intergalactic corporation profiting from civil war and conflict between planets ruled by religious governments or prosper among the free societies in independent star systems, building gigantic ships with superior technology .

 

 

Be a member of the elite! By helping to finance this game you will get game content exclusively created for you. The Fuselages and Missions contributors will get are not included in the Core Game and are not available for sale later on.

 

How will the money be used?

 

Level 1: $6.000

This is a very ambitious project and I need your help to develop its full potential. The funding goal of  $6000 will be used to finish the Core Game, featuring:

  • The Ship Design with 3 different fuselage types
    (Shuttle, Cruiser and Cargoship)
  • The Shipyard
  • Crew Management and AI Development with
    - 5 Standard Operation Missions
    - 5 Emergency Response Missions
    - 5 Hostile Encounter Missions
    This part needs the most work!

The Core Game will only be available as a Single Player Offline Version!

 


If the game surpasses its official funding goal for the offline version, you will get even more:

Level 2: $16.000

If the game reaches this much interest, I can fulfill my dream and turn it into a online multiplayer game, taking the idea to the next level:

  • Encounter thousands of different designs created by other players every time you play
  • Players can sell their Designs, Ships or developed Ship AI in an online marketplace
  • You can send your own fleet to trade, raid or destroy competitors
  •  Permanent Terraforming and Mining Colonies can be built

Because I have not much experience with this, I have to hire a backend programmer to help me with that.

 

Level 3: $26.000

I will be able to implement a storyline inspired by Ayn Rand´s novel “Atlas Shrugged”, where your character rises to one of the most successful businessman in the galaxy, facing war, corruption and state power as the old world breaks apart and you slowly become aware of a new world far out in the galaxy…

The Story will be told in cutscenes like the teaser and played out in a lot of custom missions and additional game content.

 

 

  >$30.000

Anything beyond that number will enable me to create additional game content, not only fuselages,  missions, and room types but also new kind of units, more complex gameplay, a great soundtrack and tons of stuff I already have in mind and you guys will definitely come up with…
Also I could then consider hiring more help to finish all the above mentioned content much earlier!

 

Your Ideas:

I am sure you have tons of ideas for scenarios, room types ship types, units, and lots of stuff I havent thought of.  Please let me know and maybe you will find your idea in the game a little bit later…

Use the Starship Corporation Forum or the Feedback Form to post your suggestions. 

 

Background:

My career started off with 3D Animation for advertising, then Character Animation for the Game Company Jowood - Neighbours from Hell. I created the Lasertag game company “LazerCombat” www.lazercombat.com that is currently run by my brother Stefan. I had no programming experience prior to starting this project except a little scripting in Adobe Director and Flash, but I quickly learned to use the excellent tool GameMaker for my plans. I make this game because I am dying to play it – so you can be sure I will finish this project.

 

More Info:

The game isn´t done, but you can test the Alpha-Version very soon. Check regularly or follow me on Twitter to get the latest updates!

If you like to see more gameplay videos and video tutorials, screenshots and download the Alpha  – Please visit www.starshipcorporation.com or www.weylandindustries.de.

 

System Requirements:

The game will run on Windows PC. Temporary System Requirements are:

  • Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7
  • DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • Pentium or equivalent processor
  • DirectX 8-compatible sound card
  • 156MB of memory or greater
  • 1024x768 or greater screen resolution with 16-bit or 32-bit colors

Minimum System Requirements will be published, as soon as the first playable version is out and I get some feedback.

 

Help spread the word:

If you haven´t got the money at the moment, but still would like to help turn this game into reality, don´t worry – you can still help A LOT by sharing this content on Facebook and Twitter, or calling your friends in the middle of the night to tell them about this awesome game!

story:
UPDATE 3:

Have you ever noticed how they never explain how it it's possible that you see yourself in 3rd person games (unlike real life)?

Well, we will!


UPDATE 2:

Check out the list of features on our website: http://www.the-chosen-game.com/list-of-features.html

We will be continuously adding to the list as we decide which features to publish before the release of the game.


UPDATE:

Robert and I understand you as a passionate gamer would love to see this game become a major funding success, but at the same time you're worried about your investment. We get it because we've been there! This is why we will rush a refund to anyone who requests it in case this amazing project doesn't reach the bare mininum needed to continue production (that's 50,000$). Sounds fair? You bet it is!


Have you ever wished you could jump into a sci-fi movie and experience the breathtaking grandeur of the Universe? Or build and pilot your own Battle Cruiser and wage war against a race who use their power to oppress and control others? Or simply cruise among the stars and discover new planets and interesting races? Or build an economic empire centered around your base and control the fate of entire worlds with a simple push of a button? Well, "The Chosen" is the answer to all of them.

We want to create the most immersive gaming experience you have ever felt. From piloting your ship to walking on a newly discovered planet, you'll be able to do it all.

Explore the vast Universe at your own pace. Discover new systems and civilizations. Solve the mysteries of long forgotten places.

Forge alliances and wage war for the precious resources found among the stars.
Work with your friends to capture enemy ships, and use them to grow your fleet and become the dominant force in the galaxy.
Hone your skills in ground combat and diplomacy to evolve into the perfect version of yourself.
Help your friends and annihilate your enemies to spread your reputation.
Choose your path and shape the Galaxy as you see fit.

In one sentence:

If Eve Online and Fallout 3 were to have a game child, that would be "The Chosen".



We need your help to make this game a reality. We are raising funds here, and on our website, where we accept all major credit cards through PayPal.

Making a game like this will not be easy or cheap. We need a fair number of people working on it and they need to be paid. We will also need more advanced hardware and we will have to buy or rent (depending on the funds) servers. We will also need to buy modeling software (3DS Max and Maya) and powerful image editing software (Photoshop).

By using some pre-made models we can save a lot of time and put more money and effort into creating more complex animations and interactions between the player and the world. As a proof of concept, the above trailer was made with 90% pre-made models in one month by 2 people. So this method is proven to allow us to save time and money while, of course, making sure that the quality does not suffer.

The number of missions that will be included in the release of the game will only depend on the funds we raise. The more funds the more missions we can write and code.

The funds we receive will determine the number of people that will work on the game and that will set the release date. The more people we have, the faster we can release it.

Robert and I understand you as a passionate gamer would love to see this game become a major funding success, but at the same time you're worried about your investment. We get it because we've been there! This is why we will rush a full refund to anyone who requests it in case this amazing project doesn't reach the bare mininum needed to continue production (that's 50,000$). Sounds fair? You bet it is!

This game is based on choices. Each Chosen can decided to either be a lone wolf or work with other to achieve goals faster.

Once a group of players has decided to form a crew they have to build a base of operations. If the planet they decided to make their home-world has space ports, they will have the option to rent a hangar and build their ships and store the resources there. Each base (if built) will be fully customize-able.

The player or group will have to gather resources, materials and perform the necessary research to build their first armors, weapons and ships. This can be achieved in a number of ways: gather the resources yourself or with the help of your crew, steal them from others or earn them in missions. They must also make sure that their base is protected while out on missions, or gathering resources, by upgrading the AI and the security systems.


Each ship is built in stages.

1. Choose the ship type/hull. In each class, each race will have a few different options each with it's own advantages and disadvantages (go to http://www.the-chosen-game.com/ships.html for more information on each class): 

  • Scout Ships (can have only 1 pilot)

  • Frigates (max 5 crew)

  • Cruisers (max 10 crew)

  • Heavy  Cruisers (max 12 crew)

  • Battle Cruisers (max 15 crew)

  • Dreadnoughts(max 15 crew)

  • Capital Ships (max 60 crew).

  • Cargo Ships (can have only 1 pilot)
  • Mining Ships (max 5 crew)
  • Carriers (max 40 crew)

Because of the massive size and weight of the Carriers and Capital Ships they will have to be built in space which means renting a hangar on a space station. They can have fighters bays (need to be built). But the fighters need pilots. The fighters need to be build separately on the ships by consuming resources, and are customizable  by each pilot, who claims a fighter for him/herself. Because of the large number of crew required for the last 2, they will be rare, but when they do appear they will be able to turn the tide in any battle, so watch out!

NOTE: A ships crew does not have to be permanent. If the crew built the ship with combined resources when the group disbands the ship will be broken apart and each person gets back 90% of the resource he/she invested. Alternatively one or more person can choose to buy the others out of the ship when disbanding the crew and keep the ship intact. If the ship was built by a single person then that person retains control of the ship.

To assist in ground combat Capital Ships can be equipped with Mech Bays. Once built, the Mechs can be dropped on planets in certain situations to give the team a better chance of success.

2. Build the interior. The Commander will be free to put each module wherever he/se wants, but the ships performance will depend on the strategic placement of the modules and the placement of the items inside each module. For example: if the engines are in the back of the ship, but the power source is all the way in the front, the ship will not reach maximum speed as the engines are not getting enough power fast enough. Each major module will be upgrade-able provided the necessary research is done.

3. Once every necessary module has been placed the Commander will be free to decide the  position of the shield emitters. The number and strength of the emitters will be determined by available power.

4. After each step has been completed all that remains is to install the AI give it a name and launch the ship.

Each ship (aside from the Scout and Cargo Carrier) can have a full crew compliment: Commander, Pilot, Science Officer, Engineer, Tactical Officer, but each ship can still be used by a single person by building drones and giving the AI control over them to perform the tasks of the missing crew. But due to the limitation of the AIs the drones can only achieve a 60% efficiency in doing the required jobs.

Once the ship is built each player has to perform a task while on the ship:

  • Captain: gives out the orders and makes the tactical decisions. Must also take into consideration the recommendations of the crew. The captain is chosen by vote.
  • Engineer: must keep the ship operational, and makes repairs during battle to the ship and the crew armors. Can make modifications to the ship while docked at an appropriate port.
  • Science Officer: can research new technologies in ship lab (if built), can build translators for crew and adapt them to new languages. Without the translators players from different species can't communicate. 
  • Tactical Officer: in charge of the ships weapon systems.
  • Pilot: flies the ship. Logical I think.
  • Fighter Pilot: only on carriers and capital ships.

Every person (and group) is free to decide what they want to do with their new ship. Do they want to be bandits and cause grief to others? Or maybe they want to join the Peace Keepers and stop pirates for cash rewards. Or maybe take up mining, a relatively safe and lucrative job. Maybe exploring new worlds and lost stations looking for new technologies is more your pace? Or maybe you just want to cruise the stars...

You are free to choose your own path in the game and they are not mutually exclusive.


The final version of the game will feature 6 playable races:

  • Human
  • Aleos
  • Krey
  • Arachnids
  • Lur'eyan
  • Rok

For a detailed description of each race go to: http://www.the-chosen-game.com/races.html


We want to make this game as realistic as possible. So one of the main features will be the ability to walk around in your ship at any time you choose. Just get up from your console and explore your ship. Add new modules and rooms, upgrade and repair systems. Talk to the AI and get more information about the paces you visited or want to visit.



You will be able to write a public log once a week and share your experiences with the other pilots. Tell them about exciting new worlds you found or warn them about the dangers you encountered in your travels.



If we reach our goal of 1,500,000$ we will add weekly news to the game. In the news broadcast you will be given information about new discoveries and possible mission opportunities, and players will have the opportunity to join the news team and submit stories and videos on major events.


Enhance your character with biological and mechanical augmentations. For example: install cybernetic arms to enhance melee damage, or use gene therapy to expand your mind and enhance your research speed.



When making contact with a people for the first time you have a choice:

1. Befriend the population for various bonuses and/or upgrades - the player must in turn swear to protect the planet in case it is attacked, failing to do so will end any agreement with the planet.

2. Enslave the population. This gives the bonuses, but there is a high risk of revolutions and sabotage to the players ship/s.
3. Remain neutral. No commitment is made and the player will be free to trade with the planet.

Travel through the Nexus and discover new systems. Choose whether or not to reveal the coordinates of these systems to other commanders.



The economy of the Galaxy will be driven by player supply and demand. You will be able to sell anything form a single Stim to an entire Capital Ship.



~LORE~

There will be pages upon pages of lore in the game pertaining to the history of the planets and the different races. But, this information will not be "pushed" on the player like in most other games. The player will decided whether or not they wish to explore and discover this information by themselves.


~FLEET~

Make peace with other groups and form massive fleets to engage and defeat your enemies.


~ADVANCED TACTICS~

Ships with a full crew, including support crew, will be able to send boarding parties to enemy ships and either take them over or destroy them from the inside.


~KEEPING THINGS INTERESTING~

At random times, just like in life, unexpected things will happen and you will have to decide how to deal with each new situation. For example: meteor showers, pirates, supernovas, nebulae that have different effects on ships, ancient security systems, shifting gravity fields, attacks on ground convoys, etc. These events will test your skills and your cunning.


~MORE TO COME~

These are only a fraction of the features we have planned for this game. We are adding more and more to the list each day and we will also be accepting submissions for new feature ideas once we are funded.


~RISKS AND CHALLENGES~

The task that we have taken upon ourselves is daunting, so it will take some doing. We are aiming for the best gaming experience we can possibly deliver, and that will depend on the level of funding reached. But no matter what, we will strive to create a game worthy of the trust you have placed in us. Even with the extremely limited budget (less than $1000) and man-power available to us now, we managed to create a cinematic trailer, some concept art and a short demo of the game-play. But this idea can become a truly epic game only with your help and support.

Together we can bring the universe of The Chosen to life.


Worst case: if we don't reach our funding goal, all the money we do raise will be used to finish the demo, and make as much of the actual game as possible.


~Rewards~

BASIC PACK

You will receive our eternal thanks, plus 30 days of free gameplay and 3,000 in-game credits ($ 30 value)


STARTER PACK

You will receive the perks from the Basic Pack, plus 12,000 in-game credits ($120 value) and a 10 day x2 research and construction boos once the game is out of Beta.


EARLY ALPHA PACK

You will receive all the perks from the Basic and Starter Packs, plus the first 50 contributors will receive special Alpha access to the game giving you the chance to directly influence the gameplay.


FOUNDER PACK

You will receive all the perks from the Basic, Starter and Early Alpha Packs, plus the opportunity to submit a ship design to be integrated into the game and have a system named after you, plus 20,000 in-game credits  ($200 value), plus a 30 day x2 research and construction boost once the game is out of Beta (stacks with previous perks).


VIP FOUNDER PACK

You will receive all previous perks, plus you will be credited in the game as a founder and you will be able to choose one ship featured in the trailer and receive it as a scaled 3D printed model (models available for first 3 Donations), plus 20,000 in-game credits ($200 value), plus 3 months of free gameplay after the game is out of Beta, plus learn the secret to a devastating weapon that can save your ship and your crew in times of peril.


EPIC FOUNDER PACK

You will receive all previous perks, plus you will get to work with our concept artist and design a ship which will be made for you and you only.


LEGENDARY FOUNDER PACK

All of the previous perks plus you will be immortalized in the game by becoming the founder of one of the largest corporations in the galaxy. We will model your likeness into the game to be the face of the corporation (first 6 contributors from here and Indiegogo combined). You will also receive a fully equipped and battle ready Dreadnought complete with upgraded AI and drones.
Plus we will fly you out for a weekend with the developers at a 4 star hotel (first 3 contributors from here and Indiegogo combined)


If you can't donate:

If you like our concept but can't donate there are other ways you can contribute:

  • Contribute on our website if you are having problems on Indiegogo. We accept any major credit cards through PayPal.
  • Spread the word: Tell all your friends about the game. Post about us on your blogs and forums. We can only succeed with your help. (Our Links)
  • Like our Facebook page, and post about us on your wall.
  • Follow us on Twitter.


Thank you for taking the time to read this and we hope to see you all in The Chosen Universe!


If you have any questions please feel free to contact us via the Contact-us form on our website or email us at: info@the-chosen-game.com

story:
A Little About Me

  Hi there, my name is Aaron Armando, the creator of Clanicards. I am a card game enthusiast from Indonesia. So after a year of playing card games, I decided to create my very own card game. So BAM!!! Clanicards is born! This is the first game I have designed, and I'm looking forward to see how this project will end like.

  This game has been completely designed and tested, and so far, we've had pretty good feedbacks on it. But since I'm just a 15 year old kid, I will need financial help to print ._. That's why I need your help! With your help, we will be able to print the cards and have better designers design the cards! (because I'm so tired of designing the cards one by one alone T_T) So take a little look to the card game I have created! And I hope that together we will bring Clanicards to life!

Thank you for reading!

What’s a Clanicard?

  Clanicards is a trading card game that I created after a year of playing card games. The game has been play tested and has been designed as well. The rules of the game are pretty simple, and will be explained by the video below.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrFIBaPJsvQ


What I've done so far...

   So far, I have finnished designing a starter deck for the game: "Ragnarok Rising" which includes 36 files, 4 folder makers, and 1 folder clanimal. I am also on the process of finnishing a second starter deck for the game and creating more archetypes to play with. I am also looking for good designers to help me out with this campaign, and I'm trying to make my own website for the game.

Rewards

   Perks can be seen below. However, shipping prices are not included there. Shipping cost will be calculated and charged saperately depending on destination adress. Shipping payments must be done saperately. For information on shipping prices, you may contact me through my email: gaaronah@gmail.com.

Questions?

 You can always contact me through my email: gaaronah@gmail.com, my Line: aaronjbm, or my blackberry pin: 767E8D6A.

story:
Short Summary

www.LegendsofPersia.com

Victoria, Australia : independent games developer ‘Sourena Game Studio’ is proud to announce the impending release of ‘Legends Of Persia’ to the PC. Scheduled for release in March of 2014, the game is a highly ambitious Action RPG Adventure in style of diablo™ incorporating bloody battles, item usage, character building, and storyline incorporation. The storyline revolves around Keykhosro, the son of the Persian prince Siavosh, who in the name of his father’s blood seeks to take revenge upon Afrasiab, the king of Tooran. Throughout the game, the character will face difficult challenges to overcome, such as defeating massive waves of enemies, encountering difficult bosses, and finally dealing with Afriasiab, his father’s killer.

Legends of Persia is one of Top 5 Best Upcoming Indie Game of 2013 now

we need your votes, Whether or not you support us please take a minute and review our green light page, if you like it, please vote and comment.

Legends of Persia on Steam Green Light



Featuring more than 8 hours of single-player action in addition to 5 attractive locations and more than 200 weapons and items to use, ‘Legends Of Persia’ is packed full of features! The game will also include many unique types of magic for each class,3 different hero characters, fully customizable, and lots of unique challenging enemies. Already a thriving and popular game on Steam Greenlight, prepare to get blown away with the addictive gameplay and fantastic graphics! 

Customize to your heart’s content with a multitude of choices in armors, swords, spells, ranged weapons and more. 
Charge into combat in beautifully crafted fantasy environments that silhouette the action. 
Read your opponent and try to psych them out in tactical blade duelling. 
Wield spells such as fireball, freeze and invisibility that will fit tightly in tandem with your strengths in swordsmanship. 



Key Features: 
• Wide Range of Magic spells and abilities to use 
• Thousands of items 
• A deep crafting system 
• Menacing boss battles 
• Procedurally generated items 
• Hunting and survival mechanics 
• 3 characters to choose from. 
• Experience the dramatic events between seasons through a brand new original story! 
• Unlockable character classes that each play differently! 
• Many powerful spells to cast for each class. 
• Built from the ground up to support modding 
• Ongoing free updates 
• Many expansions available post-release. 
• Detailed, interactive tutorial. 

Story : 
KayKavoos, the imaginative Persian king, who had under his reign half of the lands of his age, thought about conquering sky to heaven after his legendary achievements. 
He mounted his sky chariot carried by four powerful birds and set foot in the sky. 
But there was the powerful sky angel stopping his imaginations and ruling desire. 
It was when the angel was but a step away of defeating King Kavoos that the glowing spirit of a child appeared in front of him. “I am KayKhosrow.” Whispered the child. “Son of Siavoosh, Son of Kavoos! If you now destroy this man due to his many sins, you have destroyed my father and robbed of my future existence!” 
Thought the angel for a glance, then by just a touch, threw the chariot of rebellious king to earth where he first came from. 
“And I have not the order to destroy your ancestor hence returned him alive to his land but you will have much burden to carry! In place of him that has long imaginations and your father that will die of Afrasiyab’s cruelty…” told the angel to spirit of KayKhosrow and embraced him and whispered “When you set foot in the world, big battles will happen between your ancestors and you will end cruelties of the time. When that time has come, evil forces will attack borders of Persia and will come the time of vengeance for your people. Now, rest at peace for your time is yet to come…” 


And whole game is creating with our own tools and engine.

We called it Simorgh 3D world editor


http://simorgh.sourenagames.com

Goal:

Our main goal is to raise $5,000. We have a busy and ambitious production schedule for 2014 and your contributions will help us bring this game to life.


Other Ways You Can Help

Promo Materials :

All Supporters of our funding campaign will be rewarded with Exclusive promo material. These are limited promos, never to be sold elsewhere. By pre-ordering the game through this campaign you will receive 3 exclusive special Posters. 

And please share our funding campaign.

Developer Website

www.sourenagames.com

Game Website

Steam GreenLight

www.legendsofpersia.com

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=200232540

Indiedb

www.indiedb.com/games/legends-of-persia

YouTube™ Channel

www.youtube.com/channel/UCbSv0MdD5bdNSzkTWXGj6VQ

Tumblr

http://legendsofpersia.tumblr.com/

Facebook

www.facebook.com/pages/Legends-of-persia/144652255734209?ref=hl

Twitter

https://twitter.com/Mehdiasl

Risks and challenges

Now, that we are approaching to the last phase of our game's development, we are trying very hard to localize Legend of Persia into FIGS to support non-English speaking fans. Therefore finding the right talent to translate and voice-act the game's English scripts into meaningful, fun, yet epic in FIGS could be challenging. And that is where we could definitely benefit from your kind support. 


Why help?

Your kind contributions will go toward helping our indie team to produce quality game mechanics, stunning visuals, and better implement our creative ideas to bring you a fun game. Your support help us improve Legend of Persia to be the game that you want to play. And of course you are part of this great journey, if you want to; so even the smallest support gets us one step closer to create an unforgettable experience for you in Legend of Persia. 


Should you have any comments or questions, feel free to contact us at info@sourenagames.com or visit our website at www.sourenagames.com

                                                 

                                           © 2014 Sourena Game Studio. All rights reserved.

story:
What, When, Where,Why.

What: Texas Hold'em Poker Tournament

When: Friday September 25th 2015- 6:00pm arrival, check-in, get your chips, 6:30 game starts...

Where: Cleveland Racquet Club 29825 Chagrin Blvd, Pepper Pike, OH 44124...

Why: Have Fun, Play, Socialize,  Eat, Drink, BEAT CANCER, Win...

PeopleBeatingCancer- research and support Cancer Patients, Survivors and Caregivers. 

 PBC Texas Hold'em Tourney-Dinner, Beer, Poker, Win, AND support cancer patients, survivors and caregivers. Friday September 25th 2015-

Donate Now to secure your chips for the Tournament. 

Half of each donation goes to the top six winners and half goes to support cancer patients, survivors and caregivers.

  • $50 Donation re-buy- $1500 in chips-nothing more, nothing less
  • $60 Donation to eat, drink beer and spectate at the Tournament-
  • $100 Donation to eat, drink beer and get $3000 in chips (not real money...)
  • $150 Donation to eat, drink beer, get $3000 in chips PLUS one re-buy of $1500 (not real money...)
Mixed drinks and wine are available from the CRC bar. 

The Ultimate Win-Win.

PBC holds several fundraisers each year. 20 donors to the Spring fundraiser last May have already donated and have secured their chips. We are about halfway there!

40 or so of you will play. The top six will be "in the money!"

Your donation to the Texas Hold'em Tourney gets you food, beer and a great time. If you are one of the final six players...

Prizes: Estimate based on 40 players ($40 x 40) = $1,600

Estimated additional chip money (Re-buys) ($25 x 36) = $ 900

Total pot based on above example $2,500

First Place $1000 (40%)

Second $ 500 (20%)

Third $ 375 (15%)

Fourth $ 250 (10%)

Fifth $ 200 ( 8%)

Sixth $ 175 ( 7%)

story:
MK1881 is a high quality line of miniatures by Maki Games mainly suitable for fantasy football games, collectors and painters. Our miniature line offers innovative design and very high quality casts. Our team is composed of many talented artists all with several years of experience in their respective fields that range from design, to classic and 3D sculpting and painting. Thanks to Indiegogo and our previous backers we have already successfully developed two different teams of fantasy football miniatures.

MK1881 was launched in September 2013 and is a branch of Maki Games

To stay in touch with the latestet updates follow us on our FB pages:
www.facebook.com/mk1881
www.facebook.com/Maki-Games

At MK1881 we have done extensive researches and tests to produce only very high quality miniatures. We have already covered the costs for designing, sculpting and 3d printing these miniatures. These are highly expensive processes. We need your help to complete the production phase of this project and release a new team in our catalogue. Your contribution will speed up the molding and casting process and allow us to release these new miniatures in the market.

We use the best professional 3d printers to create the master models. We combine the best casting techniques with the use of top quality materials to make sure each miniature in our line is of the highest quality.

All miniatures are cast with lead free white metal to comply with the new European laws.



Reaching the goal to start the production is not the end of this project. In fact we have some stretchgoals that will boost this campaign if the funding goes above our initial goal. Some freebies and Indiegogo exclusive add-ons are ready to be unlocked!

We learned from the unexpected issues of our previous Indiegogo project and this time we have already taken care of the main causes of delay. All the 3d models have already been finalized and 3d printed. We are now working on the first master mold to show you the metal casts during the Indiegogo campaign.
Many can testify that any models we have worked in the past have always been top quality casts, and we have produced hundreds of models for other companies in the past. At this stage the only challenge is to ship all the items according to the planned schedule and to unlock enough stretch goals to create the special characters for this team.
"Last campaigns had a significant delay that was solved. The issue was the delay in delivery of the 3D printer from the factory which took several months more then we where initially told. This issue will not occur again in this campaign as we now have the 3D printer in house and full control of the 3d printing process. All models have been already 3d printed and we are now preparing the molds. "

As before we have partnered with FFfields, a company specialized in custom fantasy football fields. The Ares Demons field will be made available for purchase during the campaign. Note that for this project the fields and miniatures will be shipped separately. Fields will be sent directly from FFfields, so that the production of one item will not slow down the delivery of the other.

The Ares Demon field is a stretchgoal that will be unlocked during the campaign


- All the models will be cast using very high quality lead free white metal.
- Models will be provided un-assembled and unpainted.
- These are not toys! They are collectible models and as such are not intended for kids below 14yrs old due to small parts, 
- Each model will come with a matching 25mm round plastic base.

To better understand the actual size of the miniatures here are other comparison pictures for you:



FF Fields will be making a special field for the Ares in a version that will be only available during the Indiegogo. A one time offer just for this campaign....

The fields and graphics are done by FF Fields. If you are looking for help to make the graphics of your campaign contact FF Fields they can deliver some amazing work as you can see above.

More info here: http://www.ff-fields.com/

story:
Black Tower Enigma is a retro style riddle/puzzle fantasy adventure being developed for Mac, PC, iOs and Android, here you play as Wigo, the orc, whose wife has been kidnapped and taken up to the skies by a magic dress gifted by a mysterious fairy.

As Wigo saw his wife going up to the skies he went to the tallest building known in the continent: The Black Tower Enigma.

Inside the Black Tower Enigma Wigo has to solve some riddles and challenges in order to climb up and find some clues to find his wife.

Black Tower Enigma was made with the intention to create a retro style game that allows the player to have fun in both the short and long run at the same time that is being wrapped in an atmosphere of fantasy and adventure.

Each level is a small but elaborated challenge that will make the player use its intelligence and the ability to decipher the riddles in order to advance through the tower.

Also, Black Tower Enigma has an interesting background story which is enriched inside the huge library that is scattered in each level of the tower.

An orc was chosen as the main character of the story because it breaks the paradigm of human heroes, besides is a very important element in the story.

Wigo has a big mission in this story...

The Black Tower Enigma is a huge and mysterious building, also full of secrets, in each room Wigo will find a lot of objects to interact and that may help or hinder solving the riddles.

      

      

      

Also, in each room Wigo will explore a part of the enormous library inside the tower and will find books whose contents will enrich the story and give information of great importance.

There are four different types of books, each with different content:

Wigo can read fragments of each and every one of the books in each level of the Black Tower Enigma.

Finally and for the basic game edition there will be a Book System where all the fragments of the books can be read and also be collected.

Without further ado you can try Black Tower Enigma: there is a demo to play, here are different ways to try it:

 PLAY DEMO OLINE

 DOWNLOAD ANDROID DEMO


My name is Steve Duran and this is my first real game for Mac, PC, iOs and Android, I am who created all the elements which surround this adventure (except for the music and concept art).

Ogre Pixel is the name of my one-man indie game developer studio located in Aguascalientes, México.

The work so far of Black Tower Enigma was made all with free software and during free time I had during the last 3 months.

As all the work except for music and concept art was done by myself, the money of the first goal is basically for publishing licenses and a symbolic financial compensation for artists.

The following Stretch-Goals, if reached, would allow letting certain activities aside and work full time for the making of Black Tower Enigma and make it a more robust and complete experience.

Achieve this campaign and know that there are people who support this project would be for me a great achievement both personally and professionally.

Help me to make this happen, thanks, in advance.


For this campaign of Black Tower Enigma there is a varied list of very interesting rewards:

*Each tier except for the special ones accumulate previous tier awards.

If you back $1 dollar you can get the Black Tower Enigma game.

This reward includes:

  • Black Tower Enigma Game (Mac, PC, iOs or Android).

And of course my eternal gratitude for making this happen.

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $3 dls you can get, additionally, the text content of Black Tower Enigma.

This reward includes:

ALL PREVIOUS TIERS REWARDS +:

  • Game walkthrough digital booklet (text format, PDF).
  • Game story digital booklet (PDF).
  • All in-game book contents digital booklet (PDF).

Get all the text content of the Black Tower Enigma!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $7 dls you can get, additionally, the music of Black Tower Enigma.

This reward includes:

ALL PREVIOUS TIERS REWARDS +:

  • Original soundtrack of Black Tower Enigma (digital format).

Get the full original soundtrack!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $10 dls you can get, additionally, the art of Black Tower Enigma.

This reward includes:

ALL PREVIOUS TIERS REWARDS +:

  • Concept art digital booklet (PDF).

Get a copy of the original artwork!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $20 dls you can get, additionally, the music sheets of the music of Black Tower Enigma.

This reward includes:

ALL PREVIOUS TIERS REWARDS +:

  • Music sheets of all the original soundtrack songs (PDF).

Get a copy of the music sheets that gave life to the OST!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $30 dls you can get, additionally, the illustrated walkthrough of Black Tower Enigma.

This reward includes:

ALL PREVIOUS TIERS REWARDS +:

  • Illustrated game walkthrough (PDF).

Get the illustrated game walkthrough and complete all the challenges!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $40 dls you can get, additionally, an in game credit mention in Black Tower Enigma.

This special reward includes:

ORC TIER REWARDS +:

  • In game ending credits mention as "special backers".

If you ever wanted to appear in a real game credits, this is your chance!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $100 dls you can get, additionally, the opportunity to design a full level of Black Tower Enigma.

This special reward includes:

ORC TIER REWARDS +:

  • Hidden level design to include in game releases.
  • In game ending credits mention as "hidden level designers".

If you ever wanted to participate and design a real game level, this is your chance!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


If you back $200 dls you can get, additionally, the opportunity to design a helping character of Black Tower Enigma.

This special reward includes:

ORC TIER REWARDS +:

  • Special in-game character design.
  • In game ending credits mention as "special character designer".

If you ever wanted to participate and design a real game NPC character, this is your chance!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014 *


*Estimated delivery date for rewards depends on stretch-goals achieved estimated delivery dates.


At this moment there are just 2 stretch goals, the first one (Basic Version) is for the funding of this campaign.

This is what Black Tower Enigma would include if this campaign is funded:

  • 17 standard levels.
  • Plus 5 hidden levels (backer designed).
  • Plus 1 special backer level.
  • Book texts collection system.

This version has a total of 23 levels, 5 of them would be designed for the WIZARD TIER backers and also there would be, additional, 1 level specially designed for the game version given through this campaign.

All backers will be able to receive this version of Black Tower Enigma!

Estimated delivery date: August 2014


This is what Black Tower Enigma would include if this campaign reaches $1500 dls

BASIC VERSION +:

  • New Achievement system
  • 10 additional standard levels
  • Plus 10 hidden levels (backer designed)
  • Plus 1 special backer level
  • More Book texts

This version would be definitely an improved version of the Black Tower Enigma, giving a total of 44 levels full of texts, full of items and special details.

Also there would be available a full Achievement System which would let you replay levels in order to fulfill your Achievements Table.

If this goal is reached, all backers will be able to receive this version of Black Tower Enigma.

Estimated delivery date: September 2014


With the money for publishing and working full time on Black Tower Enigma, the only risk to fulfill the goals is the time.

As the core play and the story of the game are practically done, then the main challenge ahead is the time for level design and enrich the story with additional elements and features.

paradigm of human heroes, besides is a very important element in the story.
Wigo has a big mission in this
story...The
Black Tower Enigma is a huge and mysterious building, also full of secrets, in
each room Wigo will find a lot of objects to interact and that may help or hinder
solving the riddles.
      
      
      

Also,
in each room Wigo will explore a part of the enormous library inside the tower
and will find books whose contents will enrich the story and give information
of great importance.
There
are four different types of books, each with different content:Wigo
can read fragments of each and every one of the books in each level of the
Black Tower Enigma.
Finally
and for the basic game edition there will be a Book System where all the fragments
of the books can be read and also be collected.Without
further ado you can try Black Tower Enigma: there is a demo to play, here are different
ways to try it: PLAY DEMO OLINE DOWNLOAD ANDROID DEMOMy
name is Steve Duran and this is my first real game for Mac, PC, iOs and Android, I am
who created all the elements which surround this adventure (except for the
music and concept art).
Ogre
Pixel is the name of my one-man indie game developer studio located in
Aguascalientes, México.The
work so far of Black Tower Enigma was made all with free software and during
free time I had during the last 3 months.
As
all the work except for music and concept art was done by myself, the money of
the first goal is basically for publishing licenses and a symbolic financial
compensation for artists.
The
following Stretch-Goals, if reached, would allow letting certain activities
aside and work full time for the making of Black Tower Enigma and make it a
more robust and complete experience.
Achieve
this campaign and know that there are people who support this project would be
for me a great achievement both personally and professionally.
Help
me to make this happen, thanks, in advance.For
this campaign of Black Tower Enigma there is a varied list of very interesting
rewards:*Each tier except for the special ones accumulate previous tier awards.If
you back $1 dollar you can get the
Black Tower Enigma game.
This
reward includes:

Black Tower Enigma Game (Mac, PC, iOs or Android).


And of course my eternal gratitude for
making this happen.
Estimated
delivery date: August 2014 *If
you back $3 dls you can get, additionally,
the text content of Black Tower Enigma.
This
reward includes:
ALL PREVIOUS TIERS REWARDS +:

PDF).


Game story digital booklet (PDF).


All in-game book contents digital
booklet (PDF).


Get all the text content of the Black
Tower Enigma!

you back $7 dls you can get,
additionally, the music of Black Tower Enigma. 
This
reward includes:

story:
the new Minecraft Eden server machine project
(deutsche Beschreibung im Forum)

Once you had a situation that you found a nice server, built much stuff about months and in the end everything got wasted cos of a map reset or the server got dropped?
I experienced this, too... more than once.
Because of this two and a half years before I rent the first server and I started our first (vanilla) map.
Beside this - and for me very important as well as for a long lasting project: this is my I-want-to-learn-to-handle-Linux-projekt.

Later, around two years before, we started our first offizicial map MC-Eden. Using Bukkit und connected to all former maps.
A short time later I rent a bigger machine (8 cores). This is not everything; Minecraft has a quite poor software architecture: this is single threaded.
This means to get all advances you can have: all server files went to a RAM disk, a permanent backup mechanism were scripted... All maps got distributed for different contents to certain servers and got connected using the Transporter plugin.
Additionally we established a more-tier-grief-protection: after a certain time a user were able to reach a subset of the other servers.  

Once a silent player was joining. That one built with patience and skill extreme projects. Later I realized this guy is a hoster itself. Later he offered to host a machine for us - without costs.
Because of this that project is not to pay a hoster (that even I could carry by myself) but to get a modern and powerful server machine.
About the architecture weaknesses of Minecraft we need as much single thread performance as we can get. When I need to build at least an i7 processor driven machine this will create much more costs than a gaming PC.
But this example would only replace the old server. My hope is to bring in much more ressources so we can expand in near future with additional themes and maps.
To illustrate this: now we are running 6 out of 9 servers and the Musem map (temporarily off and in our archive) should become the next server.
This is the reason to go for a bigger investment volume to set up a machine we can add another CPU and more RAM once.

Last but not least I hope for new (international) community members. Especially for more demanding adult people this should be a refuge and we will keep their performances. Who is investing real money would check if he is getting a value for this. Also I am in hope someone will come back two years later to look for his projects and to check our promise to keep this, if everything kept like it got left once.
Of course: I also want to have young people here. I want that we can educate them in their architecture skills. I think this is extremely precious when childs find together to realize big projects. Even they will learn everybody can bring in different performance even different ideas or resources. And all projects will live and develop over time.
I want to give a special home to this didactic great and family proof game Minecraft.

Because of this I need your investment.

check out our dynmaps:
http://mc-eden.net/map
(the pic is a tile from our Entry server)

check out our player statistics:
http://mc-eden.net:8088

this is our Eden community board:
http://mc-eden.net
(caution: German language!)

important members:
Pattafix007  
   retired Admin (he may come back any time); somebody who is adoring this game and who was living  this about two years
EureExkremenz  
   Admin; he is working for this community since a long time. He is present daily and doing all that amount of work
Jeffmanweb  
   Architect and youtuber; he created much awesome stuff; even he decorated the new entry map.
Cap_Midnight  
   Builder (huge projects)
wessel21  
  Me. I want to build big projects... But building roads, subways or I need to dig through technical stuff. And a bit strategic thinking such a server need.

important community members:
These players are always present and they built much, much great stuff. The most important part of this project; the community is the fuel for this project and this should serve the community. I hope this will grow even with this campaign.  
x_Moin_x
The_Doom
Culator
Vlad_Tepes_III
HDLaser
Alphanimal

Members who did much and created great buildings. Of course we didn't forgot them and partially they are still haunting our server. Even when so much aren't listed here:
XXXGarrettXXX

...
Approximately 450 more players who were here for a longer time. This people reached the user state at least.

...

all donators who mentioned their ingame nick will receive a permanent epic D in chat

story:
NOW AVAILABLE - VQA EXHIBITION TEAM JERSEYS!

Get yours now! Available in red or blue!

Who Are We?

We are the Victorian Quidditch Association and we play quidditch in Victoria, Australia. Six of our players have been selected as part of a squad of twenty-one to represent Australia at the International Quidditch Association's Global Games, held in Canada in July. We want to help our players (and the rest of the Aussie team) get there, so we're running this campaign to help them out!


What Do We Want?

Vancouver is a long way from Melbourne and we just want to support our players in any way we can! We want to raise enough money to help put a bit of a dint in flight, accommodation and living costs for our players whilst they wear the green and gold. We know we won't get enough to cover everything for all of them, but every little bit helps!


What Can We Give You?

The quidditch community in Victoria is much the same as quidditch communities all over the world - entirely unique. We've been fortunate enough to have people donate their skills and time to help make up the perks on this campaign!

Our badges include a Vic Six design, created especially for this campaign. Badges we've made in the past have looked something like these:


SLDixon Photography has created trading cards for our players in the past and has kindly offered his services to create a set of Vic Six cards for our campaign! More examples of his work can be found here, but just so you can see right this minute how brilliant they'll look, here's one with one of the players from Team Australia 2012:

And so you can see how incredible the sketches by Kat Art Illustrations of the Vic Six will be, here are some samples of her previous work:




Get Involved

Feel free to share our campaign on Facebook or Twitter and if you're going to be at the Global Games event, we'd love to see you there!

Click here to find out more about quidditch or the Victorian Quidditch Association!

Thanks so much for all your support!

story:
Short Summary

A game where you awake in a mental hospital with no recollection of why you are there. You convince yourself that you do not need to be there. As you kill  guards to escape the hospital, you become weaker and weaker.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to pay for an artist, for the Steam Greenlight submission fee, and advertisement.

    The Impact

    The game will teach certain lessons about morals and philosophy. Hopefully it will also create joy in the players life and will entertain them.

      Risks & Challenges

      The game may have some production delays due to the fact the the lead developers are students

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Spread the word about our game even if you don't donate. Even if you don't like it that doesn't mean someone else won't. Also if you do like our idea, check us out on facebook, twitter, tumblr, and our website www.projektpsykosis.com

story:
About Silver Pixel

Hi, my name is Austin and I'm the Owner of Silver Pixel. We're a network organizing a set of servers ranging from various game modes in Minecraft. I'm trying to create a unique and fun experience for every user. We've taken the time to perfect everything we've done from extraordinary builders, amazing web designers, and even patient plug-in developers.


Why us?

We're professional, and we know what we're doing. We've teamed up with very talented individuals willing to devote their free time into this huge project. We'll be running a VPS (Virtual Private Server) that allows us to run many Minecraft servers with ease. Server hardware can be expensive, and that's why we need your help. We want to provide a lag-free experience for every user, running on our state-of-the-art Nodes.


Game Types

Survival Server - Enjoy playing 1.7.2 Minecraft Survival with your friends in a never-ending world with dozens of biomes. We even offer an in-game Survival shop with in-game cash.

Creative Server - Your imagination is your limit. Have the ability to own different plots to build whatever you can imagine.

PVP servers - Instantly join a server and bring out your inner beast. With a custom PVP deathmatch plug-in, you'll find yourself addicted to this style of game play.

The Purge - This has never been done before in Minecraft, and we're bringing it exclusively to you. This is our main focus, our signature plug-in. Highly inspired by the movie as well as Minecraft Survival Games, we bring you - The Purge.


What exactly am I donating?

It's not exactly free to run multiple servers. By donating, you're showing your support to  us and helping us get started. You'll basically receive a pre-order of your donor rank on the server, along with some cool exclusive Indie Gogo benefits. We're offering an exclusive Emerald rank with a ton of cool stuff, including your own custom command in the hub, and even a custom gaming mouse pad with your name on it.


The Purge

Yes, The Purge. This is our main focus. Based off the movie, we've adapted this twisted scenario into Minecraft. We're bringing you a unique style of gameplay only found on our servers. This has never been done before, it's our signature plug-in. Built from the ground up by our best developers, you'll find yourself immersed in the intensity.

This plug-in was highly influenced by the movie, and we tried to stay as close to that as we could. There are two main teams and a target. The Civilians spawn sparsely throughout a neighborhood in houses equipped with nothing. As for the Syndicate... well, they spawn together in a warehouse full of goodies. The target will also be randomly spawned in a household.

The objective of the game is different for each opposing team. The Civilians and the Target want to either survive the night, or kill the remaining Syndicate. As for the Syndicate, their objective is to kill the Target.


More Information

If you choose to support us, we are going to be offering many different perks that can only be obtained via Indie Gogo. Prizes range from being able to beta test our servers, to having your head placed on the wall at spawn. These are limited time items, and we hope you enjoy them. We appreciate each and everyone of you choosing to support us.


There will be a promo video uploaded to the "Video Games" channel on YouTube (over 1M subscribers) and you could be listed as a contributor.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Mendenbarr! Those of you who recognize my name will know me from the theorycrafting work I do for death knights for World of Warcraft. 

I've always loved games of any type, and WoW has been a huge part of my life for the past 9 years. I'd like to return to Blizzcon after the blast I had last year!

What I Need & What You Get

I need about ~$1000 to pay for my coach class airfare, my ticket, and a few snacks along the way, and pay for a portion of the midwinter house. 

To be 100% clear, the successfulness of this will have no impact on my theorycrafting whatsoever. While I'll be a little sad if it fails, I'll continue devoting the same time and effort into producing useful information for all of you. 

If you are generous to donate, take a look at the perks on the right! 

I've also set this campaign on fixed funding, so in the likely event I do not reach my goal, everyone will have all their money returned. 

Any amount over the goal will be saved for blizzcon next year.

story:
Welcome to our campaign! The ZoomZ team has been working hard to bring you Second Life’s next addictive breedable.

So what is Second Life?
Second Life is a free to join 3D virtual world, where what you do is limited only by your imagination. Everyday, thousands of people all over the globe log in to SL to work, learn, create, play, and connect with others. One of the most popular activities in SL is raising and breeding virtual pets known as breedables. 

Breedables activity has contributed to SL’s multimillion dollar economy, with the thousands of residents in the breedables community working with their pets’ genetics to produce the perfect pals for play or competition against other breeders. Breeders can barter with others to get the pets they want, or even make money selling their breedables at auctions or markets!

So what are ZoomZ Breedables?

ZoomZ are SL’s newest breedable- virtual cars that you can breed, drive, and even race!

ZoomZ will have their own “DNA”, allowing you to breed cars that not only look just like you want them but also produce the best performance traits such as speed and engine efficiency to give their virtual cars the edge in racing competitions.

ZoomZ vehicles will be available in various makes and models that can be bred by working out the genetic traits of breeding combinations - so far one of our favorite is the monster truck, but you’ll have fun producing your personal favourite. Each type of car will be able to be bred in a variety of colors with the details that you want. Chrome, rims, spoilers, detailing, extra speed-the possibilities are endless!

Zoomz Vehicles, just like real cars, need fuel — vehicles will be born with one of four engine types — Gas, Electric, Bio-Diesel and Hybrid. Sure, you can buy fuel and fill up your tank, but, Not only can you breed your vehicles, but you can produce your own fuel too. Operate an oil drilling platform; grow corn to produce bio-diesel or harness the power of the sun for electricity.

After you perfect your car, become a race driver, enter your vehicle into its racing class and satisfy your need for speed as you compete with others. Or sit in the stands and place your bets when the engines are started. When you aren’t racing or having fun breeding, you can even make cash selling on your vehicles and connect with others at ZoomZ auctions and markets.

ZoomZ aren’t just breedable cars, they’re a product that will create a global community and generate a huge second party market.

So how can you get in on the action?

To become part of the ZoomZ community, join us as we work to get our product off the ground and onto the track. We offer a variety of incentives to fit everyone’s budget and interest. Car lovers will dig the exclusive art we’ve commissioned. Breedables enthusiasts will definitely want to check out our Pit Crew Package that offers an invitation to our beta testing and a pre-release starter pack. Those curious about Second Life are cordially invited to our orientations where we give you a taste of all the possibilities this world has to offer. Everyone who lends a hand will get a virtual high five and our undying gratitude for helping us turn our dreams into reality. Nothing but lint in your pocket? Spread the word about ZoomZ in the real and virtual world.

What We Need and What We Promise

All the cash you donate will be used to create ZoomZ and help us establish our virtual headquarters.  We need to write the programming to create the breeding aspect of the Zoomz vehicles with their genetic codes, create the performance aspects of the different vehicle types for virtual racing and create the various fuel systems to interact with the vehicular pets.

We have assembled a team of talented artists, modelers, scripters, animators, and customer service representatives to turn our dreams into reality. Throughout the campaign, we will regularly update you on our progress, releasing new art and media as they become available.

A Bit More About the Incentives-

The art- We’ve commissioned an artist, Neil Maguire, to produce the conceptual representations from which the 3D virtual vehicles will be built.  Having worked with companies like Google, CNN, Nintendo, BBC, Sky and Disney and on TV shows and Games such as Supernatural, Red Dwarf, Primeval, Sega World Wide Soccer 2000/2001, Highlander FMV and Constantine (to name but a few).  You won’t find the art we’ve got anywhere else.

Beta testing- Every product needs testing. As a ZoomZ beta tester you’ll learn how our product works before anyone else, and you’ll help us work out the kinks.

Wall of donators- Be memorialized forever at our in-world store.

Pre-release Starter Pack- Everything you need to breed your own ZoomZ- a male and female car, and some food to get you started

Second Life orientation- We’ve created a customized orientation to show you new and exciting ways to experience SL

Who are you guys?

The ZoomZ team consists of three regular Joes from all over the world - A college English teacher from Ohio and two working class blue collar guys from London and Philadelphia. 

We’re long time Second Life residents who continue to believe in the potential and beauty of the virtual world, breedable enthusiasts who know the formula for the perfect breedable, and car enthusiasts who fantasize about burning rubber on the track. We’re committed to bringing the world the next best breedable- ZoomZ, breedable, driveable, raceable cars!

story:
Thank you so much for even looking at our page. :) We sincerely appreciate it.

First of all visit our facebook page http://www.facebook.com/ProjectAJourneyOfKahn and share with your friends, they'll love you for it.

Project A has five members with the vision to achieve entertainment in a way not commonly seen. We are young aspiring artists, musicians and visionaries ambitious and determined to make this game become a reality through hard work and the support of your help.

 

Our game is named ‘Journey of Kahn’ and it is in the early stages of being made. So far, we are illustrating the concept art and the story for the game. The game is centred around our hero Kahn with the story being set in beautiful ancient Africa. Kahn is a noble man in a peaceful village when a Demi God destroys his village and kidnaps his wife! In order to save his wife and eventually the world, he must gain the power of the four elements animal, plant, water and fire. So he sets out to discover Africa to gain these powers and eventually save the world! Exciting stuff huh?

 

 

Our team consists of our script writer Darren Grant, a sound and music engineer Daniel Crooks , a programmer Stephen Anim, our project manager Christopher Williams and Tara Sham, the concept artist. We are Caribbean people based all around the world.

 

We need to raise at least $1500 for a copy of ZBrush and any other various software costs for this game. Although we have a talented team, we are students with just the skills and passion to see this through. We need your help to make this game and achieve the level of craft we want for this game and to do that we need the software to fully bring this game to life.

 

It would be greatly appreciated to see the outcome of young artist as ourselves to be given the tools we need to be a further step to reaching our goal. So please act now and donate to our cause.

 

You can contact me at ECWilliams4489@hotmail.com or call 678-761-5486 for more information on our project, questions about gifts and how you can show your support.

Thank you so much for your help :)

Be sure to share with all your friends, family, dog, cats and any living and non living soul that happens to be passing by. Every penny counts and history is being made, and your friends will love you for it :)

story:
SourceURL:file://localhost/Users/edgarlarrazabal/Desktop/BirdZerks/First%20App%20Story/Pages%20&%20Art%20for%20first%20story/Indiegogo%20Text%20&%20images.docx

 

WHO WE ARE

We're Edgar Larrazabal and Marlowe Weisman, and our upstart company is Toonup Animation.  Our specialty is family entertainment, and we're seeking your help to complete our first Interactive Storybook App for kids - an enriching and irreverent parable with the temporarily title "ToonUp Bird App."

We've spent almost 20 years each helping to create successful and award-winning cartoons for Nickelodeon, Disney and Warner Bros.  Edgar's been nominated for an Annie Award for directing SpongeBob SquarePants, and has worked on such shows as Rugrats, Hey Arnold! and Futurama. Marlowe was nominated for an Emmy Award for writing Baby Looney Tunes, and has also written for Animaniacs, Disney's Aladdin and the foreign feature Letters From Felix 2.  So we've got a lot of experience in quality family entertainment.

ABOUT THE PROJECT AND WHY WE'RE DOING IT

With the explosive popularity of mobile devices, children's storytelling is moving in a fun new direction, with exciting new opportunities to teach some timeless lessons.  This inspired us to create our own Interactive Storybook App, and we've turned to Indiegogo to seek out the resources to make it happen.

The ToonUp Bird App is an Interactive Storybook App that builds character in young readers with zany feather-centric parables.  Through enchanting graphics, an irreverent story and compulsively playable puzzles and games, the app tests children's values while rewarding their better judgment.  

The Bird App was motivated by ToonUp's desire to help foster good values in young children.  This App brings timeless stories to life in a fresh new format, helping children make the right choices - all by themselves - from a very young age.  We think that ‘The Tower Of Babel’ is the perfect story to start with.  Our goal is to publish it for Apple mobile devices (including iPad and iPhone) on iTunes, and Android devices (including Kindle Fire, Motorola Droid and Samsung Galaxy) on the Android Market.

ToonUp's goal is to eventually be a full-service animation studio dedicated to creating original family entertainment for TV, DVD, Mobile and Streaming.

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

Our storybook app is more than the story and designs we've created in our spare time.  It's also the sound effects, animation and (the costliest element) the complex engineering: all the other professional (and time-consuming) elements necessary to bring this entertaining app to life.

Your contribution through Indie-GoGo will take us to the next step: financing the expertise required to finish the app and help us make our dream project a reality.

By reaching our fundraising goal, we'll be able to complete the app and get it out there for kids to learn from - and enjoy.  Meeting our fundraising goal will allow us to get the first story onto the market.  Should we surpass our goal, we'll have a head start in creating many more worthwhile stories to upload to the ToonUp Bird App.

And what’s great about making a donation is that you get something in return.  As our way of saying thanks, we’ve come up with some great gifts that you can check out on our Perks Page, including character clothing, signed original artwork, and (at a certain donation level) a producer's credit on the app itself.

Every contribution makes a difference.  Today's digital technology makes it so easy to reach out and enhance kids' lives on our own - without publishers or studios.  Our Interactive Storybook App will do just that - and your contribution makes you a part of this exciting endeavor.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP  OUR BIRD APP  FLY

Even if you can't contribute, you can help us a lot by spreading the word about the ToonUp Bird App by using the Indiegogo Share Tools!

Thanks so much again for helping us give the ToonUp Bird App its wings, and making this project truly fly.

story:
First off I want to let you know up front 10% OF EVERY CENT WE MAKE WILL GO TO THE ST. JUDE CHILDREN'S RESEARCH HOSPITAL.


Fractured Realms is a 3D Free To Play MMORPG with a focus on crafting, and economics.

Inspired by the likes of Ultima Online, Eve Online, and World of Warcraft Fractured Realms will bring back elements of true MMORPG Gaming. We aim to bring back things which many of us have been missing for years such as Player Owned Housing, Player Owned Land, Player Owned Shops, Real PvP, PvE, Rares Dealing, Sand Box Style Skill Variety and much more.

Though Free To Play, Fractured Realms will be financially supported by means of a Land Ownership where players will be able to purchase Land for a price of $50 per each Parcel (No Limit As Of Yet), and upgrade packages and items from our site. These parcels of land will be used by players to build their houses, stores, or whatever they want to build which they will decorate with items they craft themselves. If a player ever decides to leave Fractured Realms, they will be able to sell their Estates (LAND) through our Land Auction Service (LAS) of which we will take 10% of the final sale to transfer ownership rights to another player.

GOALS




F.A.Q

What is Fractured Realms?

Fractured Realms is a crafting focused, free to play MMORPG where every item in the world is crafted by a player. Monsters won’t drop swords, gold pieces or armor, but when harvested after a kill, they will drop materials used in crafting items, weapons, armor and the like.

Can I purchase more than one parcel of land to build a bigger house?

Absolutely, you can purchase as much land as you can afford to buy. (No Limit)

Can I decorate my house any way I like?

Of course! If you can craft it, you can place it in your house..

What’s to stop people who aren’t even interested in playing Fractured Realms from buying parcels of land just to flip them later?

Nothing. We expect it to happen as land will be in limited supply and highly sought after, especially after launch. However, it will balance out eventually once the land speculation and wind down.

Will there be upkeep costs on my house?

No upkeep costs are planned for Fractured Realms be it real money or game currency. We are expecting our commission on Land Auctions and package and item sales should keep us funded enough for future development. The purchase of vacant parcels are just paying for the development of the game and the reselling of Land is what will be helping with future additions.

What do NPC's do in Fractured Realms?

NPC’s will begin to be placed in player villages and cities as they are built. Some will tell you stories others will give you quest that lead you to possible rare materials and adventure.

Does the game begin with any buildings?

A Few. Day one launch there will be a few buildings. As towns, cities begin to take shape, it will be because you, the players built them so build, build, build.

Will there be PVP?

Yes, there will be zones that are completely open for PVP though only in such zones will people be free to attack other players. These zones however will also be rich with rare mobs and materials, so we expect competition in these areas to be quite heavy. The other way to PvP is to enable your PvP flag, then and only then you can PvP any other player that is PvP flagged anywhere in the Fractured Realms word.

What if I own land that animals, monsters or harvest-able plant life spawn on?

You have two options. Either one, you can charge a fee for people to be able to access your land and what’s on it or you can keep it all to yourself ie make a fence.

What happens if the world gets full of players houses?

We have no limit on what you can build on the land, but we will have areas that you can not build on. If we need more land we will make more land, we have plans to be one of the largest MMORPG's of all time, land will not be an issue.

Will there be levels? Skills?

There will be levels in Fractured Realms, but there will also be skills, lots of skills. We will be adding skills like Eve Online. There will be caps on skills but once maxed out, you will be able to de-level skills you no longer need while leveling new ones that you do!

What kind of Chat System will Fractured Realms have?

We feel strongly that MMORPG games of today have Way to much chat in them...lol Each area that needs a chat will have one, When you enter an auction house, you will see an auction chat, and any other chat you will have to be in range of the person you want to chat with. As in real life this is an RPG there will be no PM, you will have to be within range.

So, is Fractured Realms like any other game?

All we can say is NO....



What We Need

We need your help to get this game up and running. We need funding to help pay for our mappers, coders, modelers, texture artist ect. We have figured in the Start up cost of all the servers needed to start this MMO and get the ball rolling. We need the help of the people that will play this game and love it as we do. We need your Ideas and input on the whole project.


About us

Superstar Games was formed in early 2007, we have worked on facebook games, our dev members have worked on games like WoW, World of Tanks, Entropia Universe, and BF3. Fractured Realms is our largest and longest project we have taken on to date, we aim to make Fractured Realms the best MMO ever with one of the largest crafting catalogs in the MMO World. Please feel free to join us and donate to help us out, we are a small company and need all the help we can get.


Other Ways You Can Help

We here at Superstar Games know everyone wants to help can't, but that is far from the truth, you can help even if you cant donate, use the Indiegogo share tools and share this Campaign with everyone you know.

Thanks Indiegogo

Superstar Games
