will be levels in Fractured Realms, but there will also be skills, lots of skills. We will be adding skills like Eve Online. There
will be caps on skills but once maxed out, you will be able to
de-level skills you no longer need while leveling new ones that you
do!
What
kind of Chat System will Fractured Realms have?
We
feel strongly that MMORPG games of today have Way to much chat in them...lol Each area that needs a chat will have one,
When you enter an auction house, you will see an auction chat, and
any other chat you will have to be in range of the person you want to
chat with. As in real life this is an RPG there will be no PM, you
will have to be within range.
So,
is Fractured Realms like any other game?
All we can say is NO....









What
We Need

We
need your help to get this game up and running. We need funding to
help pay for our mappers, coders, modelers, texture artist ect. We
have figured in the Start up cost of all the servers needed to start
this MMO and get the ball rolling. We need the help of the people
that will play this game and love it as we do. We need your Ideas and
input on the whole project.




About
us

Superstar
Games was formed in early 2007, we have worked on facebook games, our
dev members have worked on games like WoW, World of Tanks, Entropia
Universe, and BF3. Fractured Realms is our largest and longest
project we have taken on to date, we aim to make Fractured Realms the
best MMO ever with one of the largest crafting catalogs in the MMO
World. Please feel free to join us and donate to help us out, we are
a small company and need all the help we can get.




Other
Ways You Can Help

We
here at Superstar Games know everyone wants to help can't, but
that is far from the truth, you can help even if you cant donate, use
the Indiegogo share tools and share this Campaign with everyone you
know.

Thanks
Indiegogo

Superstar
Games

story:
Hi all,  I am Hayk Gevorgyan.

Here I present my game: Wave. 
I was inspired by my childhood memories of paper boats to create this game. The main point of the game is to create waves with your finger to move the boat. During the journey you will have to overcome different obstacles in order to reach beautiful and interesting coasts and to continue exploring. Your contribution will help us achieve our goal of creating a beautiful game where you will not only enjoy the interesting plot, but also incredibly fascinating graphics and design you never seen before. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • With funding we receive will hire best professionals in Armenia in order to create the best game for you. 
  • Every contributor will receive the game for free as soon as available on the app stores. 
  • In case if we do not receive the full funding we will try to create the project by cutting some features, but we will definitely not let you down. 

The Impact

In Armenia there are a lot of programmers, but they all work mostly on providing IT services to corporations. We want to break that stereotype and make IT more fun and beautiful. We want people in Armenia to think outside of the box. By making our project succeed we will serve as a good example and thus will foster the development of game industry in our homeland.

story:
Intro

Sir Sadim here.

After years of genius plotting, I have finally found my brother, Mister Midas, and have enacted my plan to ruin his life, as well as his little Dota 2 tournament. Step one, of course, was to empty his exceedingly vast bank accounts and take over his owned properties. Which has, to my surprise, put me in direct ownership of the Dota 2 map itself. 

Unlike my idiot brother, I don’t give a damn about your disgusting game, and so the time has come to do what any good business man does when he commits to a hostile takeover: TIME FOR LIQUIDATION!

That’s right, everything on the Dota 2 map must go. EVERYTHING IS FOR SALE!

Maut, who has recently taken over as my personal butler, will explain the finer details below. GOOD DAY!


Information

Betway Midas Mode 2 takes place on September 24 - October 2, with a total prizepool of $150,000. The pro-players will be playing online, but there will be a live audience in Denver, Colorado. You can find more detailed information regarding the tournament format, venue & tickets at http://midasmode.com

Everything you purchase will be viewable for the duration of the tournament. Some perks require you to contact us to determine specifics regarding your selection. Everything is on a first-come first-serve basis. Keep in mind, requests need to be reviewed. We will NOT accept anything obscene, racist, or questionable in any way.  We may also deny requests that are just not feasible to do in our allotted time-frame (ie. no full remodels, custom hero animations, or dynamic changes that would significantly impact silhouette recognition for players). We reserve the right to tweak images sent in order for them to translate better to the Dota 2 map. We also reserve the right to deny any request. However, if a request is denied, you will be refunded. In addition to this, we will not be accepting submissions, be them from companies or people, that conflict with Betway Midas Mode 2's official sponsors.

For all contact related inquiries, please use the "Ask a Question" link at the top of the page.

Now let’s talk about all the perks:

Sadim Screen Advertisements

Billboards will be placed in many locations of the Dota 2 map. The text and/or images sent by anyone purchasing this perk will be on full display on those screens, throughout the entire tournament, visible to players and spectators live. Each billboard will rotate through all advertisements sent, in a random, but non-repeating order. These images will also be shown during daily credits for our tournament coverage.

Once you purchase this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us please include:

  1. The text you want displayed OR a link to the image of your choosing (512x512 pixels - PNG format)

 

Heroes

By purchasing a hero of your choice, you will be able to customize their name to your heart’s desire. In addition, you can help us come up with some sort of visual addition to the hero that will help it stand out. 

Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what heroes are currently available. The images will be updated live. Once purchase this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

  1. The hero of your choosing
  2. The name you want for the Hero
  3. What customizations you want for the Hero

Keep in mind that we will simply not have the time to completely remodel any hero, and will not be changing any animations.

The first hero of the FUND A MEME project is live, the DISTRACTOR! https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/midas-mode-2...

Here are all the available heroes:

Items

Items have been categorized into three Tiers (A-C), based on the frequency of purchase and overall impact on the game. When you purchase this perk, a short name of your choice will be added to the item’s name (ie. Bob’s Blink Dagger). In addition, an image of your choice will be superimposed within the item itself. 

Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you purchase this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

  1. The item of your choosing
  2. What name you want added to the item
  3. What image you want associated with the item

     

    Structures

    Structures have been segmented into 3 Tiers (A-C), based on how often the buildings may be on display throughout a typical game of Dota 2. These include every single building in the game, except the Ancients themselves. We can create a brand new tower model for you, or add your logos to hover over the buildings, or simply change the attack particles. We are also able to rename them in your honor! Let us know your ideas!

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you purchase this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

    1. The building of your choosing
    2. What you want your building to be called
    3. Your ideas for customization
     

    Runes

    Whichever rune you choose will display a pulsating image of your choice hovering over them, whenever they spawn.

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you  purchase this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

    1. Which Rune you want
    2. A link to the image of your choice

     

    Neutral Camps

    Neutral camps are divided into four categories: Small, Medium, Large, and Ancient. Pick one of them, and put an image of your choice on the nearby ground for all to see!

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you have purchased this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

    1. Your camp of choice (including corresponding number from the minimap graphic below, e.g. "Dire Large Camp 3")
    2. A link to the image you want displayed

     

    Radiant or Dire Ancient

     

    Ever wanted to own the Ancient? Well, now you can! Turn that pretty building into a bucket of chicken, or a skyscraper dedicated to your face! Your imagination is the limit, as we will remodel the Ancient on your behalf.

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you have purchased this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us please include:

    1. Which Ancient you want
    2. Your ideas

     

    Wards

    We will create custom wards, based on your ideas and design, that every pro player must use for the entire tournament. One set of wards includes two models: Observers & Sentries, and will correspond to the wards placed by one of the teams (Radiant and Dire).

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you have purchased this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

    1. Radiant or Dire wards?
    2. Your ideas

    Courier

    Have a fully custom courier made just for you! Teams will use the Radiant or Dire courier to deliver their all important items, so choose wisely!

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you have purchased this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

    1. Radiant or Dire courier?
    2. Your ideas

     

    River

    This is the most sought after real-estate in the Dota 2 map. It spans far and wide, and your image will display in a seemingly perpetual manner. If you want the casters to refer to the River as Bobby Boy’s River, then just let us know. They might not do it, though, as we’re not paying them very much.

    Before purchasing, please visit http://midasmode.com/perks to see what is currently available. The images will be updated live. Once you have purchased this perk, please contact us by clicking the Contact link on your Contribution Details page. In your message to us, please include:

    1. The image(s) you want displayed
    2. A stupid name for the casters to forget to say constantly

     

    Buy It Out!

    Buy everything on the map for $1 million dollars. We will refund everything anyone else has purchased. This one's for you, Epic & Riot Games!

story:
Just click through to download it!

Also, we have a discord server here!

Bug Fables is an Adventure RPG following Vi, Kabbu, and Leif as they search Bugaria for The Everlasting Sapling, a treasure said to grant immortality.

You can get a taste of what's in store by downloading and playing the free demo here, which covers the prologue of the game - alongside a few extra side quests!

With your help in backing this campaign, we will be able to create an even bigger game than the demo!

Bug Fables is planned to feature:

- 6 chapters of story following the heroes across Bugaria!

- Many unique areas, including: The Ant Kingdom, the treacherous Snakemouth Den, the picturesque Golden Hills, The Lost Sands, and Bee's home, the Bee Kingdom!

- A vast overworld that transitions into turn-based combat! Use Bee's Beemerang, Moth's ice magic, or Beetle's horn to defend yourself from foes!

- Action commands which can make attacks more effective, or block enemy attacks!

- A cooking system to turn ingredients into items that can help you in battle!

- A tattle system that lets you hear your party interact with each other as they discover all the secrets Bugaria has in store!

 

Hidden within the foliage of nature, lies a small but prosperous continent - Bugaria. Insects from all over the world travel to it in search of the treasure scattered across it. The most sought after of these relics is The Everlasting Sapling! Eating just one of its leaves can grant even immortality!

In search of this ancient artifact, a brave team of explorers - Vi, Kabbu, and Leif - will travel across many different environments. Including:

  • The Ant Kingdom: Standing at the center of it all, this powerful kingdom connects all other areas!

  • Snakemouth Den: A dangerous cave where many explorers have been lost to a wicked beast.

  • Golden Hills: An incredibly booming farmer area with very respected culture and folklore. Its perpetual autumn is a big draw for tourists.

  • The Lost Sands: A vast desert home to an oasis, bandits...and a place lost to time!?

...and many more!

In Bug Fables, you will command an Ant Queen approved exploration team! Even though its members clash at times, they work together to clear puzzles, defeat strong enemies and help the general bug populace! 

"Look, I'm worth like four bees, alright!?"

Vi comes from the hive resting at the top of the largest tree in Bugaria - the Bee Kingdom. Easy to anger, and quick to jump at the chance for riches, Vi is a crafty, sassy, talented explorer! She can use her Beemerang to reach items out of reach, or hit switches!

"I have a promise I must fulfill. And so, I wish to explore."

Kabbu comes from the Northern Continent, neighbouring Bugaria. Drawn by the grandiose legends of the land, Kabbu seeks to unearth every artifact - and make sure none go missing looking for them again. Level headed, altruistic and a bit self-conscious, Kabbu looks out for his team the most. With his Horn, he can cut down bushes or push rocks to open a path!

"Even if they seem like obstacles, we can exploit them for our own benefit."

Leif is a resident of the Ant Kingdom, who met up with Vi and Kabbu during their expedition in Snakemouth Den. Confident and unfazed by almost anything (except delicious food and cute things). Leif doesn't have much to say, but makes sure to do the job efficiently. With the Freeze ability, Leif can encase water or enemies in blocks of ice! Push them around to reach new heights! (Or just freeze that enemy you don't wish to fight!)

 

 

Bug Fables features team based, turn based combat with a few twists!​

  • Action Commands: Attacks can be made more effective by performing action commands correctly! You can also block enemy attacks!
  • Weakness System: Each of your party members is more effective against certain enemies. Carefully plan your moves to finish battles quickly!
  • Turn Relay: Pass turns along teammates to exploit enemy weaknesses!
  • Front Bonus: The bug in front will get +1 attack, but will be focused more often by enemies!
  • Medal System: Equipments obtained while exploring can unlock extra skills, change stats, and even make the game more difficult!

 

Don't forget, you can always try the demo out here!

All this work didn't appear out of nowhere. You can check out the history of its development on Tumblr and Twitter - and any updates we will post afterwards.
 
(For any feedback regarding the demo, please send an email to paperbugdev@gmail.com or through any of the social media above.)
 

 

Thank you for supporting us! With this tier, you'll get your name in the credits and a wallpaper when the game comes out!

When the game releases, you'll receive a code to download the game. You'll be a certified explorer with this!

Can't get the game's music out of your head? Get ALL of the OST when the Bug Fables comes out, so you can listen to it when you're done playing!

Get TWO copies of the game when it comes out, AND the soundtrack! Now you and a friend can go through this journey sharing tips and secrets you've found!

Did you know Leif used to be Red? That Kabbu used to crawl on four legs? That Vi was really humanoid? Freaky, ain't it!? Get a PDF when Bug Fables comes out containing not only the updated, high resolution sprites and concepts of the final game...but also secret, scribbly concepts of characters, bosses, maps, items...you name it!

When the time comes, gain access to the Beta build! Aside from being able to play before most people, you can help us find bugs and oversights in the game! 

You'll also appear as a Beta Tester Bug in the credits!

Have an awesome idea for bug food recipes? Battle items? Maybe a (completely balanced) medal equipment? Work with the team to bring it to life!

You'll appear in the credits as a Merchant Bug as well!

Feel like going on your very own pilgrimage through Bugaria? Maybe you just lost your toy in the most dangerous place possible and need help? Maybe there's an incredibly important piece of game mechanics advice you want to share with the player? Work with the team to create an NPC which will appear in the game! With their very own quest! (Or not, that's fine too!)

You'll appear in the credits as an NPC Bug as well!

Do you just hate Vi's guts? Want to bully Kabbu a little? Bring Leif down a notch (or two)? Unleash your righteous fury by working with the team to create a Miniboss in the game! The only rule is that, ultimately, the boss will lose to the party. Sorry.

You'll appear in the credits as a Miniboss Bug as well!

 

Márcio Cleiton is the programmer and animator for Bug Fables. The captain of this exploration team, he's an avid fan of RPGs like Paper Mario and has been itching to create one for more than a decade!

José Fernando Gracia is the writer, designer and concept artist for Bug Fables. Ever since he spent months wandering about the worlds of Super Mario RPG, Final Fantasy VI and the like, he knew he wanted to write one of his own!

Tristan Alric is the talented teammate in charge of Bug Fables' music. The fact that the first boss' theme is named "They Call Him Spuder" is entirely his fault.

Allison has been helping us with some character designs! Most notably, she designed Mothiva and Zasp!

Poppy De Raad  helps give the game a polished coat of paint with her amazing work on the icons for items, recipes, and badges! She also sometimes helps out with props for the 3D maps!

Stefan Moser ties the whole thing together with his work on sound effects for the game!

The team posts through our official Twitter, too!

Our team has been working on Bug Fables for more than a year and slowly growing to tackle aspects we couldn't by ourselves. However, this growth comes with a cost - one that has been funded out of our pocket throughout 2017.

With the funding recouped from this campaign, we hope to cover some of the major upfront costs that would allow us to pay for the game's sound and some external artwork.. There were also other legal costs such as opening a company, applying to Steam, and etc. Indiegogo takes a non-negligible share of the raised money as well, which we needed to account for.

The money that remains serves as a safety net for our team to manage to work on the game while doing part-time, rather than transitioning to full time jobs and only working on the weekends!

We have a solid, clear vision for the game. This includes the main story, all of the sidequests, optional areas, the achievements and the like. We've budgeted for all this in the main goal, so we don't feel the need to add any stretch goals.

Any extra money we raise through the campaign will be used both to keep the development team well paid, and to seize any opportunities that arise in the future that may require money (such as ports)!

This campaign is only thanks to you, the backers. And to the community that has stuck with us through thick and thin - all the way back to the first version of the game! 

It has been an amazing experience working on this game and seeing more and more people get interested in the game. Regardless of what happens, we just all want to thank you for everything!

 

Every project has risks, and this expedition is no exception.

Unforeseen technical issues could compromise the project, although we have made sure to have almost all of our core systems already working and presented in the demo.

There is always a real possibility of members of our small team getting injured or falling seriously ill, which would delay the project. 

Thankfully, our rewards are all digital, so there is a negligible risk in fulfilling backer rewards. 

The biggest challenge in finishing the game will be the great amount of content left to make - we are looking at about 8 times the length of the current demo. However, we've used the experience from working in this demo to calculate the workload and time required, and we're confident we'll be able to deliver the game in 2019 as planned.

(If everything else fails, there's always work at the Ant Mines!)

Bug Fables is planned to feature:
- 6 chapters of story following the heroes across Bugaria!
- Many unique areas, including: The Ant Kingdom, the treacherous Snakemouth Den, the picturesque Golden Hills, The Lost Sands, and Bee's home, the Bee Kingdom!
- A vast overworld that transitions into turn-based combat! Use Bee's Beemerang, Moth's ice magic, or Beetle's horn to defend yourself from foes!
- Action commands which can make attacks more effective, or block enemy attacks!
- A cooking system to turn ingredients into items that can help you in battle!
- A tattle system that lets you hear your party interact with each other as they discover all the secrets Bugaria has in store!
 Hidden within the foliage of nature, lies a small but prosperous continent - Bugaria. Insects from all over the world travel to it in search of the treasure scattered across it. The most sought after of these relics is The Everlasting Sapling! Eating just one of its leaves can grant even immortality!In search of this ancient artifact, a brave team of explorers - Vi, Kabbu, and Leif - will travel across many different environments. Including:
The Ant Kingdom: Standing at the center of it all, this powerful kingdom connects all other areas!
Snakemouth Den: A dangerous cave where many explorers have been lost to a wicked beast.
Golden Hills: An incredibly booming farmer area with very respected culture and folklore. Its perpetual autumn is a big draw for tourists.
The Lost Sands: A vast desert home to an oasis, bandits...and a place lost to time!?...and many more!
In Bug Fables, you will command an Ant Queen approved exploration team! Even though its members clash at times, they work together to clear puzzles, defeat strong enemies and help the general bug populace! 

"Look, I'm worth like four bees, alright!?"
Vi comes from the hive resting at the top of the largest tree in Bugaria - the Bee Kingdom. Easy to anger, and quick to jump at the chance for riches, Vi is a crafty, sassy, talented explorer! She can use her Beemerang to reach items out of reach, or hit switches!

"I have a promise I must fulfill. And so, I wish to explore."
Kabbu comes from the Northern Continent, neighbouring Bugaria. Drawn by the grandiose legends of the land, Kabbu seeks to unearth every artifact - and make sure none go missing looking for them again. Level headed, altruistic and a bit self-conscious, Kabbu looks out for his team the most. With his Horn, he can cut down bushes or push rocks to open a path!

"Even if they seem like obstacles, we can exploit them for our own benefit."
Leif is a resident of the Ant Kingdom, who met up with Vi and Kabbu during their expedition in Snakemouth Den. Confident and unfazed by almost anything (except delicious food and cute things). Leif doesn't have much to say, but makes sure to do the job efficiently. With the Freeze ability, Leif can encase water or enemies in blocks of ice! Push them around to reach new heights! (Or just freeze that enemy you don't wish to fight!)

 

 
Bug Fables features team based, turn based combat with a few twists!​


Action Commands: Attacks can be made more effective by performing action commands correctly! You can also block enemy attacks!


Weakness System: Each of your party members is more effective against certain enemies. Carefully plan your moves to finish battles quickly!

Turn Relay: Pass turns along teammates to exploit enemy weaknesses!

Front Bonus: The bug in front will get +1 attack, but will be focused more often by enemies!

Medal System: Equipments obtained while exploring can unlock extra skills, change stats, and even make the game more difficult!

 

Don't forget, you can always try the demo out here!

All this work didn't appear out of nowhere. You can check out the history of its development on Tumblr and Twitter - and any updates we will post afterwards.
 
(For any feedback regarding the demo, please send an email to paperbugdev@gmail.com or through any of the social media above.)
  

Thank you for supporting us! With this tier, you'll get your name in the credits and a wallpaper when the game comes out!


When the game releases, you'll receive a code to download the game. You'll be a certified explorer with this!


Can't get the game's music out of your head? Get ALL of the OST when the Bug Fables comes out, so you can listen to it when you're done playing!


Get TWO copies of the game when it comes out, AND the soundtrack! Now you and a friend can go through this journey sharing tips and secrets you've found!


Did you know Leif used to be Red? That Kabbu used to crawl on four legs? That Vi was really humanoid? Freaky, ain't it!? Get a PDF when Bug Fables comes out containing not only the updated, high resolution sprites and concepts of the final game...but also secret, scribbly concepts of characters, bosses, maps, items...you name it!


When the time comes, gain access to the Beta build! Aside from being able to play before most people, you can help us find bugs and oversights in the game! 
You'll also appear as a Beta Tester Bug in the credits!


Have an awesome idea for bug food recipes? Battle items? Maybe a (completely balanced) medal equipment? Work with the team to bring it to life!
You'll appear in the credits as a Merchant Bug as well!


Feel like going on your very own pilgrimage through Bugaria? Maybe you just lost your toy in the most dangerous place possible and need help? Maybe there's an incredibly important piece of game mechanics advice you want to share with the player? Work with the team to create an NPC which will appear in the game! With their very own quest! (Or not, that's fine too!)
You'll appear in the credits as an NPC Bug as well!


Do you just hate Vi's guts? Want to bully Kabbu a little? Bring Leif down a notch (or two)? Unleash your righteous fury by working with the team to create a Miniboss in the game! The only rule is that, ultimately, the boss will lose to the party. Sorry.You'll appear in the credits as a Miniboss Bug as well!
 
Márcio Cleiton is the programmer and animator for Bug Fables. The captain of this exploration team, he's an avid fan of RPGs like Paper Mario and has been itching to create one for more than a decade!
José Fernando Gracia is the writer, designer and concept artist for Bug Fables. Ever since he spent months wandering about the worlds of Super Mario RPG, Final Fantasy VI and the like, he knew he wanted to write one of his own!
Tristan Alric is the talented teammate in charge of Bug Fables' music. The fact that the first boss' theme is named "They Call Him Spuder" is entirely his fault.
Allison has been helping us with some character designs! Most notably, she designed Mothiva and Zasp!
Poppy De Raad  helps give the game a polished coat of paint with her amazing work on the icons for items, recipes, and badges! She also sometimes helps out with props for the 3D maps!
Stefan Moser ties the whole thing together with his work on sound effects for the game!
The team posts through our official Twitter, too!

Our team has been working on Bug Fables for more than a year and slowly growing to tackle aspects we couldn't by ourselves. However, this growth comes with a cost - one that has been funded out of our pocket throughout 2017.

With the funding recouped from this campaign, we hope to cover some of the major upfront costs that would allow us to pay for the game's sound and some external artwork.. There were also other legal costs such as opening a company, applying to Steam, and etc. Indiegogo takes a non-negligible share of the raised money as well, which we needed to account for.
The money that remains serves as a safety net for our team to manage to work on the game while doing part-time, rather than transitioning to full time jobs and only working on the weekends!

We have a solid, clear vision for the game. This includes the main story, all of the sidequests, optional areas, the achievements and the like. We've budgeted for all this in the main goal, so we don't feel the need to add any stretch goals.
Any extra money we raise through the campaign will be used both to keep the development team well paid, and to seize any opportunities that arise in the future that may require money (such as ports)!

This campaign is only thanks to you, the backers. And to the community that has stuck with us through thick and thin - all the way back to the first version of the game! 
It has been an amazing experience working on this game and seeing more and more people get interested in the game. Regardless of what happens, we just all want to thank you for everything!
 
Every project has risks, and this expedition is no exception.
Unforeseen technical issues could compromise the project, although we have made sure to have almost all of our core systems already working and presented in the demo.
There is always a real possibility of members of our small team getting injured or falling seriously ill, which would delay the project. 
Thankfully, our rewards are all digital, so there is a negligible risk in fulfilling backer rewards. 
The biggest challenge in finishing the game will be the great amount of content left to make - we are looking at about 8 times the length of the current demo. However, we've used the experience from working in this demo to calculate the workload and time required, and we're confident we'll be able to deliver the game in 2019 as planned.

(If everything else fails, there's always work at the Ant Mines!)

story:
Story

Events of the game describe a year 2027, when the fallen asteroid brought an alien parasite spores on Earth. Spores, when they get inside a living creature, cause an irreversible mutation, that brings to life a new race – Malorg (mutagenic alien organism). Infection has spread so fast, that just after a year of its beginning the most part of the planet was populated with mutants. The future of humankind was doomed, till the moment when an independent scientist, professor Isaac Mason created an effective antidote against mutagenic mechanism of spores.

It seemed that the goal is near: it’s necessary to bring the example of antidote to a military base «Red Heath», where it will be possible to produce it in a mass way and spread it among population. However, there is a problem, lately the connection with the base was lost. What’s the reason? It seems that the answer could be found only through the visiting of it. So, there is no choice, and professor Isaac Mason with his assistant Melanie Becker decides to go there through the risk and fear.

This dangerous journey has low chances for success, the path lies through hundreds of miles full of mutants, and the mobile helicopter of the scientist that was downed by the members of “Marshtower’s Dogs”, had to go on an emergency landing, near the small town.

Fortunately, on their way, Isaac and Melanie meet three survivors, to reach already common purpose.

                            

                                     

                                        


                                     Gameplay

In «Red Heath» a player has to command five characters in a turn mode, which need to pass 60 locations, connected to a story line, fighting mutants and armed gangs. The goal of each level is to destroy all enemies, or to bring every character to a check point.

Every turn of a character is limited, and this limit is shown as action points, which a player can spend on a movement, weapon change, action or unique action.

During the game characters get experience points for their every successful action, what leads to rising of a character’s level and a possibility to upgrade skills and to get special skills in a skill tree.

Special feature of «Red Heath» gameplay tactics is a high rate of effectiveness of the team work, while every character has its own vulnerability. 

Development system of the characters and their unique specifications provide a player to pass levels in an improvising way.

 

                           
                                        

                                   Characters    

                                                                                                      

        Isaac Mason, biologist, neurophysiologist, 42  y.o.  Aka “Specialist”.  

He has lost his sight, because of getting infected with spores during experiments during the creation of antidote, though because of that he has got an ability of telekinesis and telepathy.

With help of hoi assistant, Melanie Becker, he created a drone, which sensors were connected to a nervous system of Isaac. This way, drone became his eyes, a tool and a weapon.

Pros

+ Ability to control the drone on a distance, it helps to stay in a safer position;

+ Uses lightning gun as a weapon;

+ The drone is able to fix broken mechanisms and damaged armor;

+ Ability to take control over aims with his mind, after developing of this skill.


Cons

- Telekinetic skills provide a possibility to simultaneously control only the drone;

- Active radius of drone is limited;

- Absence of armor.

                                

                                         


                                  Melanie Becker, biologist, 28 y.o. Aka “Doc”.

An assistant of the professor Mason. After the beginning of the epidemic, together with professor found a shelter in a private laboratory, where they were doing research of the problem of mass mutations.

In a squad she plays a role of a medic, specialist in poisons and stimulators.

Pros

+ Can heal the members of the squad;

+ Abilityto stop infection, by using antidote;

+ Ability to use stimulators, which temporary increases parameters of an aim;

+ Has in her arsenal poisons, for destruction plant bio forms, producing mutagenic

spores.


Cons

-  Instead of weapon uses poisons, that are not that effective in a combat;

- Absence of armor.


                                    


                                Alice Foster, a girl genius, 13 y.o. Aka “Kid”.

Her parents died when the town “Bearville”, where they lived, was under the attack of mutants, Alice survived, she hid in the cellar of her family house. Deep knowledge in physics let Alice to made a rail gun, using the details of her dad’s hunting rifle, which she‘s found in a garage. Thereby and also because of the food supplies in her house she stayed alive alone during two month, before she met Isaac and Melanie.

Pros

+ Accurate and powerful shots on a big distance with a slack return;

+ Ability to break in electronic security;

+ A specialist in computer technologies.


Cons

- Poor in a close combat;

- Because of the design of the railgun it requires are charge after each shot;

- Absence of armor.


                                        

      Mark Simon, captain of a special HTBF squad (High-Tech Battle Force),                                                      32 y.o.  Aka “Captain”.

One of the survived soldiers of the HTBFsquad, that was defeated not looking at its hi tech weaponry and ammunition, during the attack on Bearville. After that the town became full of mutants.

He prefers cold steel arms, and equipped with special suit, that gives him an ability to become invisible for some time.

Pros

+Effective with using swords, gaining massive damage to an aim;

+Equippedwith “smart” suit, that temporary makes him invisible;

+ Ability to break mechanical locks;

+ Equipped with Kevlar armor.


Cons

- Melee battle.


                                       


  Samuel Wayne, storm trooper of the special HTBFsquad, 33 y.o. Aka “Tank”.

Heavily armed soldier in an exoskeleton armor, equipped with a Gatling machinegun and a flame thrower. The second soldier from HTBF, who survived after the attack of mutants on the town.

Pros

+ Equipped with the powerful Gatling machinegun and the flame thrower;

+ Heavy armor;

+ Ability to break through barricades.


Cons

- Slow speed.


                                    


                        Game special features

- Unique skill upgrade tree for every character;

- Dozens of items for upgrade of weapons and skills;

 - Free combat tactic model;

 - 60 unique locations

 - 17 types of enemies;

 - 6 bosses;

- Achievements.

   

   






Regardless of the crowd funding result, release of the game will happen anyway, and all backers will get promised bonuses, because we have intention to involve investors, if gathered on indiegogo funds aren't being enough.



A specification of our studio «Epic Star Graphics» is game development and creation of 3d graphics and animation. In 5 years we’ve released 4 games: «Weird Park» trilogy and «Alex Hunter: Lord of the Mind». You can find out more about us on our website www.epic-star-games.com.

We’ve got enough of game dev experience, and decided to reach a new goal with creation of a game of some other genre that we did before and make it on some brand new quality level. The idea of «Red Heath» is several years old already, but only recently when we gathered the team of professionals, we understood that we are able to realize this idea.

Unfortunately, a budget of the game is higher than our possibilities, and we hope, that with your help we can gather lacking funds. We will be glad, if we find support in you. Please, tell your friends about our game, probably, they would decide to support our project too.

Further we will describe you the world of «Red Heath». Please, ask your questions, we will be happy to reply.

story:
NINTENDO SWITCH is an awesome gaming console, we love it! It provides different gaming modes to fulfill players’ needs, allowing us to enjoy the games anytime and anywhere..

The handheld mode is always our favorite, but we found because of its size and flat back, it is difficult to hold the console and play the games for a long period of time making our hands too tied from holding the SWITCH. Which got us thinking, why not make a case, not only to protect the SWITCH but also providing two comfortable grips on the SWITCH, just like the PS4 and XB1 joy-cons.

So the GripCase was born to let game players to have the ability to play the games for hours without the feeling of fatigue.

  • Reviews from Filip on YouTube. CLICK HERE to check out.

        https://youtu.be/-_AU-esY3h0

The SnapGrip is a basic set for the most players and games. And the TriggerGrip provides stronger grip force, it is designed for players with bigger hands and play hardcore games very often.

Both grip sets are made of hard PC (polycarbonate) with texture on the surface, which gives players a similar feeling of holding a XB1 or PS4 joy-con.

The GripCase is made of soft TPU (Thermoplastic polyurethanes) material, which is similar to the silicone, an environmental friendly material has been wildly used to make cell phone protective cases. It will not scratch your SWITCH like the hard plastic does. Most important, our GripCase is easy to put on and remove, convenient for gamers to take the case off when they intend to switch between different gaming modes.

 

The GripCase has a 0.7mm thin back, not only designed for heat sinking but also dock charging. There is no need to remove the case to get your SWITCH recharged in the dock.

The soft TPU material makes the GripCase so unique and it gives us so much more spaces to design this case in the way have never done before. Finally we achieved our goal, which the shoulder buttons were covered by the GripCase meanwhile remain the original keystroke sense.

We also designed a Carry Case to store the SWITCH with GripCase on. This Carry Case can swallow almost everything you can imagine, such as power bank, adaptor, USB cable, headset, game cards, joy-con grips and etc. The GripCase and the Carry Case can be the ultimate solution for your NINTENDO SWITCH.

  • Huge Storage Space

 

  • In-Case Charging

(Note:  The L shaped (angled) USB-C cable is not included in the pledge rewards.)

With our carrying case, charging your SWITCH while you traveling could never be so easy. There is no worry about bending the USB port. We give our carrying case a large storage space (6.1" (L) * 4.7" (W) * 1.3" (H) / 155mm (L) * 120mm (W) * 34mm (H)). So there is plenty room for your power bank and cables. By using the L shaped (angled) USB-C cable , your SWITCH is able to get juice from the power bank when both of them stay in the carrying case, as the picture showed above.

Of course, the power bank will generate extra heat when charging the SWITCH in the carrying case. Please see the temperature testing results for your reference.

We found that most of the heat came from the power bank. According to our tests, the power bank generated extra 44.6℉(7℃) after 1 hour charging and 53.6℉(12℃) after 2 hours. The temperature of SWITCH only increased by 41℉(5℃) and 50℉(10℃) correspondingly. We think the heat is still in a tolerable range. But we suggest the gamers who do care about the extra heat, could always take the power bank outside the carrying case when charging the Switch (as the following picture showed).

  • Mesh Pocket Upgrade

 

Our team upgraded the mesh pocket by giving a top flap on the original mesh pocket. Now you are able to put small stuff in the mesh pocket without falling. We also upgraded its material, using the 3-layer sandwich mesh instead of the 1 layer mesh. The sandwich mesh is 1mm thick, has 2 mesh layers with a sponge layer in the middle, which provides great protection to your console.

Only US$5.00 per set, including 1 pair of SnapGrip and 1 pair of TriggerGrip. You will get to select your color options via a survey sent out.

 

Skull & Co. is established by a group of young people who love video games, we are designers, engineers, sourcing managers and etc. but we have one thing in common, games! From the beginning, we discovered that it was near impossible to find a well-designed third party gaming accessory in the market. They were made from a view of engineers not gamers. So we decided to make our own products from the point of view of a gamer. Our team became more and more experienced while creating our products.

This project is much bigger than any of our previous projects; also this is something we feel most passionately about. We need funds to invest on the tooling and people to follow and support this project. Our prototype has indicated to us that this is a great design and it can be mass produced smoothly. Our manufacture partner is ready to go. With support from Indiegogo, we can speed up this project and make this GripCase reality.

We have made a wide range of products in the past, while our team became bigger and more experienced. We have made few prototypes to polish this product and each prototype have made our goal of mass production more feasible. Our manufacture partner and us have solved every problem we have anticipated in facing in the process of bring this product to the market. We are mostly focused in the tooling in creating this product, any mistake or change can lead to delay in shipping of the products.

Based on our past experience, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 6-8 weeks, but we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.
story_txt: NINTENDO SWITCH is an awesome gaming console, we love it! It provides different gaming modes to fulfill players’ needs, allowing us to enjoy the games anytime and anywhere..The handheld mode is always our favorite, but we found because of its size and flat back, it is difficult to hold the console and play the games for a long period of time making our hands too tied from holding the SWITCH. Which got us thinking, why not make a case, not only to protect the SWITCH but also providing two comfortable grips on the SWITCH, just like the PS4 and XB1 joy-cons.So the GripCase was born to let game players to have the ability to play the games for hours without the feeling of fatigue.Reviews from Filip on YouTube. CLICK HERE to check out.        https://youtu.be/-_AU-esY3h0The SnapGrip is a basic set for the most players and games. And the TriggerGrip provides stronger grip force, it is designed for players with bigger hands and play hardcore games very often.Both grip sets are made of hard PC (polycarbonate) with texture on the surface, which gives players a similar feeling of holding a XB1 or PS4 joy-con.The GripCase is made of soft TPU (Thermoplastic polyurethanes) material, which is similar to the silicone, an environmental friendly material has been wildly used to make cell phone protective cases. It will not scratch your SWITCH like the hard plastic does. Most important, our GripCase is easy to put on and remove, convenient for gamers to take the case off when they intend to switch between different gaming modes. The GripCase has a 0.7mm thin back, not only designed for heat sinking but also dock charging. There is no need to remove the case to get your SWITCH recharged in the dock.The soft TPU material makes the GripCase so unique and it gives us so much more spaces to design this case in the way have never done before. Finally we achieved our goal, which the shoulder buttons were covered by the GripCase meanwhile remain the original keystroke sense.We also designed a Carry Case to store the SWITCH with GripCase on. This Carry Case can swallow almost everything you can imagine, such as power bank, adaptor, USB cable, headset, game cards, joy-con grips and etc. The GripCase and the Carry Case can be the ultimate solution for your NINTENDO SWITCH.Huge Storage Space In-Case Charging(Note:  The L shaped (angled) USB-C cable is not included in the pledge rewards.)With our carrying case, charging your SWITCH while you traveling could never be so easy. There is no worry about bending the USB port. We give our carrying case a large storage space (6.1" (L) * 4.7" (W) * 1.3" (H) / 155mm (L) * 120mm (W) * 34mm (H)). So there is plenty room for your power bank and cables. By using the L shaped (angled) USB-C cable , your SWITCH is able to get juice from the power bank when both of them stay in the carrying case, as the picture showed above.Of course, the power bank will generate extra heat when charging the SWITCH in the carrying case. Please see the temperature testing results for your reference.We found that most of the heat came from the power bank. According to our tests, the power bank generated extra 44.6℉(7℃) after 1 hour charging and 53.6℉(12℃) after 2 hours. The temperature of SWITCH only increased by 41℉(5℃) and 50℉(10℃) correspondingly. We think the heat is still in a tolerable range. But we suggest the gamers who do care about the extra heat, could always take the power bank outside the carrying case when charging the Switch (as the following picture showed).Mesh Pocket Upgrade Our team upgraded the mesh pocket by giving a top flap on the original mesh pocket. Now you are able to put small stuff in the mesh pocket without falling. We also upgraded its material, using the 3-layer sandwich mesh instead of the 1 layer mesh. The sandwich mesh is 1mm thick, has 2 mesh layers with a sponge layer in the middle, which provides great protection to your console.Only US$5.00 per set, including 1 pair of SnapGrip and 1 pair of TriggerGrip. You will get to select your color options via a survey sent out. Skull & Co. is established by a group of young people who love video games, we are designers, engineers, sourcing managers and etc. but we have one thing in common, games! From the beginning, we discovered that it was near impossible to find a well-designed third party gaming accessory in the market. They were made from a view of engineers not gamers. So we decided to make our own products from the point of view of a gamer. Our team became more and more experienced while creating our products.This project is much bigger than any of our previous projects; also this is something we feel most passionately about. We need funds to invest on the tooling and people to follow and support this project. Our prototype has indicated to us that this is a great design and it can be mass produced smoothly. Our manufacture partner is ready to go. With support from Indiegogo, we can speed up this project and make this GripCase reality.We have made a wide range of products in the past, while our team became bigger and more experienced. We have made few prototypes to polish this product and each prototype have made our goal of mass production more feasible. Our manufacture partner and us have solved every problem we have anticipated in facing in the process of bring this product to the market. We are mostly focused in the tooling in creating this product, any mistake or change can lead to delay in shipping of the products.Based on our past experience, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 6-8 weeks, but we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.

story:
A unity multiplayer first person shooter, but not yet another

You may have heard of games like "Into the war" and may have lost faith in Early Access and multiplayer fps' in Unity3D. Let me tell you one thing, the developers of these games have.. almost done nothing. They just use so called FPS Kits and publish their games on greenlight, maybe made a few changes that breake these kits or at least make them worse. This is not what we do.

What is Police Infinity about?

In general, Police Infinity is about the typical Police & Terrorists, but we don't care as much about a good story in a multiplayer only title as we do for a good gameplay.

The Gameplay

For the gameplay, we are going for a mix of Modern FPS and a Counter Strike style of game. For game modes there will be many game modes but the focus will be on a Counter Strike style bomb mode mixed with a hostage mode with the hostages being a secondary objective. Soon we will release a new gameplay video. The old videos don't represent the game anymore at all.

Leveling?

We do realise many players want leveling in a multiplayer shooter and we are going to include leveling. BUT: The important equipment and guns will be unlocked from the beginning. As your level increases you will only unlock attachments, camos and skins.

Maps?

For maps, we decided to go for a modern scenario that could happen in real life. That's all you need to know for the first but soon you will find out more about the maps as we publish videos & screenshots.

Netcode.

If you've played one of the unity games we mentioned above you will know that these have miserably netcode. This is caused to the most using a networking solution called Photon Cloud which lets the game "room" run in a cloud and have everything calculated client side. We have decided to use a very different networking solution called Bolt Networking. It allows us to have authorative servers with the "holy grail" of hit detection.

Goals

In general, the more money we get - the more features we can put in the game. For hosting a very basic server so you can play, 100 euro are already enough to launch the game with its very basic gameplay. But every cent counts right? Thats why we choose flexible founding. 

How can you help us?

Obviously the thing that helps us the most is if you donate to our indiegogo campaign. If you can't donate you can still help us by voting for us on steam greenlight! This also helps us really much. Sharing this page also helps us much!

story:
INTRO:

One year ago we tried making a huge MMO. The funding campaign never raised enough money to begin the project. I learned from that loss and spent a year improving the methods I used. I decided that I would build the core game alone, and only when it was functional would I attempt another project

 

The Unusual thing about this project is that it is a Working Prototype! The world is available to play and explore in as we continue to build it. I spent 6 weeks writing code every waking minute to make that happen. You can create a character, participate in Spell combat and earn experience towards higher levels in two different game environments.

The game can be played as we develop it here:

http://www.facebook.com/appcenter/rogueunderworld

 

The Technology:

Rogue UnderWorld uses the following technology. It is Fully Functional with all these packages:

  • Unity
  • Vostopia
  • Playtomic
  • Photon Cloud
  • Roar Engine


THE CONCEPT:

I wanted a SteamPunk world that was either Multi-Player or a Casual MMO. I love the idea of mixing Edgar Allan Poe, Jules Verne with an environment similar to the Hellboy films. In my personal Art these themes dominate my work.

In the game I want people to be able to play a standard shooter or spend their time exploring, crafting, mining, or following quests. I've been making art for a very long time, and the first rule is, "Have the Proper Tools.".


Building out a raw game that has the proper functionality allows us to free our minds of those concerns and focus on telling a Great Story! This is where we are at, at this moment in time.

In Rogue Underworld the British Empire has conquered the known world. The rules of Society are everything. The chances to improve yourself within society are slim without the proper background. As a Rogue you go against the norm of society.

ROGUE:

  • 1. Operating outside normal or desirable controls.
  • 2. An unprincipled, deceitful, and unreliable person; a scoundrel or rascal.
  • 3. One who is playfully mischievous; a scamp.
  • 4. A wandering beggar; a vagrant
  • 5. A vicious and solitary animal.
  • 6. An organism that shows an undesirable variation from a standard.


PRODUCTION AND FUNDING:
I am very open to working with other artists, writers, distributors and financiers. I have self-funded the project up to this point. Anyone is free to contact us through the Rogue Community Page or the Steam Concept Page:

http://www.facebook.com/RogueUnderworldCommunity

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=116187841


Distribution:

Facebook is our initial Test-Bed. Afterward we hope to launch on Steam and the iPad. Android and Xbox would be afterwards.

story:
What is Forgotten Myths?

Forgotten Myths is a free to play online collectible card game that incorporates deck building, card collection and strategic gameplay in a fantastic historical background. You can complete daily quests to gain experience and gold, compete against other players in ladder games and tournaments, and make duels where you can win bounty and cards.

The core card game is most similar to the classic Magic the Gathering. However the gameplay is still unique as it incorporates a much faster style than MtG. The objective is simply to defeat your opponent by reducing his/her life to zero. The battlefield is divided into zones where your attack and fortification cards will go. In order to provide you with a fast and dynamic gameplay, attack phases in Forgotten Myths are automatic. To further add to the strategy, there are fortification and enchantment cards to improve attack cards, as well as various card abilities and spell cards.

Beyond the core game, there is a RPG style level progression and tournament ladder. You can both advance in levels and ranks, while challenging other players in multiplayer tournaments.
 

Core Gameplay Overview Video

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mkmTwVjdEls

 

What We Need & What You Get

Whether we reach our goals or not, all the money we will raise will go towards developing the game and adding more and more features to the existing version. We will also be focusing some of our efforts towards carrying the game to other platforms. We really want to see our game on multiple platforms including iOS and Android.

Since we already have a fully working beta version of the game, our backers can be rest assured that their contributions will not be in vain.

You can check the perks and see what we have in store for our backers!

 

Promo Card: Coradian Spiritdancer

 
 

Stretch Goals

For every stretch goal we achieve, we will be offering new and exciting features in the game and we will be designing a new promo card exclusive to our backers!

Goal #1 - 200 Backers

We will introduce a new questline, with a great story and awesome rewards.

Goal #2 - $17,500 Raised

We will be modeling 3 more battlefields, each with a unique theme and cool visual effects.

Goal #3 - $20,000 Raised

We will be introducing 2 more factions to the game, with amazing new cards and abilities.

Goal #4 - $25,000 Raised

We will be adding another 3D city to the game, with new features and quests, initially only accessible by our backers.

Why develop Forgotten Myths?

As avid TCG players, fantasy enthusiasts and hardcore gamers, our ultimate dream was to create a long lasting TCG with a great community of players. With a small team and no outside funding, we managed to reach our first major milestone, which was a browser version of the working game. However, we have high hopes for Forgotten Myths and we do not want to stop here; with the help of fellow TCG players, fantasy enthusiasts and gamers, we believe that we can create a high quality, enjoyable and engaging cross-platform online TCG.

We feel that a crowdfunding platform such as Indie Gogo will allow us to connect with you, who -in the end- will make this game live, breathe and jump. Now that we took the project to the closed beta stage on the web, we feel that the timing is right and we can bring Forgotten Myths to a whole new level with your support!

 

Whether you pledge or not, you can help!

You can always visit our website and check out the simplest version of the game. We value your feedback and would like to hear what you think about the game in our forums.
 
Come visit our page on Indie DB and help us spread the word.
 
Stay in touch with us via our facebook page.
 

Some of the Game Features:

  • Free to Play – You can acquire every card in-game by buying booster packs using earned currency, as long as you can devote more time in the game. This is the good free to play, no "energy gates" or "exclusive to buying with real world cash" cards.
  • Doma City - 3D Starting Zone- Players will be immersed in this 3D environment where they will be able to access main game features.
  • RPG Style Level and Rank Progression- You will be able to advance in levels and ranks to unlock special content and rewards, and compete in monthly leader boards.
  • "Duel" Mode - We're designing a hard core duel mode, where players will be able to bet cards from their collections against other players in a "winner takes all" duel. 
  • "Multiplayer Co-op" Mode -You will fight against dreadful monsters and sinister characters in a co-op mode where you will be able to fight in groups of 2 or 4.
  • Immersing 3D Effects- Majority of the cards in Forgotten Myths have a specially designed 3D effect associated with an action or an ability; this is the true evolution of Trading Card Games to Digital.
  • Simultaneous Gameplay - Each attack turn is taken at the same time allowing for constant interaction and positioning tactics.
  • Remote Turn-Based Multiplayer – Play games with anyone in the world, from anywhere with internet access.
  • Hardcore Strategy - Most digital trading card games have oversimplified and gone all mainstream with their game mechanics. We've done the opposite and increased strategic depth by including positioning, and allowing different card types on the field.
  • Comprehensive Ever Changing Single Player Campaign - We have an in depth Single Player Campaign, that will have new maps, AIs and new quests added to it frequently.
  • Transformable Battlefield - The default 3D Battlefield can be changed by unlocking quest rewards that allows you to completely change or customize the table top battlefield.

Prologue

It was a time when mankind wages wars with steel and arrows, on horse and on foot, with politics and poison. Science and technology were starting to become servants of men, while mysteries and magic were still not forgotten. The time when kingdoms and empires rose and fell, and all the creatures and beasts that would long be forgotten in myths and legends still roamed free on this world.

Long before mankind started to measure the time he traveled through and the sands of time flew adrift, something happened that would change the fates of us all. Something, or someone, touched the hourglass.

In the center of the world, on the lands that would later be called the cradle of life and civilization; three masters emerged. Three rulers, each different than the other; but each, still very much alike.

Mara, Lord of Esmergon; ruler of bright skies and open steppes; master of noble knights, brave horse lords and mighty griffins; leader of the White Cavalry that brought swift justice to the unholy.

Thengel, Red Shield; a fearsome warlord who crushed her enemies with fearless mercenaries, heavy shielded infantries and giant war elephants; ruling the scorched lands and endless deserts.

Khubera, the Black One; whom, with the power of his immortal assassins and sinister dragons that haunted the worst nightmares; held the lords of all the kingdoms in his grip, trembling in fear by just a whisper of his name.

We did not have any information about the coming of the three. But they were so powerful that their struggle tore down the skies, boiled the oceans, crushed the mountains and destroyed the plains.

Some claimed that this conflict was merely a shadow of an everlasting celestial war that covered the known universe. Some claimed that the three masters were just kings upon men, and their conflict was mortal. Others simply shrugged, and chose to claim nothing. While the ultimate truth about the three kings still remains a mystery, hints and clues about this age remained and were foretold as parts of myths and legends.

It does not matter who I am or how I know all these things; as I will not give you the answers to your questions, neither will I try to explain how everything has ended. I will only tell you jow this story has begun.

The power to forge this epic saga is now in your hands...

 

Doma City - Work in Progress

New Cross Platform GUI - Work in Progress

Current Factions

        White Cavalry               Red Shield                  Black Tower

 

 

Wallpapers

 

Final Thanks

Every single one of us at Anchora Games is ultra thankful for your time, pledges and sharing of this Indie GoGo.

We look forward to delivering an incredible product along with your incredible rewards.

story:
The Sisters of Cheyenne Point - Alpha v1.2.1 has been released!


What is The sisters of Cheyenne Point?

"The sisters of Cheyenne Point" (by Superstar Catalyst Project) is a school adventure dating simulation game based on "SCP-069-J - Sisters of Cheyenne Point" by "Aelanna":http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-069-j. You play as a male student who have just moved to a new school called Cheyenne Point Academy.

Characters

  • Vinny Bright / Player: Winston "Vin" Bright, a male student just moved to Cheyenne Point Academy after having a mental breakdown at his previous school. His friends call him "Vinny". (Student Number: 1069-0590)
  • Karen Lynfield: Karen "Break" Lynfield. Strong, pushy, and outwardly confident. She is the head of the Sisters Club and saves Vinny from a group of bullies on his first day of school at Cheyenne Point Academy. (Student Number: 1069-3010)
  • Beatrice Bjornsen: Athletic and full of energy, Beatrice always wins at sports, but seems to worry whether others see her as being immature. She has never had a boyfriend, and hopes to find someone who can see her for who she really is. (Student Number: 1069-3241)

  • Rachel Mackenzie: Smart and caring, Rachel is one of the top students at Cheyenne Point Academy and loves to cook for the Sisters Club as well. Though she is the most loving and reliable person you've ever met and everyone seems to turn to her when they need someone to talk to, she seems to be hiding something from the people around her. (Student Number: 1069-3421)

  • Matt Kondraki: Abrasive and arrogant, Kondraki is the captain of the fencing team, and is a spoiled, rich jerk who always gets what he wants. Despite his abusive attitude, he has a lot of 'henchmen' and many girls compete for his attention. (Student Number: 1069-2117)

Soundtrack

01.  "Prelude in C (BWV 846)" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)


02. "Bright Wish" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)


03. "Sunshine" (Karen theme) by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)


04. "Feelin Good" (Beatrice theme) by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)


05. "Danse Morialta" (Rachel theme)  by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)


02/14/2014, Starting Indiegogo campaign

Hello, everyone. This is Dennis Kim, producer of the project. You may have heard of the SCP Foundation or SCP: Containment Breach (a.k.a. SCP: CB). I've played a lot of games based on the SCP Foundation and they were totally awesome. Now me and my friends are making a SCP game ourselves. I hope you like it and support us to make our game better. If you have some question, please email at TheSistersofCheyennePoint@gmail.com.

03/23/2014, Alpha v1.0!

Hello, It's been a while!, everyone. "The Sisters of Cheyenne Point - Alpha v1.0" is now available on Windows x86, Macintosh x86, Linux x86/x86_64. We hope you enjoy. Feedback is always welcome: TheSistersofCheyennePoint@gmail.com.

04/04/2014, Alpha v1.1!

"The Sisters of Cheyenne Point - Alpha v1.1" is now available. We fixed some dialogue and changed sound effects. You can check "Changelist.txt". <Special thanks to Carlos Solís>

Contact us

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSistersofCheyennePoint

deviantART: http://CheyennePoint.deviantart.com/

Twitter: http://twitter.com/CheyennePoint

Pixiv: http://pixiv.me/cheyenne_point

Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=231726141

E-mail: SuperstarCatalystProject@gmail.com

A notice from Superstar Catalyst Project

██/█/200█, We lost our only prototype of The Sisters of Cheyenne Point. According to a witness, a man with blond hair took it and suddenly disappeared. If you see a DVD case as below or have some information about it, please call our team.

The Sisters of Cheyenne Point is based on "SCP-069-J - Sisters of Cheyenne Point" by "Aelanna": http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-069-j.

The Cheyenne Point Academy logo is based on "Cheyenne Point Academy school crest" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wdfiles.com/local--files/media/CPA-Crest.png.

The front cover of The Sisters of Cheyenne Point prototype is based on "Front Cover of SCP-069's Case" of "Aelanna": http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-069-j/scp-069-front.png.

Vinny Bright is based on "Vinny Bright" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wikidot.com/character:vinny-bright.

Karen Lynfield is based on "Karen Lynfield" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wikidot.com/character:karen-lynfield.

Beatrice Bjornsen is based on "Beatrice Bjornsen" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wikidot.com/character:beatrice-bjornsen.

Rachel Mackenzie is based on "Rachel Mackenzie" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wikidot.com/character:rachel-mackenzie.

Matt Kondraki is based on "Matt Kondraki" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wikidot.com/character:matt-kondraki.

Mr. Clef is based on "Mr. Clef" by "Aelanna": http://scp-069-j.wikidot.com/character:mr-clef.

The Superstar Catalyst Project logo is based on the logo by "far2": http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-89371#post-289530.

story:
We're Changing Lives......Help Us Grow!

BCI was founded in 2004 to challenge professional basketball players to grow deeper in their faith, walk alongside their peers, and share their life experiences with fansand kids. Since then, BCI Basketball Plus Camps have connected more than 10,000 kids-in 20 U.S. cities and around the world - with high quality pro players. Our success with this program has been fueled by scholarships, donations, volunteers, and pro players who want to step up as role models!

We want to influence more kids around the world who haven't had a BCI Basketball Plus opportunity by connecting them with basketball pros online,  So we are introducing:    

BCI Courtside Live - a real-time, interactive video chat with the pros about the practical and spiritual aspects of life in the professional basketball world!  

Here's how BCI Courtside Live works:  First you'll log in to watch a live interview between pro players and a BCI host.  Then, you can text questions - and you could be selected to join the chat via video!  The result!  An interactive, engaging, and kid-friendly experience - where everyone (including the next generation of heroes and their parents) can connect with role models:  pro basketball players who've really stepped up their game.

More Opportunities. More Kids.

When you back Basketball Club Internataional, you're helping us provide LIFE-CHANGING opportunities for pro basketball players to interact with fans and kids.  Here are just a few other examples:

  • Connecting non-profits organizations with integrity-and values-driven pro players, especially for kids-focused events.
  • Youth Leadership Summits, where BCI adds values-based support to a group of non-profits and government service agencies that focus on an entire community.
  • U.S. and international BCI Clinics, short-and-sweet (with lasting impact!) kids' skills programs featuring pro players.

What Do You Think?

Do you believe that athlete celebrity influence is inevitable? Do you think kids are especially vulnerable to the messages they hear from the pros? 

We believe the answer is yes and YES. Every day, kids emulate professional athletes through their clothing, behavior, choices, and their values. Athletes endorse products in exchange for millions of dollars which, in turn, reinforces their celebrity image. It's a cycle, and we all buy into it -- especially kids.

Do you think that a cycle of influence can be awesome if there's a great message? Well, we KNOW it!

Kelenna Azubuike, NBA, at a BCI Basketball Plus Camp

Stepping Up, Reaching Out

Basketball Club International (BCI) was founded to support professional basketball players who are willing to step up their game. This means holding themselves and each other accountable for their choices -- so that, together, they may influence the next generation in a positive way.

The funds from this campaign will be used to expand the reach of BCI's connection with professional basketball players globally, providing these men with support through BCI Loop (and opportunities through BCI Leads) so they can be the best role models and influencers to kids around the world. See our program list below and watch our Indiegogo video!

We believe that over the next 5 to 10 years, BCI will become an indispensable part of the professional basketball machine. A strong "loop" of players who support each other in a personal, meaningful way will inspire the younger generation to carry themselves at a level higher – higher,  perhaps, than the circumstances that produced them.

One NBA All-Pro asked a group of BCI Players at a leadership summit, "Can you imagine what an impact BCI will have worldwide?" Well, we have imagined it. We're doing it! Now, we're asking you to add your voice to ours by joining this amazing movement.

In China at a Mandarin/English School during a BCI Basketball Clinic

A Win - Win

Our fundraising goal is $100,000. We are continually blessed with new and exciting opportunities for growth, and your contribution today will allow us to expand throughout the global community by:

  • Expanding the influence among professional basketball players.
  • Expanding the players' influence with kids through more initiatives.
  • Hiring more staff.
  • Implementing a technology platform (mobile access to a peer-driven, supportive world).

BCI's programs and activities are designed to offer opportunities for professional basketball players to “step up their game” and share faith-based values with each other and with everyone they influence.

  • BCI Loop - A fraternity for pro basketball players "on the path," led by athlete leaders.
  • BCI Players' Retreat - An opportunity for pro basketball players to meet for a weekend of "get real" peer support.
  • BCI App: Your Turn - A mobile application designed to challenge and encourage individuals in both the spiritual and practical aspects of their life.
  • BCI Edge - Our competitive professional basketball team.
  • BCI Leads - Our community outreach initiative which includes our Basketball Plus Camps, facilitated as freestanding camps or integrated into other youth events.

BCI Edge in the Haarlem Basketball Tournament - Amsterdam

Take the Ball (literally!)

Add your voice to ours - every contribution will make our voice stronger!

We will be thanking you with gifts like BCI branded items, Sharm Scheuerman's book "Step Up Your Game," and other unique items. Please check out our perks.

 

A camper at BCI Basketball Plus Camp in Compton, CA

The Impact

This campaign will provide opportunities for:

  • More professional players to find common ground and encourage each other in their unique roles as leaders.
  • More community outreach initiatives where players can to be vulnerable as they share their values and real-life experiences with the next generation of heroes.

A BCI Edge player sharing life experiences with kids at a clinic in Amsterdam

People Are Talking!

"Our young people were clearly thrilled to interact with such an energetic and upbeat group of Americans. The players served as positive role models and represented the United States of America with Distinction.  We deeply appreciate your willingness to volunteer your time for the clinic, which helped to foster mutual understanding between our countries and build character in young people." 

-- Ellen Dankelman, U.S. Embassy, The Hague


“On behalf of all of our kids that were able to attend your camp, a heart-felt thank you. It was the talk of the school today. Many of the kids that we work with have limited opportunities to be in an environment of such energy and fellowship. The men that shared their experiences and talents really left a lasting impression – that will last for a lifetime.”

-- Rev. Leon Kelly, Open Door Youth Gang Alternatives

"BCI Edge takes what's great about basketball; the excitement, the fans, the competition and frames it with a public commitment to ideals.  This organization is out here playing a top-level game while helping international communities.  I applaud what they are doing.

-- Bob Costas

Co-Founder Sharm Scheuerman in China

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you make a monetary contribution or not, we would like you to share our campaign with your network of friends, co-workers and family. 

Please remember to:

  • Share this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, LinkedIn and any other social media platforms you may use. 
  • Go to our Facebook page and LIKE us.
  • Follow us on Twitter and tweet/retweet about the campaign.
 
Thanks so much for adding your voice to ours!  We hear you!

 

Basketball Club International, Inc is a sub-ordinate corporation of the Fellowship of Christian Athletes, a 501 (c) (3) charitable organization, and is included in the group exemption of FCA.

 

Perks

 


BCI Virtual High Five

 

 BCI Key Chain - Authentic Basketball Leather

BCI T-Shirt


 Sharm Scheuerman's Book

 

 

 

BCI Drawstring Bag - Authentic Basketball Leather

BCI Backpack - Authentic Basketball Leather

BCI Duffle Bag - Authentic Basketball Leather
