story:
We are determined to make this game no matter what. With your help, we can make it greater, and faster. You will receive your rewards whether we reach our goal or not. You have our deepest gratitude and appreciation. Your voice will be heard and you can make a difference.

Montas is an Oculus Rift compatible first person survival horror adventure game that focuses heavily on exploration, immersion, atmosphere, story and interactivity. The player is cast into a dark and mysterious world with little introduction, and must do what is necessary to survive on a twisted ride full of intrigue and drama. 



Story of Montas
You wake up at the desk of Joseph Walker, an accountant working for a firm in the city of Montas. 

Normal life for Joseph has become a distant memory, haunted by nightmares of events that didn't happen, and cursed with unsettling hallucinations wherever he goes. As a result of stress and anxiety, Joseph is now an alcoholic.

Paranoia is growing, and the situation worsens when police begin to question locals about recent murders in the area. What is happening to Joseph?... and what is Montas hiding?


Features of Montas

  • Run, hide or mislead your enemies
  • Use the environment to your advantage, if it's not already out to get you
  • Uncover vast underground labyrinths occupied by the unknown
  • Discover secret areas and complete optional adventures
  • Explore numerous environments and conditions; bright, dark, new, old, safe, dangerous, real and imaginary
  • Persistent death no longer forces the player to retrace progress after failure, instead changes the direction and story of the game
  • Intense atmosphere that keeps you on edge
  • Play using keyboard or controller
  • Available for Windows and Mac
  • Full compatibility with the Oculus Rift


ADVENTURE
HORROR
SURVIVAL
EXPLORATION
PLATFORMING
PUZZLE SOLVING

The player is the audience, Montas is the play, and you are invited up on stage.
www.welcometotheopera.com

 

Where will the Money go?

Software

Commercial Licenses for more advanced industry standard developer software.

Hardware

Extra hard drives to accommodate the ever expanding project database, microphones for professional audio recording, and additional monitors for speedy work flow.

Artistic Input

Outsourced talent from artists, musicians and voice actors. There are many brilliant people willing to contribute their work to make Montas a more vibrant world, and we want to see them compensated for their efforts.

Promotion

Montas needs to be seen up close and in person, and we are working hard to prepare a polished demo of the game to exhibit around the world at gaming conferences and events. Flights, accommodation and tickets can be expensive.

 

Montas News and Interviews 

Welcome to the Opera of Horror - Indie Games

http://indiegames.com/2012/09/welcome_to_the_opera_of_horror.html

A Chat with Garth Robertson - Game Arena

http://www.gamearena.com.au/news/read.php/5115361

A Wealth of Hallucinations - Rock Paper Shotgun

http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2012/10/22/a-wealth-of-hallucinations-montas/#more-128907

Survival Horror Game uses Oculus Rift for Ultimate Scares - Cinema Blend

http://www.cinemablend.com/games/Montas-Survival-Horror-Game-Uses-Oculus-Rift-Ultimate-Scares-46425.html

Montas is an Oculus Rift compatible first person survival horror adventure game that focuses heavily on exploration, immersion, atmosphere, story and interactivity. The player is cast into a dark and mysterious world with little introduction, and must do what is necessary to survive on a twisted ride full of intrigue and drama. 
Story of MontasYou wake up at the desk of Joseph Walker, an accountant working for a firm in the city of Montas. Normal life for Joseph has become a distant memory, haunted by nightmares of events that didn't happen, and cursed with unsettling hallucinations wherever he goes. As a result of stress and anxiety, Joseph is now an alcoholic.Paranoia is growing, and the situation worsens when police begin to question locals about recent murders in the area. What is happening to Joseph?... and what is Montas hiding?Features of Montas

Run, hide or mislead your enemies
Use the environment to your advantage, if it's not already out to get you
Uncover vast underground labyrinths occupied by the unknown
Discover secret areas and complete optional adventures
Explore numerous environments and conditions; bright, dark, new, old, safe, dangerous, real and imaginary
Persistent death no longer forces the player to retrace progress after failure, instead changes the direction and story of the game
Intense atmosphere that keeps you on edge
Play using keyboard or controller
Available for Windows and Mac
Full compatibility with the Oculus Rift


ADVENTUREHORRORSURVIVALEXPLORATIONPLATFORMINGPUZZLE SOLVINGThe player is the audience, Montas is the play, and you are invited up on stage.www.welcometotheopera.com















 
Where will the Money go?
Software
Commercial Licenses for more advanced industry standard developer software.
Hardware
Extra hard drives to accommodate the ever expanding project database, microphones for professional audio recording, and additional monitors for speedy work flow.
Artistic Input
Outsourced talent from artists, musicians and voice actors. There are many brilliant people willing to contribute their work to make Montas a more vibrant world, and we want to see them compensated for their efforts.
Promotion
Montas needs to be seen up close and in person, and we are working hard to prepare a polished demo of the game to exhibit around the world at gaming conferences and events. Flights, accommodation and tickets can be expensive.
 
Montas News and Interviews 
Welcome to the Opera of Horror - Indie Games
http://indiegames.com/2012/09/welcome_to_the_opera_of_horror.html
A Chat with Garth Robertson - Game Arena
http://www.gamearena.com.au/news/read.php/5115361
A Wealth of Hallucinations - Rock Paper Shotgun
http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2012/10/22/a-wealth-of-hallucinations-montas/#more-128907
Survival Horror Game uses Oculus Rift for Ultimate Scares - Cinema Blend
http://www.cinemablend.com/games/Montas-Survival-Horror-Game-Uses-Oculus-Rift-Ultimate-Scares-46425.html

story:
What is SphereWars?

Web / English Forum / Spanish Forum / SphereShop

SphereWars is a 28mm miniatures fantasy wargame in a World, Saphir, created by four gods who play with the races they conceived.

Discover a dynamic skirmish game of 28mm miniatures in which You will Never Play Alone.

Go deep in a whole new concept of fantasy where every race, created by different Gods, is forging its own destiny. 

Download the Rulebook in pdf format.

Three Superior Combatants are required

The biggest miniatures in Saphir are about to arrive. Some are so huge that other miniatures will climb their backs... or be crushed by their toenails!

We need at least 6.000€ to sculpt and cast three superior combatant miniatures: Ikarus, Hinos and Ratfuten that will complete the two existing ones: Leviathan and Werebull. We already have some concepts and the rules of these and, in order to build them, we offer you the possibility to obtain the bands' starter packs and build your full band with the existing miniatures.

These miniatures are going to be really big, take as an example the superior combatant of the Scions of Kurgan, the Leviathan. The Leviathan will look small next to Hinos or the Ratfuten because... these will have Imps and Kluchs mounted on them!!!

We have a wide range of perks, from the cheapest to the most complete perks with everything-we-have for very interesting prices. We have prefered to keep this campaign with few new miniatures in order to deliver it to you before the 2012 year ends, but if we achieve some of our goals we plan to start giving you some interesting extras of forecoming bands and special edition miniatures of current bands, it is in your hand!!

Recommended Perks

Most of them are quite clear, because they include something specific. But some other include choices and the possibility to add some options, so we made some diagrams to clarify these Perks with some complexity.

The Warrior Combatant is your perk if you like one band and know other players who will also pick this perk in order to start combating. 

The Elite Combatant is the choice if you want to give the game a try with a couple or bands or just want test if miniature gaming may be interesting for you and a friend who may ocassionally come to your home.

 

The Superior combatant is the choice for those players who already have a band and want to play bigger skirmish at 1.000 points using the Superior combatants or collectors who like one or more Superior combatants (the actual aim of this campaign).

 

The Avatar combatant is ideal if you are a couple of friends who want to start playing with two different bands or you want to start playing but you are not sure about which band suits more your game style. Note that the Avatar combatant is a really special price limited to 50 units. GAME INFO: each band has nearly 400 points (including the Starter Pack and one of the Leaders) additional miniatures add extra points.

The Leader combatants are ideal if you fell in love with one or more specific bands or you want to collect a full band of miniatures. GAME INFO: each band has nearly over 1000 points: Scions of Kurgan 1500p, Alliance 1550p, Packs of Urueh 1250p, Adepts of Malesur 1200p, Newborns 1400p.

The God of Saphir is for those who want it all. You want a miniature of each for an incredible price with a 40% of discount. GAME INFO: all miniatures are around 5700 points.

Stretch goals

€500 Goal: ORDERS

If you contributed a Warrior, Elite o Superior Combatant, you get 4 orders of your band.
If you contributed an Avatar Combatant, you get 4 orders of two bands.
If you contributed a Leader Combatant, you get 4 orders of three bands.
If you contributed a God of Saphir, you get 4 orders of all five bands.

€1500 Goal: NEOPHYTE

The Neophyte is a Regular Combatant of the Newborns band

If you contributed a Warrior, Elite o Superior Combatant you get 1 Neophyte (or a miniature of your choice under 10€).
If you contributed an Avatar Combatant you get 2 Neophyte (or 2 miniatures of your choice under 10€).
If you contributed a Leader Combatant you get 3 Neophyte or 3 miniatures of your choice under 10€).
If you contributed a God of Saphir you get 5 Neophyte or 5 miniatures of your choice under 10€).

€3000 Goal: BORYENKA

The first miniature of the new band to come: The cursed of Malakoy...

Son of the fallen king Jeryk Malakoy, Boryenka is going to be a favourite! The very first miniature of an expected new band we'll release during 2013.

Once achieved the Stretch Goal, you get this incredible miniature for free if you contributed with an Avatar, Leader or God Perk. You can also get it paying €12 extra with the rest of Perks.

€4500 Goal: Yenay the Mantis 

The last leader in the Adepts of Malesur can be released if we achieve this goal. 

 

Yenay was an Agent of Malesur who operated in Darlime for many years, helping those faithful to the Father intending to travel to the Forest of Lilean. During that time, she was one of the Legion of the One Hundred Hearts´ most wanted people, and huge rewards were offered for her head. After two decades as a representative of the Adepts of Malesur in Darlime, she finally embarked with Shaogi and travelled to the Forest of Lilean for the first time after so many years of devotion to Malesur. She was welcomed there with all the honours by all her brothers and sisters, among whom there were those she had helped to leave Darlime to start a new life in the Forest of Lilean themselves.

You can see all our products here

Some background

The main features of SphereWars are:

  • An incredible gameplay dinamism, which requires both players to pay attention to the game, not only during their turn, but also during the opponent's turn. Both players can make interrupts to avoid being attacked or change skills so that attacking you can backfire on your opponent (or yourself :))
  • SphereWars is settled in a whole new world of fantasy, 'Saphir', with groundbreaking bands and backgrounds that allow us creating spectacular miniatures.

Please note that all miniatures require some assembly and painting. Most are metal-cast but the Superiors and the War machines that are cast in resin.

These are the gods of Saphir:

  • Kurgan, the God of Ice, who also shows predilection for warfare, 
    battles and martial harshness. He instils a high passion for combat in his creations and shapes mighty, fierce beings who frequently prove themselves to be true predators.His children in Saphir are the Scions of Kurgan, both soimi and regor.
  • Kazag, God of Incineration, he seeks for his creations to prevail by means of overwhelming numerical superiority, defeating their rivals like a swarm. His children, the Packs of Urueh, battle’s main law is simple: Why fight enemies when you can just... incinerate them?
  • Malesur, God of Wind, does not feel an excessive passion for battle or destruction, he prefers to obtain mastery over his brothers by means of the evolution of his creatures. Malesur created the humans that conform the Alliance. When they forgot their god, he favoured a few chosen and granted each of them the ability to take on the physical aspect of powerful beasts, confering them extraordinary power and strength in the process, these are the Adepts of Malesur.
  • Mohed, the God of Sand and Rock, who has a penchant to use these elements to shape his creations. Like Kurgan, Mohed takes great pleasure in duels and battles. More reserved than his brothers, Mohed only acts when the circumstances demand it and his current plans in Saphir remain unknown.
  • Salssa’el is the Goddess of Life. She is a wise and prudent being who prefers to keep apart from what she considers silly sibling rivalries. She is, therefore, the only one between the gods who has not joined the game of war raging among the spheres, and who rejects the death each and all of her four brothers cause with their endless battle, despising all of them alike.She insufflates the breath of life upon her brothers' creations. This is probably the reason why she despises how carelessly they reap hundreds of lives.She had a key role in the creation of the Newborns race, when she allowed a human to discover the power of the Quitessence. Although while her intentions were pure, her actions brought a new misfortune and evolved into new battles for power between the factions in Saphir.

The game was created in Spain and, during the last couple of years, we have stablished a faithful group of players but we really need to reach players abroad.

We think that completing the superior combatants of the three bands that are still missing them, is a good opportunity to show our game to the players outside our country and, at the same time achieve this goal of completing the superior combatants. Economy is not very well in Spain and that makes necessary to make our market to grow.

We are working on new bands that we would like to release once current five bands have all necessary miniatures. This campaign will help us to be known outside Spain and, at the same time, get enough income to ensure the continuity of the SphereWars project.

Our current bands

Scions of Kurgan

From all the Saphir creatures, is amongst the Scions of Kurgan where the most powerful and terrible can be found. They are the soimi, which together with their brother race, the regor, have become one of mankind´s (and other races in the sphere) main enemies. Not for anything the soimi are predators feeding on the vital energy of other creatures, which they absorb by sticking their tentacles in their victims. On their behalf, the regor share the hunger of their big brothers, but they lack stings. In return, they have a ferocity that make them very dangerous beings, and also their tails end in sharp blades able to inflict terrible wounds to their enemies.

Leaders

     

     

Messenger

Regular Troops

     

Average Troops

     

     

Elite Troops

     

Superior Combatant

Alliance

Among all the bands you can play in SphereWars, the Alliance is by far the one with a more medieval look, a more classical approach to the Middle Ages as we think of them nowadays. That reason makes many players to move towards them just for using a band made up of hardened knights and skilful amazons. However, these are not by far their only attractive.

You can play Alliance with any of the two factions:  The Legion of the One Hundred Hearts, composed only of man knights, The Amazons of Ishar, composed only by battler women or a combination of both in true alliance. Playing with any of them will take effect on your strenghts and weaknesses.

Leaders

     

Avatar                                                                         Messenger

     

Regular Troops

     

     

Average Troops

     

     

Elite Troops

     

Superior Combatant

Packs of Urueh

There is no other band in the SphereWars universe as versatile as the Packs of Urueh, made up of very different creatures with two things in common: all of them are the work of Kazag, god of incineration, and of course, their only aim is to destroy everything and everyone in their way. Wild and unforeseeable, we can grant you will roar with laughter as you lead these small and fiendish incinerators.

Combatants of this band may seem weak and small but the low cost of most of its disposable combatants makes Packs of Urueh bands to be overwhelming in number, being able to get rid of much stronger combatants thanks to exhaustion and small wounds.

Leaders

    

    

Avatar                                                                         Messenger

     

Regular Troops

     


Average Troops

     

 

 

Elite Troops

     

Superior combatant

                  

Adepts of Malesur

The Adepts of Malesur band is visually very attractive. That is because the leaders and troops are utterly captivating: you can find all kinds of fierce animal people which, however, display some human features.
But, of course, the attractiveness of its miniatures is not by far the only strong point of the band.

Unlike other bands, playing with them is also different due to their individual characteristics. And that is because every troop type you can choose from is focused on some specific function which, most likely, no other troop can do and their level of belief in Malesur allows transfering information between them and take effects in their comrade-in-arms.

Leaders

     

Avatar                                                                         Messenger

    

 

Regular Troops

     

     

Average Troops

     

Elite Troops

Superior combatant

 


Newborns

The Newborns emerged in Darlime motivated by the disagreement of an important amount of its inhabitants towards the One Hundred Hearts Legion's instaured government. Unlike the Legion, the Newborns potentiate and acquire all kind of new discoveries in order to evolve in several areas such as alchemy, mechanics and other sciences seriously restricted by the Legion of the One Hundred Hearts.
Leaded by the misterious Master, a man with a past and face unknown even between his followers, many are the achievements achieved during the years.

Leaders:

    

    

Messengers

         

Regular Combatants

    

Average Combatants

 

   

Elite Combatants

   

                  

Please, we need your help to make this project to be known as much as possible. We don't only want to achieve our goal but also get as much players involved in the game as possible.

story:
Who am I?

My name is Michaël Hadash. I am 19 years old and I live in the Netherlands.  I study Electrical Engineering at the Eindhoven University of Technology, but my passion is building games. Ever since I was small it was my dream to build a game and publish it. I created lots of small games, but I was never able to publish it properly. You can view my portfolio over here: http://www.dark-eclipse.nl/index.php?p=games

It is my dream to actually be able to build and publish a great game that people enjoy to the official App Store. If there are enough funds raised, this can be made possible and I would be soooo happy! :D On top of that, everyone with an iDevice will be able to download this fun to play puzzle game, and enjoy this game as much as I do. :)

 

What's this game about?

This project is about a puzzle game, Elements, in which you have to combine elements of the same type to make them vanish. When all elements are combined you complete the level and continue to the next level. The game contains lots of levels divided in level packs, each with their own style and gameplay. The game has multi-language support. In the video you might have noticed that the language is not English. However, the language of the game will adapt to the location of the user.

What We Need & What you get

The following lists what your money will be spent on. The top entries have the highest priority:

  • To be able to complete the game, I need around 50 euro's to buy resources like music, sound effects and graphics.
  • To be able to publish to the Google Play store, I need 25 euros.
  • To port the game to iOS, I need a Xamarin.IOS Licence. This licence costs 299 euro/year, but if I am lucky I can get a student licence for 99 euro/year.
  • To publish the game to the iOS App Store, I need 100 euros.

If the goal is not reached, your funds will be spent entirely on the Android/Desktop/Mac version of the game. I will buy beautiful art and music to be used in the game.

 

The Impact

My campaign really is about being able to publish the game, so that everyone can enjoy this great game on their devices.

Your contribution will make a big difference! If the funds are not entirely raised the game will become more beatiful and fun to play from each contribution, since I will be able to buy professional art! But if the funds will get raised entirely, I will buy the beautiful art AND publish it to you favorite device! So everyone in the world will be able to play this great game, thanks to you! :)

This is the first game that I am going to publish, and it is the first time that I use a fundraising website. I quickly realized publishing is very expensive, and that professional art is quite expensive as well. Therefore I joined this great fundraising website, and I hope that this will help me with my project. If you want to help with this project, you'd be so awesome! :D

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, there are ofcourse other ways in which you can help me out. It'd be great if you would like to share the word! You can post a link on facebook or anywhere else! Maybe tell a friend about it, link it to someone on Skype, anything is appreciated! Also, if you would like to see this game translated in your language, you could help me out with translating a small list of text lines into your own language!

Oh, and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools. :)

 

Thank you very much!

Michaël Hadash
story_txt:
Who am I?
My name is Michaël Hadash. I am 19 years old and I live in the Netherlands.  I study Electrical Engineering at the Eindhoven University of Technology, but my passion is building games. Ever since I was small it was my dream to build a game and publish it. I created lots of small games, but I was never able to publish it properly. You can view my portfolio over here: http://www.dark-eclipse.nl/index.php?p=games
It is my dream to actually be able to build and publish a great game that people enjoy to the official App Store. If there are enough funds raised, this can be made possible and I would be soooo happy! :D On top of that, everyone with an iDevice will be able to download this fun to play puzzle game, and enjoy this game as much as I do. :)
 
What's this game about?
This project is about a puzzle game, Elements, in which you have to combine elements of the same type to make them vanish. When all elements are combined you complete the level and continue to the next level. The game contains lots of levels divided in level packs, each with their own style and gameplay. The game has multi-language support. In the video you might have noticed that the language is not English. However, the language of the game will adapt to the location of the user.







What We Need & What you get
The following lists what your money will be spent on. The top entries have the highest priority:

To be able to complete the game, I need around 50 euro's to buy resources like music, sound effects and graphics.
To be able to publish to the Google Play store, I need 25 euros.
To port the game to iOS, I need a Xamarin.IOS Licence. This licence costs 299 euro/year, but if I am lucky I can get a student licence for 99 euro/year.
To publish the game to the iOS App Store, I need 100 euros.

If the goal is not reached, your funds will be spent entirely on the Android/Desktop/Mac version of the game. I will buy beautiful art and music to be used in the game.
 


The Impact
My campaign really is about being able to publish the game, so that everyone can enjoy this great game on their devices.
Your contribution will make a big difference! If the funds are not entirely raised the game will become more beatiful and fun to play from each contribution, since I will be able to buy professional art! But if the funds will get raised entirely, I will buy the beautiful art AND publish it to you favorite device! So everyone in the world will be able to play this great game, thanks to you! :)

I quickly realized publishing is very expensive, and that professional art is quite expensive as well. Therefore I joined this great fundraising website, and I hope that this will help me with my project. If you want to help with this project, you'd be so awesome! :D
 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, there are ofcourse other ways in which you can help me out. It'd be great if you would like to share the word! You can post a link on facebook or anywhere else! Maybe tell a friend about it, link it to someone on Skype, anything is appreciated! Also, if you would like to see this game translated in your language, you could help me out with translating a small list of text lines into your own language!
Oh, and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools. :)
 
Thank you very much!
Michaël Hadash

story:
The Next Generation

Hi, I’m Dave, creator of Last 2 Left, the world’s simplest fantasy game. Over the last several years we have been offering tons of free sports and reality TV games through our simple website. We now have over 150,000 registered Last 2 Left members!!!

With all this interest, our team has begun to build a brand new Last 2 Left platform which will include some really exciting features. Here’s a quick peek:

Games : The new Last 2 Left will offer even more games, with new settings and variations, more public games and better scoring. And, it will be super easy to invite other players too.

iPhone App and Mobile Website: With the new Last 2 Left mobile app and mobile website, you can play anywhere, anytime. There will be helpful notifications so you never miss deadlines or game invitations. This will be super handy and a great experience!!

News and More: In a version to come, you will be able get the latest news, stats, scores, and schedules. We will also provide more info about the contestants so you can make better picks in your games. This will be a great addition.

Contests and Prizes: Eventually, there will be free contests where you can win cash and fun prizes. This is what members always wanted! Winning real prizes will be awesome!

Social: The future Last 2 Left will have its own social network so you can post (and rant) about games, sports and reality shows with other members with the same interests. You can invite and group your friends, private message them and read public streams. You may even like this better than Facebook!


What We Need To Make This Happen

As you have read, we have some grand plans to make Last 2 Left really incredible for our members while keeping our games free. However, with the finances required to make these a reality, we’re asking for your help.

We need to raise $5,000 to help with current expenses and at least $10,000 to complete the base features of the first version of the iPhone app and a mobile-friendly website. The more money we can raise, the more features we can offer. 

Progress

We've already begun the development of an iPhone app and we're designing a brand new website that you can use on desktop computers, tablets and phones. It's a lot of work and will take a lot of money but were certain members will love the experience. We will make this as awesome as our funding allows.

Get Recognized!

This is your chance to be recognized as one of the first to be part of the next great app. Stake your claim of having a hand in making the next generation of Last 2 Left a reality by purchasing one of our Perks!

Contribute and Share

We definitely need your contributions but we also need you to spread the word. Please share this fundraising campaign with this link: http://igg.me/at/Last2Left through all your social networks, with your friends and with anyone you think would enjoy Last 2 Left.

story:
We began developing Turf Battles around June 1, 2014. We did so with one goal in mind, the complete and precise restoration of it's original implementation that unfortunately shut down in 2008. We have had one previous Campaign in which we raised  $6872 USD, which was $1872 more than our original goal.

Since then, we have had a lot of work done to the game!  Both visual and on the back-end. We now have a working copy of the game, with very few  bugs and unfinished content. Some of the things that have been developed since our original Indiegogo Campaign include:

  • Character Management System
  • NPC System
  • Chat System
  • Monster System
  • Drop System
  • Item System
  • PvP System
  • Buff System
  • AOE System
  • Base Skill System
  • Master Skill System
  • Transformation Skill System
  • Tribe System
  • Party System
  • Teleport System
  • Miscellaneous Content (Level Restricted Areas, Return Locations, etc)
  • Pet System
  • PK Point System & PvP Channel System
  • NPC Store System
  • Employing a strong back-end that will support the game and it's players with minimal or no lag (this is a huge back-end success).
  • Converted the games architecture to use event based systems rather than a polling system (this is a huge back-end success).

We started this campaign because there are still some features that need to be finished. We have exhausted nearly all of our resources, and need this last push in order to quickly finish the game. These systems include:

  • Trading System
  • Warehouse System
  • Quest System
  • Finishing some outsourced back-end work (this is a huge undertaking)


Upon us reaching our goal of $9000 USD, we will be releasing the game in it's first Beta Testing Phase 1-2 weeks upon the campaign's goal being reached. As well anyone who donates, will be able to unlock various Perks that will be given to them at the correct corresponding times. These perks do stack, so you can purchase 3 of the same perk for example. This will be our FINAL Indiegogo Campaign. Some of the perks offered here will NEVER be offered again, meaning some of the rewards will be a rare find in the game.

When Will The Game Come Out?

We expect that the game will be released sometime between early February and/or early March. If the campaign is a success, we will be launching into Alpha 1-2 weeks after the campaigns goal is reached. For example if the campaign goal is reached on February 1, you can expect to play sometime starting February 1st-February 15th if you have donated towards the Alpha Testing Perks in this campaign, or in our previous Indiegogo Campaign, or via our website donation page. 

Turf Battles is a 3D MMORPG unlike any other. It holds a very large emphasis on the PVP Aspect of games that makes it quite the riveting and exciting experience. Players are able to progress in Turf Battles rather quickly and engage in territorial battles against other players, either by themselves or with members of their Tribe(Guild). These battles determine ownership over Turfs that are inhabited by monsters that, when killed, drop valuable items used in upgrading character items and skills. Players must defend the Turfs from invading Tribes (Guilds). Although character progression is important, it is not the deciding factor in a battle. Players can hone their skills by cutting and stacking their skills together, much like with combo's. Skills have 0 cast time, and only a very few skills have cool downs. 

Turf Battles was released in America, but unfortunately it was later shut down. To those of you who played Turf Battles, you know of the riveting and exciting game play I'm speaking of. You probably have even followed the game through it's multiple failed versions, and even tried to play other MMORPG's. However I bet no other MMORPG but the original Turf Battles has ever given you the form of satisfaction and enjoyment that Turf Battles did. The thrill of performing time sensitive combinations of attacks, movement, and jumping in order to defeat enemy players in all out war simply does not exist in any other MMORPG.

story:
Gaghant Bab and his Khlvliks – a way of life

We'd like to restore the magical feeling of hope and faith back into society. Gaghant Bab and his Khlvliks (helpers) are the ones to ignite this feeling into our hearts with one short story. Every Khlvlik speaks to a different generation and touches us all by connecting in some way to each of us. The young girl inspiring this change within the story speaks volumes and makes us believe we can all do the same. 

Deem Communications would like to drive this feeling as far as possible! Please sponsor our crowdfunding project so that we can make sure Gaghant Bab and the Khlvliks don’t just remain trapped within a storybook. Keep an eye out for the gifts offered to our sponsors.

On New Year’s Eve, Gaghant Bab, often compared to Santa Claus, visits our homes with his 12 Khlvliks.  However, instead of bringing wrapped gift boxes, Gaghant Bab brings us seven magical Ktsiks, as decorative round tree ornaments.  These Ktsiks are gifts of wisdom, respect, peace, honesty, diligence, modesty and gratefulness.


Gaghant Bab was created during WinterFest Armenia as the main character of the festivities. WinterFest Armenia is a wintertime festival to promote and celebrate the winter-holiday spirit in Armenia. 

Raffi Niziblian, Creative Director and Founder of Deem Communications was the person who conceived both WinterFest Armenia and then Gaghant Bab and the Khlvliks. The characters and the story came to life through a series of national contests where young and old took part. Raffi has 4 children and comes from a land of snowy fairytales, Montreal, Canada. He has moved to Armenia since 2003 and has built a creative agency where ideas come to life. The agency is known in Armenia and across the Diaspora.

Deem Communications is a comprehensive creative agency with innovative communication practices and methodologies of international stature.  It  works with Armenian and international companies delivering quality marketing, advertising, media, PR, design, and event management services and stays at the forefront of media technologies with social media market and management.                                    

                

The Gaghant Bab Game App is an amazing way to promote not only fun games but also offers the chance to bring knowledge and education about Armenian culture to younger children from 3 to 6 years old.  

The app is developed in Gyumri, one of the new IT hubs of Armenia. With the help of Digital Pomegranate, young and aspiring developers will have the chance to contribute their knowledge and expertise to create a cool app for a global market. 

With your contribution to this exciting crowdfunding project, we will not only create an app for your Armenian children to enjoy and learn about their heritage, but we will ensure job development in Armenia. 

Contributions will be used to for:

-Enhancements in gaming functions

-Overall development of application

-Finalizing design and packaging 

Help us spread the spirit of Gaghant Bab - contribute and share this project with your friends and family. Merry New Year & Happy Christmas!

story:
Summary

Hi, I'm CJ Melendez. I am the EIC of RelyOnHorror.com, a horror gaming blog where I produce content in variety of forms, including video and audio. Recently my Astro Mixamp began to fail, producing a horrible static whenever the headset wire had tension on it. This static can be heard by those receiving my audio, and you can imagine how troublesome that is for recording.

I've tried to work around the issue, but as of last night it seems to have become worse, by becoming even more sensitive to my movements. 

I've spoken to Astro support and myMixamp cannot be repaired. The only alternative is to purchase the Mixamp Pro (MSRP $129.99). The previous model (which I own) has been phased out. 

*IndieGoGo requires that I put the goal at $500. I do not need that much!*

In order to continue producing content that requires my headset, I need help. I don't have enough disposable funds to drop $100+ on an unforeseen repair, and I'd like to continue doing streams on Twitch.TV channel, videos, and Rely on Horror's podcast, Whispers in the Dark without interruption. The full function of my headset also allows me to enjoy the surround sound audio in games in which I review - something that I value a lot.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm asking for just $110, because Astro support has offered to give me 25% off (+ shipping fees):

  • All funds are going straight to the Mixamp replacement
  • If anything over $110 is collected, that will cover the full cost of the headset, shipping, and IndieGoGo's fee.
  • Anyone that helps me continue making noises on the internet gets a Whispers in the Dark podcast shoutout and personal "I love you" PM.
  • If you so wish, I'll draw you a picture with my absolute HORRIBLE drawing skills. You're better off not asking for one. Seriously.
  • Don't donate a stupid amount of money. Don't unless you want me to feel bad.

The Impact

My work on Rely On Horror, same with all of the staff, is voluntary. This is an unpaid hobby for us. I've enjoyed producing content for several years, and it's essentially free. If you enjoy the things I've written, recorded, and published over the years -and want to help me avoid downtime in producing more - consider helping me out. 

Risks & Challenges

Risks? Um, if you give me $5 you're out lunch for a day (if money is tight, don't donate)

  • Paranoid Risk: The mailman loses my package if funding is met.
  • Paranoid Risk: I get a faulty Mixamp.
  • Real Risk: Astro takes back the 25% off offer they gave me in my support email, and full price is required. If so, and if funding is met, I can pay the additional $20.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Quite simply, check out my stuff! If you can't help out financially, help with some moral support and internet love for what I do! Comment, like, subscribe, yadda yadda.

story:
Welcome to the Graal Seekers community!

The crowdfunding campaign is now over! Thanks for your support! 

You can still help! Vote for Graal Seeker on Steam Greenlight.

Keep you informed by subscribing to our newsletter.

You are now joining the first adventurers of Graal Seeker. Join our community to help us making Graal Seeker the best game it can be.

 Cette page est aussi disponible en français ! 

 Sprechen Sie Deutsch? 

What is Graal Seeker?

Graal Seeker is a 2D game that blends RPG with roguelike mechanics and real-time tactical battles. It recreates the initiatory journey of a knight seeking the Holy Grail in fifth century Britain.

Features

  • Unique stories inspired by the Matter of Britain.
  • Find your Graal based on the choices you make.
  • Narrative game inspired by the Choose Your Own Adventure book.
  • Fast tactical battles. Prove your combat skills in real time.
  • Procedurally generated events and maps. You always will have different opportunities to prove your courage.
  • Permadeath and persistent world.
  • Moddability. Create and share your own Graal stories.

What is the Graal?

The Graal (or Holy Grail), the subject of myths and legends, can take several forms depending on the tradition: a chalice, a cauldron, or even an emerald. All covet it for its famed magical powers. But what is it really?

In Graal Seeker, you are an adventurer from the fifth century seeking this relic for fame, fortune, or faith. You can also join Arthur's court in his fight against the Saxons and spread justice throughout the land. But is the recent Saxon invasion related to the presence of the Holy Graal on British soil, or is it merely an excuse for territorial conquest?

From Celtic origins to Christian and esoteric texts, the quest for the Graal has inspired seekers for centuries. Graal Seeker provides a truly initiatory and introspective quest that evolves with your choices and experience. So it is the player who makes the story!

Universe

Graal Seeker's universe is inspired by the Matter of Britain, which includes both historical and mythological literature associated with Great Britain, and many other well-known sources. While many stories about the Graal take place in the high middle ages, we choose to go back to the original early middle ages. 

After Roman retreat from Britain, the Britons faced Saxon invasion and Pictish raids. You will have to choose between 12 characters to achieve your quest for the Graal. Your quest may differ depending on the nation you will choose.

The nations

There are three nations; only the Britons will be available at the beginning of the game. Playing with a different nation will change the behavior of your encounters and gives you access to a unique skill.

At this time, Britons were the main people living in England. During the Roman occupation, their traditional Celtic culture mingled with their occupiers' and they became Christians. They are struggling to protect their lands after the departure of the Roman army and restore their pagan heritage. They are a proud people with a certain appeal for honor and justice.

The Saxons were first summoned by the Britons as mercenaries to fight against the Pictish incursions. But they quickly began to enjoy the fertile lands of Britannia and now wish to conquer it. The Saxons are a nation of ruthless fighters preoccupied with the future of their people and determined to succeed whatever it takes.

The Picts are a mysterious people living in the north of Great Britain, in an area called Caledonia by the Romans. The Caledonian territory is separated from the rest of the island by Hadrian's Wall. They have never submitted to the Roman army, and they are now taking advantage of the chaos in the Briton territories to enrich themselves by raiding. The Picts are a people with a touch of madness and a love of freedom.

The classes

There are five available classes from the beginning of the game. They have different skills and attributes that open up new tactics. As you play your character will evolve and you will get to choose new skills.

The knight is an elite warrior who has sworn to protect his people against all threats and help them acquire what is best for them. He is guided by the values of loyalty, courage, and honour. He wields a large number of weapons and he is built for close-combat.

The druid was raised with the mysteries of magic and science. He is the privileged guardian of the faith and the gateway to the gods. 

The bard travels from place to place to spread his knowledge and arts through poems and songs.

The archer is specialized in ranged combat. He handles the bow with great dexterity. As a member of the army, he does what he can to protect his people.


In a time of trouble, peasants take up arms sometimes to protect themselves from raids or to establish an organized thievery.

The profiles

You will have to choose between five character profiles that change things up a bit.

  • The tenacious gives up less easily.
  • The strapping is much stronger.
  • The adroit has more agility.
  • The clever one can earn more skills when he levels up.
  • The tribune can have more choices during an event. He can convince people more easily and avoid fighting with his eloquence.

Gameplay

In Graal Seeker, you must complete three phases one after the other until you find the Graal or die.

The Exploration phase

The exploration phase allows you to choose where to go in a procedurally generated map. Would you rather tread a long, calm road or take a shortcut and face potential obstacles?

For now, it looks like this, but soon there will be roads and rivers! In this map, you can't travel from place to place at will. You have to move to a neighboring position.

Sometimes you will need to visit a specific place after accepting a quest. A quest marker will then be added. You can use your quest log to remind you of the current quests.

As a sign of commitment in your quest for the Holy Graal, your willpower may decrease or increase depending on your route. Be careful, because when your willpower reaches zero, your quest ends. Besides, a willingness to maximum makes it easier to reach the Graal.

The Event/Dialogue phase

Different events happen according to your location (such as castle, village, and forest) and your previous choices. Will the local lord welcome you? If not, how will you react?

You will have to choose between a maximum of 4 choices per event. In a same event, different choices can appear since they are linked to your previous choices, skills, profile, team and inventory. So you will probably be able to bribe a guard if you have enough money, impress a lord if you have Excalibur, or avoid a fight with Saxons if you have a Saxon in your team.

Since choices represent different actions, some icons allow you to quickly understand the action. Here is an overview of the different icons.

Remember that Graal Seeker procedurally generates content! So the same choice could lead to different results! For example, you can see a camp not far away and decide to go there. But it could be bandits or people in need. You never know until you make your decision.

The Combat

And finally, battles will bring fast combat in real-time with a tactical dimension. But be careful not to die, because there is permadeath!

How does the combat work? 

You have a team of 1 to 4 people. Most of the time you have to kill your enemy but sometimes you will have to achieve other objectives such as setting free someone or surviving multiple waves.

All fighters will automatically attack when in range, but you will have the responsibility to move your team and to select their talents. A talent is a skill that can be passive, or it may need to be activated. 

The passive ones can give you some nice advantages through the whole duration of the fight : more damage, shoot arrows farther, etc.

The active talents are handled differently. Some of them can be triggered immediately, others have a charging time before being triggered and can be interrupted by a special talent of the opponent, and some of them have a cooldown timer that prevents them from being used again immediately. During the fight you can select up to 3 talents in the talent queue of your character.

 

And of course you can cancel a talent anytime you want.

If it's too fast for you, you can just pause the fight and continue to select/cancel your talents and move your characters.
Here are some animations you could see in the combat.

What we need and what you get

Initial goal

This campaign is designed to help us focus only on Graal Seeker and give us the proper motivation to reach our goal : to release the game next year and to release a private alpha in November.

Funds

We plan to release Graal Seeker in the first quarter of 2015.  But first, there will be a private alpha and a private beta. 
Funds are allocated to materials such as graphics, stories, music and communication. It will allow us to release the game next year and provide a good alpha release in November.
Also, we estimate that 1000€ will be needed to fulfil the perks cost for the initial goal (t-shirt, silkscreen poster, postcard).
Additionally, we have of course some taxes and fees from the French government, Indiegogo and Paypal.
Finally, we have only a small portion reserved to our programmer because it's already budgeted, but a better hardware will greatly improve his work. So we have included it in this first goal!
Funds will be used as follows to hold to the deadlines as fully as possible. This chart only applies to the initial goal. We will update it once it is reached.


Perks

Please have a look at the perks right below. You will find some exclusive and awesome content. 


Consider these few details :
  • Credits : you will have your name in the game's credits depending on the perk you choose. If you want to keep your name private, it's not an issue.
  • Silkscreen poster : get an awesome poster (50 x 70 cm printed on ivory paper 250gr) screen printed by Johan Jaccob. Johan Jaccob is a talented screenprinter. He made some poster for Hellfest and the Queens Of The Stone Age. He's also a member of Glowsun, a stoner rock band. Check out the Graal Seeker poster : 
  • Silkscreen T-Shirt : get the poster design by Johan Jaccob on a t-shirt! 
  • Wood carving : exclusive wooden carved Graal by our director/programmer Ludovic Bas. Take the only Graal! 

  • Easter egg : contribute a hidden text in the game. This text may reference another piece of gaming or movie culture. It can be a reference to history or mythology as well. We will include Easter eggs in some events, item names and places names. This must not be illegal, inappropriate or irrelevant. Keep in mind that the team must approve your idea.

  • Event idea : an event in the game from your very own idea. This can be any encounter. This must not be illegal, inappropriate or irrelevant. Keep in mind that the team must approve your idea.

  • Graal idea : an idea for a quest for the Graal! Help us write your very own story for the Graal! This must not be illegal, inappropriate or irrelevant. Keep in mind that the team must approve your idea.


Choose your perk (you can buy it in the right column):


Stretch goals


    Risks and challenges

    We chose a flexible campaign because it's not an all or nothing campaign. We’ve been working on the project for six months, but we’re in the final stretch now. 

    One of our first challenges is to build a strong community around Graal Seeker to help us improve the game even while it's still in development. Making a great game will be another challenge, but we are pretty sure that we can get awesome results with all of you, especially during the alpha and beta phases! Graal Seeker is our first game and this is the main reason why we need support from you more than ever. 

    At this point, the risk we still face is in raising the funds we need to hit the release date we aim for in the first quarter of 2015. This campaign will help us get that much closer to sharing those Graal stories with the world.

      Other ways to get involved

      We understand that not everyone can contribute pledges, but there are still many ways to support the project... and for free!

      • Vote YES on Steam Greenlight to help us reach Steam. 

      • Like it on facebook and invite some friends. 
      • Follow us on twitter and give us a shout out!
      • Share it with your friends. Let them know about Graal Seeker and the crowdfunding campaign. We have a referral contest running until the 21st October. The top 5 referrers will get rewards.

        How to share:

        • Log you in on Indiegogo (be sure to be logged in before the next step)
        • Use your unique link provided by Indiegogo (the best way is to use these buttons, otherwise we can't track your referrals). 

        • Write a personal message to maximize your chance of people clicking on your link.
        • Share to your friends, family, forums and everybody to earn as much points as possible. You will earn 1 point per visitor and 10 points by € spent by your visitors.

        Rewards:

        • If you have not contributed yet: you win The Druid.
        • If you already have The Peasant, The Archer or The Druid: you win an alpha access, and a t-shirt or and Easter Egg.
        • If you have contributed for at least 20€: you win an alpha access, & a t-shirt or an Easter Egg. If you already have all of this, you win the opportunity to create an event for the game.

      • For press inquiries, please contact Thibaut Trampont.

      Thanks again for your help.

      About Lugludum

      Lugludum is a fresh indie video game studio from Lyon, France. We aim to make you explore history and mythology through great games.
      Graal Seeker is our first game and we want to make it right. 

      We set up a nice team for this project :

      • Ludovic Bas - your humble servant, Founder, Creative Director and Programmer. He worked in the web game and the e-learning industry and then founded Lugludum early this year to build his own games. He is passionate about the Graal and has read about 10 books on the topic. He is a true Graal Seeker, don't you think?
      • Laura Bevon - Freelance Illustrator and Concept Artist. She provides all the 2D art in the game. She worked for Moonga TCG, Legion of Steel and some tabletop RPGS (Wasteland, Mournblade, Vivere).
      • Amanda Goengrich - 3D Artist. She focuses on all the modeling and the animation of the characters.  Have a look at the animations during the combat, this is her creation.
      • Mélina Auer - 3D Artist. She provides texturing and animation for the characters. She does a great job creating nice looking characters during the combat.
      • Anne Toole - Freelance Writer. This is the right tool for us to have exciting storylines on Graal Seeker. Anne Toole is a WGA-nominated writer of THE WITCHER and the Emmy-winning LIZZIE BENNET DIARIES.
      • Guillaume Michalakakos - Musician, Einherjar. Very passionate about medieval reenactment and music, he plunges you into the atmosphere of medieval times with his music.
      • Thibaut Trampont - PR and communication, at Events For Games agency. He once was a teamplayer on the RPG titles The Saga of Ryzom, and Silverfall.  He helps us spread Graal Seeker worldwide.


      FAQ

      1. Will the game be released on Steam? We have a Greenlight campaign running! Help us reach Steam by voting yes!
      2. What platforms will you support for the final release? Graal Seeker will be available for Windows and Mac initially. We are currently evaluating the feasibility to support Linux. Please see stretch goals to see other platforms (tablets, WiiU). Other platforms than Windows may have some delay for the release.
      3. What languages will you support?  The game will be released initially in English and French. We have a stretch goal for additional official translations. Please help us to identify the most desired language by leaving a comment on the page. Otherwise, we will use some community driven translation tool like Crowdin to make Graal Seeker available in many more languages.
      4. What platforms will you support for the alpha/beta?  We will provide only Windows builds for the alpha and beta. We want to focus on gameplay adjustments in these early steps and not have trouble maintaining builds in all platforms.
      5. What size t-shirt can I have?  S, M, L, XL, XXL for boys and girls.
      6. Do perk costs include shipping & handling? Yes.

Welcome to the Graal Seekers community!
The crowdfunding campaign is now over! Thanks for your support! 
You can still help! Vote for Graal Seeker on Steam Greenlight.
Keep you informed by subscribing to our newsletter.
You are now joining the first adventurers of Graal Seeker. Join our community to help us making Graal Seeker the best game it can be.
 Cette page est aussi disponible en français ! 
 Sprechen Sie Deutsch?

Features

Unique stories inspired by the Matter of Britain.
Find your Graal based on the choices you make.
Narrative game inspired by the Choose Your Own Adventure book.
Fast tactical battles. Prove your combat skills in real time.
Procedurally generated events and maps. You always will have different opportunities to prove your courage.
Permadeath and persistent world.
Moddability. Create and share your own Graal stories.



What is the Graal?

tradition: a chalice, a cauldron, or even an emerald. All covet
it for its famed magical powers. But what is it really?

story:
Who we are...

My name is Vince and I have been a stay at home dad for the last four years.  A "remarkable" experience!  My son James and I used some of this time to design this innovative new mouse trap.  Prior to that I was a Quality Engineer in the automotive lighting business. 

We are running this campaign in hopes that you can help us finance the next phase of our endeavor, which includes final designs, prototyping and marketing. 

We do not plan to manufacture this ourselves, however, we will be submitting licensing proposals and prototypes to existing pest control device manufacturers.

  • We have a robust design.

  • The Provisional Patent submission has been made and the design is officially Patent Pending!

  • The 20 year Utility Patent submission has been made.

  • We anticipate the standard 'smoke alarm' version to be sold at retail for $19.95.

  • We anticipate the 'recessed' version to be sold at retail for $29.95.

This trap:

  • Is covert and blends into its environment and goes unseen by the unknowing eye.

  • They are poison/kill or a catch/release trap, so it appeals to everyone.

  • They allow users to do away with the common snap, glue, poison, and electric traps.

  • They help prevent the mice from entering 'your' living space.

  • They catch mice at a location of 'our' choosing, not the mouse's!

  • They are simple to install.

  • They are easy to use, empty and reset? 

  • They are meant to be permanent fixtures designed to blend in to its setting.

  • The user never has to look at the captured mouse if they so choose.

  • The user no longer has to look at a gross dead or maimed mouse again. 

    Think about it...

    Common snap, glue, poison, and electric traps are typically placed in our floor corners and pantries, right?  This is our living space.  So, why are we baiting them in the very space we are trying to keep them out of?  By doing this, we are inviting them in!  Yes, the common traps work, most of the time, but the mice are still defecating, urinating, and walking in your living space. 

    Our trap design 'stops' them from entering our living space at all!

    If you have mice, they already have access to your whole house, so you can catch them anywhere you want if you bait properly and wait.  Our design puts the traps high up on the wall or ceiling where they are out of the way. Rodents have a basic need to search for food and this trap draws them in just like any other.  These traps will absolutely attract them and they will absolutely catch them, too!

    With these funds...

    We plan to use these funds to further develop the residential designs.  We have two different models.  One looks similar to a standard residential smoke alarm and the other is recessed, similar to a recessed light.  We need to create working prototypes.

    We will also use these funds to design models meant for use in the commercial marketplace.  These can be modified to work just about everywhere. 

    They can be used:

    • In the everyday business.

    • In food service environments.

    • In food manufacturing environments.

    • In supermarkets and corner stores.

    • In hospitals and doctor's offices.

    • In schools.

    • In government buildings.

    • In all manufacturing plants.

    • In industrial locations.

      Wouldn't you use these if it meant that you would rarely, if ever, have to buy another trap, risk injury or look at a disgusting dead mouse again?

      We would like to see these marketed to developers so they can pre-install them in homes.  Mice are inevitable in most parts of the world.  Why not be ready for them?

      Our Investment...

      We have $15,000 invested in this design and we are out of funds to continue to the prototype and marketing phase.

      How the funds will be used:

      • To purchase one Makerbot 3D printer

      • To upgrade our current PC, or purchase new one if necessary

      • To purchase 3D Modeling software

      • To purchase raw materials

      • To market the trap to the pest control industry

      If we do not meet our goal...

      If we do not meet our goal, we are planning to stay the course.  We will attempt to find an investor to round out the remaining funding or begin another campaign. 

      Perks...

      Our perks range from $5.00 - $500 and we are offering Amazon Prime gifts.

      Amazon Prime perks:  For example, if you give $10, you can pick out anything on Amazon Prime under $1.99, and you get a gracious thank you.

      If you like our idea but can't give money...

      If you are unable to contribute money towards this campaign, we completely understand and appreciate you just taking the time to look over our proposal.  If you are willing to help in other ways, we would be happy to reward you as well! 

      Please use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out on Facebook.  We will give you a $5 Amazon gift card for every referral that results in a contribution of $50 or more.  The person with the most referrals, 10 or more, at the end of the campaign will receive a $100 gift card of their choosing.

      We think the majority of you know how potentially massive the market is for this kind of product. 

      We are inventors and fixers.  Please help us to help you.  We would be happy to answer any questions you may have.

      This is a picture of me and my son James, co-inventors.

story:
Our Biggest Challenge Yet!

Hi, I'm Mason Stanford, Studio Lead at the Collective Dream Studios. I speak for our whole small indie studio when I say that I'm currently living a life-long dream. I actually make video games for a living! If you could go back and tell my nine-year-old self - who was constantly doodling Super Mario Bros and Sonic the Hedgehog all over ever available scrap of paper - that I would be living this dream, I'm pretty sure his little heart couldn't take it! I have had the privelege of bringing others that shared the same life-long obsession onto my little team and we've been hard at a project that has been truly fulfilling. This dream even has a name: Dungeonforge. Together, we're in the process of making that life-long dream of actually making a game come true.

Dungeonforge, as I'll explain in full detail a bit further on, is a game about telling your unique story. At it's heart, Dungeonforge is an Action-RPG in the spirit of classic Dungeons and Dragons where you, as dungeon master, drive and shape the gameworld and everyone has a chance to weave their own unique part of gaming lore. As an avid fan of D&D, I can't even begin to express the level of excitement we have to be working on a game that promises that! The gaming community has already expressed a collective excitement about what we're working on by voting Dungeonforge onto Steam Greenlight after less than two weeks on the platform! The outpouring of support has been astounding! We want to deliver on the promise we made by delivering a game that exceeds the expectations of our supporters!

That dream right now is being threatened with being extinguished altogether. Principle members of my team are Chilean nationals and dear friends who were here on student visas while attending BYU, another life-long dream. We have had very little in terms of funding for our project and once the money dried up, they were forced to return to their home country, being unable to afford to stay in school here. Once back at home, they have also had to take on regular work to pay for their living while we continue to develop our game in part-time and with tremendous distance between us. Due to that distance, we've faced delays and setbacks that we hadn't anticipated and development has gone reeling off-schedule. Back states-side, for me it has become impossible to continue development and support my children without taking on more than one job.

So, we're at an impass. Without funding of some kind the dream will be extinguished before it's fully realized. With a small amount of funding, we partially overcome the obstacle of distance with better telepresence software and equipment that will help us be closer as a studio; almost as if we were in the same room.

With a bit more funding, we may even be able to get these guys back to the states, back attending their dream school and back at the studio working all in the same room together again. We may even raise enough to allow us to work full-time, without taking other jobs, and keep our own lights on, rent paid and food on the table while we bring this dream to life.

I'd love to share with you some of the work that we've done and hopefully you can see the extreme levels of love and commitment we've put into every detail of what we've created so far. Read on for a full breakdown of Dungeonforge. Scattered throughout that explanation are a few lovingly crafted screenshots. I regard this as the grown-up version of those Mario doodles that used to make occasional appearance on our families refrigerator when I was kid. 

In Dungeonforge all the action takes place in a massive, open gameworld. This world is your canvas; the place where you will tell your story as a dungeon master. Through our in-game editor which we've termed "the Dungeonforge," you will be able to craft adventures rife with deep dungeons, dark woods, frosty mountain tops, and just crawling with the unspeakable legions of darkness. Your content then becomes part of the over-arching gameworld for all to enjoy. You can script quests within your adventure for players to complete, or even perform a "Live Telling" of your adventure, wherein you actively take the role of dungeon master, playing the part of NPCs, weaving dialog on the fly, and controlling monsters to shape the experience of the players dynamically, in real time. Going further along that theme, we will also feature a competitive, PvDM game type, which will pit the players against the DM, who will be given charge of the hordes of evil in an attempt to thwart the players on their quest.

Making sure the best content is available and easy to find during online play is important. All content is rated by the players. The lowest scoring content is hidden, while the highest scoring content will even be pointed out to you by NPC quest-givers in the gameworld's central hub city.


  • Create and edit large outdoor areas - including adding towns and areas to encounter enemies - to form the overworld for your adventure.
  • Build complex dungeons into your overworld with a simple dungeon tool.
  • Script quests for players to follow with an easy to use interface
  • Script interactions with NPCs in your adventure, including branching dialog.
  • Script events and triggers into your adventure for a more unique and epic experience.

For the Tabletop Community by Popular Demand

The tabletop gaming community has been a huge part of the success of Dungeonforge to this point. One thing that has come up consistently among that community is the desire to simply be able to export their adventures in the game for use in tabletop gaming sessions.

So, we've implemented a toggle into the editor which switches to a top-down view and gives the option to export your dungeon in a number of formats to be printed off and used in your tabletop gaming sessions.

A token may be purchased in game that when used, gives the creator of the dungeon a tip, redeemable for real-world currency. This is just another way in which taking the time to create truly enjoyable content is rewarded. The person giving the tip token gains aesthetically unique, "Epic Loot" drops in return for their generosity. "Epic Loot" features unique designs, aura and particle effects, but is not gameplay affecting. It comes in sets and is meant to be collectible. It's a way for players to really differentiate their character and show to the world that they have a generous spirit.

Dungeonforge features a unique blend of gameplay concepts. We went with a top-down perspective, so the game shares the same simplicity and intuitiveness in the control scheme as games like Diablo. At the same time, we love the engaging, varied combat of games like Dark Souls and The Witcher 2. Thus the combat is driven by timing your mouse clicks to form combos, avoiding taking damage, dodging, parrying and countering enemy attacks, positioning yourself well and waiting for openings to attack. We knew going in, with the idea of a game driven by player-made content, that the gameplay would have to be good enough for people to actually want to make content for our game and play the content others make. Thus, gameplay became the top priority for us. We're working hard to polish the mechanics and deliver on that premise. We think we've got a fantastic, well thought out blend of concepts that truly sets gameplay in Dungeonforge apart and makes it a can't miss type of experience.

Dungeonforge is built to be equally enjoyable whether playing alone and completely offline, or in a group with friends just as in the days of ye olde tabletop game night.

The combat system is backed by vast character customization options:

  • Piles of loot with with special traits and effects to really refine your build
  • An extensive stat sheet
  • Deep skill customization with an array of special abilities to suit your particular play style
  • Steam Workshop integration where the community can create and submit custom loot to be dropped in dungeons and special abilities to be added to a character's skill sheet and earned right along with the default skills

In addition to offline single-player and online play, LAN and same-screen multiplayer (using a mix of gamepads and mouse/keyboard) will be available to support that true, old-school feeling of playing D&D with a bunch of buddies in the same room.

In addition to LAN support, Dungeonforge will feature dedicated servers for those wishing to host their own, entirely self-contained gameworlds online and allow friends to play and create content therein.  Loot, characters, lore and even the gameworld itself can all be uniquely tweaked or replaced entirely on dedicated servers for an experience that's as unique as you want it to be.

Administrators will have a full suite of moderation tools including the ability to choose who on the server may create content, approve content to appear in the gameworld or block content from appearing at all.

Dedicated servers may be set to private for only certain people to access so you and your adventuring buddies can enjoy your content together, or can be made public so that the world can enjoy the world you're creating.

Dedicated servers are entirely self-contained and separate from other content. Characters created and loot obtained on a dedicated server stay on that server.

Dedicated servers give players even more far-reaching control over their unique experience in Dungeonforge. We're beyond excited to see where creative and imaginative people take this!

Dungeonforge will feature five playable character classes to start with, each with unique abilities suiting various playstyles. Each character will also have a unique back story which will be elucidated via first-party campaign-style content. Each character's campaign will contain around 20 hours of gameplay. Future playable characters will be released over the life of Dungeonforge, each with an accompanying campaign of similar length. Whenever there's an opportunity to improve the game via new editing tools, a first-party adventure will be released to showcase the new tool.

Platforms:

Dungeonforge was recently Greenlit by the Steam community and will be available for the Steam platform on PC, Linux, and Mac computers.  

A mobile version in which players on their high-end, gaming-oriented mobile devices may play with their Steam using brethren will be available on the Android and iOS.

We are completely thrilled to be bringing Steam Workshop support to Dungeonforge at launch! Using our custom mod tools and/or your favorite 3D content creation programs, you'll be able to create and submit content for everyone to use in their dungeons and adventures.

Create custom:

  • Monsters
  • Weapons
  • Spells and abilities
  • Scripting for events, monster behavior, NPC interaction and, well, anything else!
  • Dungeon tiles
  • Decorative and environmental items
  • Custom playable characters with your own models, animations, spells and abilities for everyone to enjoy

A voting and comment system will ensure the best made content rises to the top and that new submissions can be easily found and tried out.

story:
Hi! Game geeks! I am Pei, a FTG Gamer. I would be honored to introduce you the ALL NEW BUTTON of Arcade Stick----"HBFS-30".
 

HBFS-30

"Harder","Better","Faster","Stronger/Silent"  

                                  

Stimulate Finger's Potential

Specifically designed for the FTG Gamer

I build the all new button HBFS-30, and to achieve more than five kinds of  original ideas to help your technology to a new level. More sensitive response. A longer life. Quieter input. Better understanding of your habits, and a new original shape.

  • HBFS-30 use Cherry MX mechanical Keyswitch. Designed for professional gamers. Unprecedented pleasure by only 45g operations force. Now, the button to keep up with the reaction of your brain.
  • 50 million operations of Cherry MX mechanical micro switch. 10 times the life of the current RG buttons. You can be fierce to operate your weapon, so comfortably and irresponsibly. Become the master of Lightning Kick!!
  • The new internal parts design,Completely eradicate the ear-piercing noise of keys generated by the beat. The use of high specification vibration damping materials, Japan PORON Microcellular Polymer Sheets. Reduce the noise up to 20 db effectively. Such as the ninja defeat the enemy in silent!!So the wisdom of the choice,was no longer make your family fury!Your sweetheart will be more to love your Stick!

HBFS-30 & OBFS-30 Decibel Test


  • According to your habits to change the micro switch at any time. Different characters, different game, different strategies, with various characteristics of the different micro switch. Enjoy favorable of the Battle.
  • The original octagonal design and keycap height adjustment. Promote smooth when Plink, and become the focus of all eyes!

 

HBFS-30 can be installed in any commercially available Arcde Stick case.

  • Releases your case's internal space ! The HBFS-30 installation depth of just 2cm.Do not have to change the case.
  • The Adapter socket specifically developed for HBFS-30, No more welding. Change & Fix it yourself! Adapter socket will be easier to install and to replace HBFS-30. It is compatible with existing female terminal. You do not have to change your wiring system. Replace HBFS-30 just like replace a new OBSF-30.
  • Light up your Arcade Stick case! HBFS-30 already have the LED holes.You can attach LED lighting in HBFS-30.

 

I believe HBFS-30 make you excited.

Now the HBFS-30 has developed and made using in, which shows its well function and stable performance. Now, we are raising amount of funding for HBFS-30's production plan.

To thank you for your full support and funding, we will provide you the highest priority and the most favorable commodity pre-order in accordance with the amount of your funding. When the  funding plan is completed you will be the first to get our first batch of production HBFS-30.

We sincerely invite you to become part of our plan. Help us complete HBFS-30 production plan!

This project is "All or Nothing" - if we don't meet our Goal, we can't produce and send out the HBFS-30 (your contribution will be refunded). So, please get your friends involved!

 

Specification: TheFirst batch of production HBFS-30

  • CAP COLOR: Only Crystal Black
  • BASE COLOR: Only Black
  • SIZE SPEC: 
  • SWITCH: Cherry MX Keyswitch "Linear feel" Red keystem
  • Life (at 5 V, 1mA, no load): 50 million cycle
  • Operating Force: 45g
  • Total Travel: 2.5mm
  • Vibration damping pad: Japan PORON Microcellular Polymer Sheets

 

 

Backer Rewards

 

You Are My Angel!!

 

The Novice $24

 

The Professional $32

 

The Master $50

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

2012/07/20 Update !

ABOUT SHIPPING:

All Perks is Free shipping to the USA and Canada !!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2012/08/01 Update !

I  visit the manufacturer and see these lovely prototype button.
Although it has not been polished, but I can not wait to install the Cherry Switch in !

It’s looks perfect! Response quickly and stable!

Of course, this is my subjective feelings.
So next week will invite some players to test, so stay tuned ^ _ ^

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2012/08/07 Update
Hey Guys!
We got HBFS-30 actual test from Taiwan players.
and sound comparison with OBSF-30.
Check it !

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2012/08/11 Update

Hi, guys.
We have an important update.
You must check it!

We canceled QUICK CONNECT WIRE.
And We try to do something better.
Therefore, we design a new Adapter socket for the Cherry MX a switch.
Through Adapter socket will be easier to install and to replace HBFS-30.
It is compatible with existing female terminal.
You do not have to change your wiring system.
Replace HBFS-30 just like replace a new OBSF-30.

If you have to participate HBFS-30 fund-raising, or you are planning to join.
We will not charge you any extra fees.

But Adapter socket has really raised our production costs.
So we will raise the MSRP of HBFS-30, after the fund-raising.

Now join the funded Campaign is most favorable.
Please share it to your friends!

Finally,
Because an Adapter socket is equal to 2 Quick Connect Wires.
Therefore, we adjusted the contents of Perks.

The Novice:
15 Quick Connect Wires > 8 Adapter sockets

The Professional:
20 Quick Connect Wires > 10 Adapter sockets

The Master:
30 Quick Connect Wires > 15 Adapter sockets

The Monster:
120 Quick Connect Wires > 60 Adapter sockets

You Akuma !!:
250 Quick Connect Wires > 125 Adapter sockets

 

Thanks for your attention!

I hop you will like it !! ^_^

If you want to change anything, please send me a message.
